一个顶俩 yi'ge'ding'lia
俩瓜仨枣 lia'gua'sa'zao
前所未有 qian'suo'wei'you
毫无疑问 hao'wu'yi'wen
无论如何 wu'lun'ru'he
不可思议 bu'ke'si'yi
不可避免 bu'ke'bi'mian
脱颖而出 tuo'ying'er'chu
莫名其妙 mo'ming'qi'miao
不知不觉 bu'zhi'bu'jue
众所周知 zhong'suo'zhou'zhi
有感而发 you'gan'er'fa
实实在在 shi'shi'zai'zai
全力以赴 quan'li'yi'fu
各种各样 ge'zhong'ge'yang
一如既往 yi'ru'ji'wang
实事求是 shi'shi'qiu'shi
丰富多彩 feng'fu'duo'cai
与众不同 yu'zhong'bu'tong
引人注目 yin'ren'zhu'mu
千方百计 qian'fang'bai'ji
小心翼翼 xiao'xin'yi'yi
随时随地 sui'shi'sui'di
反腐倡廉 fan'fu'chang'lian
供不应求 gong'bu'ying'qiu
坚定不移 jian'ding'bu'yi
层出不穷 ceng'chu'bu'qiong
毫不犹豫 hao'bu'you'yu
必不可少 bi'bu'ke'shao
不可或缺 bu'ke'huo'que
独一无二 du'yi'wu'er
迫不及待 po'bu'ji'dai
淋漓尽致 lin'li'jin'zhi
意想不到 yi'xiang'bu'dao
突如其来 tu'ru'qi'lai
方方面面 fang'fang'mian'mian
有史以来 you'shi'yi'lai
理所当然 li'suo'dang'ran
全心全意 quan'xin'quan'yi
出人意料 chu'ren'yi'liao
成千上万 cheng'qian'shang'wan
截然不同 jie'ran'bu'tong
不约而同 bu'yue'er'tong
新陈代谢 xin'chen'dai'xie
当务之急 dang'wu'zhi'ji
可想而知 ke'xiang'er'zhi
深入人心 shen'ru'ren'xin
如火如荼 ru'huo'ru'tu
源源不断 yuan'yuan'bu'duan
吃喝玩乐 chi'he'wan'le
艰苦奋斗 jian'ku'fen'dou
显而易见 xian'er'yi'jian
春意盎然 chun'yi'ang'ran
调查研究 diao'cha'yan'jiu
不由自主 bu'you'zi'zhu
大大小小 da'da'xiao'xiao
不知所措 bu'zhi'suo'cuo
名副其实 ming'fu'qi'shi
因地制宜 yin'di'zhi'yi
息息相关 xi'xi'xiang'guan
无可奈何 wu'ke'nai'he
一年一度 yi'nian'yi'du
或多或少 huo'duo'huo'shao
愈演愈烈 yu'yan'yu'lie
拭目以待 shi'mu'yi'dai
见义勇为 jian'yi'yong'wei
一模一样 yi'mo'yi'yang
大吃一惊 da'chi'yi'jing
后顾之忧 hou'gu'zhi'you
想方设法 xiang'fang'she'fa
擦肩而过 ca'jian'er'guo
天下第一 tian'xia'di'yi
得天独厚 de'tian'du'hou
自然而然 zi'ran'er'ran
随心所欲 sui'xin'suo'yu
一目了然 yi'mu'le'ran
取而代之 qu'er'dai'zhi
不言而喻 bu'yan'er'yu
无能为力 wu'neng'wei'li
坚持不懈 jian'chi'bu'xie
五花八门 wu'hua'ba'men
轰轰烈烈 hong'hong'lie'lie
举足轻重 ju'zu'qing'zhong
目瞪口呆 mu'deng'kou'dai
行之有效 xing'zhi'you'xiao
各式各样 ge'shi'ge'yang
情不自禁 qing'bu'zi'jin
泪流满面 lei'liu'man'mian
点点滴滴 dian'dian'di'di
沸沸扬扬 fei'fei'yang'yang
循序渐进 xun'xu'jian'jin
十字路口 shi'zi'lu'kou
紧锣密鼓 jin'luo'mi'gu
梅开二度 mei'kai'er'du
不以为然 bu'yi'wei'ran
不折不扣 bu'zhe'bu'kou
此起彼伏 ci'qi'bi'fu
来之不易 lai'zhi'bu'yi
不容忽视 bu'rong'hu'shi
雪上加霜 xue'shang'jia'shuang
当之无愧 dang'zhi'wu'kui
出乎意料 chu'hu'yi'liao
络绎不绝 luo'yi'bu'jue
水涨船高 shui'zhang'chuan'gao
胡思乱想 hu'si'luan'xiang
惊心动魄 jing'xin'dong'po
弄虚作假 nong'xu'zuo'jia
更进一步 geng'jin'yi'bu
势在必行 shi'zai'bi'xing
讨价还价 tao'jia'hai'jia
何去何从 he'qu'he'cong
家喻户晓 jia'yu'hu'xiao
名列前茅 ming'lie'qian'mao
应运而生 ying'yun'er'sheng
再接再厉 zai'jie'zai'li
自言自语 zi'yan'zi'yu
一应俱全 yi'ying'ju'quan
一见钟情 yi'jian'zhong'qing
此时此刻 ci'shi'ci'ke
眼花缭乱 yan'hua'liao'luan
可见一斑 ke'jian'yi'ban
毋庸置疑 wu'yong'zhi'yi
史无前例 shi'wu'qian'li
铺天盖地 pu'tian'gai'di
不得而知 bu'de'er'zhi
一举一动 yi'ju'yi'dong
迫在眉睫 po'zai'mei'jie
脚踏实地 jiao'ta'shi'di
大势所趋 da'shi'suo'qu
一席之地 yi'xi'zhi'di
齐心协力 qi'xin'xie'li
卷土重来 juan'tu'zhong'lai
切实可行 qie'shi'ke'xing
挺身而出 ting'shen'er'chu
难以置信 nan'yi'zhi'xin
耳目一新 er'mu'yi'xin
不遗余力 bu'yi'yu'li
有条不紊 you'tiao'bu'wen
有目共睹 you'mu'gong'du
相提并论 xiang'ti'bing'lun
轻而易举 qing'er'yi'ju
哭笑不得 ku'xiao'bu'de
乱七八糟 luan'qi'ba'zao
四面八方 si'mian'ba'fang
大街小巷 da'jie'xiao'xiang
比比皆是 bi'bi'jie'shi
顺理成章 shun'li'cheng'zhang
首当其冲 shou'dang'qi'chong
恍然大悟 huang'ran'da'wu
心甘情愿 xin'gan'qing'yuan
恰到好处 qia'dao'hao'chu
不顾一切 bu'gu'yi'qie
日新月异 ri'xin'yue'yi
竭尽全力 jie'jin'quan'li
百万富翁 bai'wan'fu'weng
精益求精 jing'yi'qiu'jing
津津乐道 jin'jin'le'dao
一帆风顺 yi'fan'feng'shun
扎扎实实 zha'zha'shi'shi
触目惊心 chu'mu'jing'xin
锦上添花 jin'shang'tian'hua
胡说八道 hu'shuo'ba'dao
微不足道 wei'bu'zu'dao
不正之风 bu'zheng'zhi'feng
措手不及 cuo'shou'bu'ji
肆无忌惮 si'wu'ji'dan
梦寐以求 meng'mei'yi'qiu
密密麻麻 mi'mi'ma'ma
错综复杂 cuo'zong'fu'za
炙手可热 zhi'shou'ke're
应有尽有 ying'you'jin'you
刻骨铭心 ke'gu'ming'xin
密不可分 mi'bu'ke'fen
下定决心 xia'ding'jue'xin
尽管如此 jin'guan'ru'ci
持之以恒 chi'zhi'yi'heng
吃苦耐劳 chi'ku'nai'lao
扑朔迷离 pu'shuo'mi'li
无与伦比 wu'yu'lun'bi
千家万户 qian'jia'wan'hu
清清楚楚 qing'qing'chu'chu
无可厚非 wu'ke'hou'fei
惊天动地 jing'tian'dong'di
屡见不鲜 lv'jian'bu'xian
功不可没 gong'bu'ke'mei
记忆犹新 ji'yi'you'xin
兴致勃勃 xing'zhi'bo'bo
恶性循环 e'xing'xun'huan
一针见血 yi'zhen'jian'xue
议事日程 yi'shi'ri'cheng
力所能及 li'suo'neng'ji
事半功倍 shi'ban'gong'bei
一塌糊涂 yi'ta'hu'tu
义不容辞 yi'bu'rong'ci
自强不息 zi'qiang'bu'xi
畅所欲言 chang'suo'yu'yan
一触即发 yi'chu'ji'fa
花花公子 hua'hua'gong'zi
未雨绸缪 wei'yu'chou'miao
潜移默化 qian'yi'mo'hua
异军突起 yi'jun'tu'qi
一无所知 yi'wu'suo'zhi
干干净净 gan'gan'jing'jing
形形色色 xing'xing'se'se
力不从心 li'bu'cong'xin
一动不动 yi'dong'bu'dong
默默无闻 mo'mo'wu'wen
与时俱进 yu'shi'ju'jin
匪夷所思 fei'yi'suo'si
鲜为人知 xian'wei'ren'zhi
耐人寻味 nai'ren'xun'wei
有所作为 you'suo'zuo'wei
自由自在 zi'you'zi'zai
自始至终 zi'shi'zhi'zhong
轩然大波 xuan'ran'da'bo
视而不见 shi'er'bu'jian
三位一体 san'wei'yi'ti
一无所有 yi'wu'suo'you
踏踏实实 ta'ta'shi'shi
一心一意 yi'xin'yi'yi
自以为是 zi'yi'wei'shi
焕然一新 huan'ran'yi'xin
令人满意 ling'ren'man'yi
刻不容缓 ke'bu'rong'huan
刮目相看 gua'mu'xiang'kan
无处不在 wu'chu'bu'zai
参差不齐 can'cha'bu'qi
所作所为 suo'zuo'suo'wei
半壁江山 ban'bi'jiang'shan
理直气壮 li'zhi'qi'zhuang
赞不绝口 zan'bu'jue'kou
跃跃欲试 yue'yue'yu'shi
高高在上 gao'gao'zai'shang
老老实实 lao'lao'shi'shi
轻轻松松 qing'qing'song'song
不亦乐乎 bu'yi'le'hu
在所难免 zai'suo'nan'mian
翻天覆地 fan'tian'fu'di
得心应手 de'xin'ying'shou
发扬光大 fa'yang'guang'da
久而久之 jiu'er'jiu'zhi
相辅相成 xiang'fu'xiang'cheng
不绝于耳 bu'jue'yu'er
受益匪浅 shou'yi'fei'qian
近在咫尺 jin'zai'zhi'chi
相得益彰 xiang'de'yi'zhang
无独有偶 wu'du'you'ou
卓有成效 zhuo'you'cheng'xiao
急功近利 ji'gong'jin'li
万无一失 wan'wu'yi'shi
惨不忍睹 can'bu'ren'du
自古以来 zi'gu'yi'lai
赏心悦目 shang'xin'yue'mu
游刃有余 you'ren'you'yu
不可多得 bu'ke'duo'de
自力更生 zi'li'geng'sheng
自上而下 zi'shang'er'xia
马不停蹄 ma'bu'ting'ti
扭亏为盈 niu'kui'wei'ying
爱不释手 ai'bu'shi'shou
义无反顾 yi'wu'fan'gu
罪魁祸首 zui'kui'huo'shou
独树一帜 du'shu'yi'zhi
尘埃落定 chen'ai'luo'ding
推波助澜 tui'bo'zhu'lan
耳熟能详 er'shu'neng'xiang
无动于衷 wu'dong'yu'zhong
榜上有名 bang'shang'you'ming
呼之欲出 hu'zhi'yu'chu
融为一体 rong'wei'yi'ti
心有余悸 xin'you'yu'ji
百分之百 bai'fen'zhi'bai
风云人物 feng'yun'ren'wu
一网打尽 yi'wang'da'jin
栩栩如生 xu'xu'ru'sheng
热火朝天 re'huo'chao'tian
时时刻刻 shi'shi'ke'ke
如出一辙 ru'chu'yi'zhe
忧心忡忡 you'xin'chong'chong
自我批评 zi'wo'pi'ping
众志成城 zhong'zhi'cheng'cheng
一丝不苟 yi'si'bu'gou
念念不忘 nian'nian'bu'wang
接二连三 jie'er'lian'san
不切实际 bu'qie'shi'ji
掉以轻心 diao'yi'qing'xin
蠢蠢欲动 chun'chun'yu'dong
难能可贵 nan'neng'ke'gui
琳琅满目 lin'lang'man'mu
多种多样 duo'zhong'duo'yang
排忧解难 pai'you'jie'nan
辛辛苦苦 xin'xin'ku'ku
深入浅出 shen'ru'qian'chu
安居乐业 an'ju'le'ye
喜怒哀乐 xi'nu'ai'le
针锋相对 zhen'feng'xiang'dui
一蹴而就 yi'cu'er'jiu
寥寥无几 liao'liao'wu'ji
与日俱增 yu'ri'ju'zeng
初来乍到 chu'lai'zha'dao
首屈一指 shou'qu'yi'zhi
大起大落 da'qi'da'luo
一年四季 yi'nian'si'ji
万事如意 wan'shi'ru'yi
情有独钟 qing'you'du'zhong
遥遥领先 yao'yao'ling'xian
横空出世 heng'kong'chu'shi
不堪设想 bu'kan'she'xiang
兴高采烈 xing'gao'cai'lie
独立自主 du'li'zi'zhu
志同道合 zhi'tong'dao'he
得不偿失 de'bu'chang'shi
物美价廉 wu'mei'jia'lian
足不出户 zu'bu'chu'hu
迷迷糊糊 mi'mi'hu'hu
立竿见影 li'gan'jian'ying
更新换代 geng'xin'huan'dai
衣食住行 yi'shi'zhu'xing
多愁善感 duo'chou'shan'gan
突飞猛进 tu'fei'meng'jin
勇往直前 yong'wang'zhi'qian
出谋划策 chu'mou'hua'ce
不复存在 bu'fu'cun'zai
一言不发 yi'yan'bu'fa
甜言蜜语 tian'yan'mi'yu
屈指可数 qu'zhi'ke'shu
如愿以偿 ru'yuan'yi'chang
公平交易 gong'ping'jiao'yi
束手无策 shu'shou'wu'ce
春暖花开 chun'nuan'hua'kai
别出心裁 bie'chu'xin'cai
有意无意 you'yi'wu'yi
图文并茂 tu'wen'bing'mao
兢兢业业 jing'jing'ye'ye
无所适从 wu'suo'shi'cong
望而却步 wang'er'que'bu
天涯海角 tian'ya'hai'jiao
一枝独秀 yi'zhi'du'xiu
脱口而出 tuo'kou'er'chu
以身作则 yi'shen'zuo'ze
昙花一现 tan'hua'yi'xian
崭露头角 zhan'lu'tou'jiao
大名鼎鼎 da'ming'ding'ding
争先恐后 zheng'xian'kong'hou
犹豫不决 you'yu'bu'jue
忍无可忍 ren'wu'ke'ren
面目全非 mian'mu'quan'fei
大相径庭 da'xiang'jing'ting
谈天说地 tan'tian'shuo'di
微乎其微 wei'hu'qi'wei
不相上下 bu'xiang'shang'xia
一视同仁 yi'shi'tong'ren
断断续续 duan'duan'xu'xu
根深蒂固 gen'shen'di'gu
不了了之 bu'le'le'zhi
意料之外 yi'liao'zhi'wai
咄咄逼人 duo'duo'bi'ren
不谋而合 bu'mou'er'he
优胜劣汰 you'sheng'lie'tai
咬牙切齿 yao'ya'qie'chi
人山人海 ren'shan'ren'hai
顺其自然 shun'qi'zi'ran
一天到晚 yi'tian'dao'wan
喜闻乐见 xi'wen'le'jian
世外桃源 shi'wai'tao'yuan
教书育人 jiao'shu'yu'ren
博大精深 bo'da'jing'shen
无缘无故 wu'yuan'wu'gu
热泪盈眶 re'lei'ying'kuang
无忧无虑 wu'you'wu'lv
无影无踪 wu'ying'wu'zong
叹为观止 tan'wei'guan'zhi
硬着头皮 ying'zhe'tou'pi
风起云涌 feng'qi'yun'yong
指日可待 zhi'ri'ke'dai
我行我素 wo'xing'wo'su
大张旗鼓 da'zhang'qi'gu
五颜六色 wu'yan'liu'se
总而言之 zong'er'yan'zhi
无微不至 wu'wei'bu'zhi
滔滔不绝 tao'tao'bu'jue
心想事成 xin'xiang'shi'cheng
更上一层楼 geng'shang'yi'ceng'lou
有声有色 you'sheng'you'se
一厢情愿 yi'xiang'qing'yuan
连锁反应 lian'suo'fan'ying
下落不明 xia'luo'bu'ming
与生俱来 yu'sheng'ju'lai
身体力行 shen'ti'li'xing
不择手段 bu'ze'shou'duan
心中有数 xin'zhong'you'shu
举世瞩目 ju'shi'zhu'mu
背道而驰 bei'dao'er'chi
一成不变 yi'cheng'bu'bian
顾名思义 gu'ming'si'yi
推陈出新 tui'chen'chu'xin
原汁原味 yuan'zhi'yuan'wei
土地改革 tu'di'gai'ge
供过于求 gong'guo'yu'qiu
捉襟见肘 zhuo'jin'jian'zhou
敲诈勒索 qiao'zha'lei'suo
乐此不疲 le'ci'bu'pi
习以为常 xi'yi'wei'chang
无所事事 wu'suo'shi'shi
水到渠成 shui'dao'qu'cheng
似曾相识 shi'ceng'xiang'shi
归根结底 gui'gen'jie'di
手忙脚乱 shou'mang'jiao'luan
脱胎换骨 tuo'tai'huan'gu
没完没了 mei'wan'mei'le
白手起家 bai'shou'qi'jia
阿弥陀佛 a'mi'tuo'fu
善解人意 shan'jie'ren'yi
源远流长 yuan'yuan'liu'zhang
有朝一日 you'chao'yi'ri
意味深长 yi'wei'shen'zhang
自下而上 zi'xia'er'shang
一点一滴 yi'dian'yi'di
别开生面 bie'kai'sheng'mian
若无其事 ruo'wu'qi'shi
接踵而至 jie'zhong'er'zhi
绝无仅有 jue'wu'jin'you
家常便饭 jia'chang'bian'fan
对症下药 dui'zheng'xia'yao
统筹兼顾 tong'chou'jian'gu
提心吊胆 ti'xin'diao'dan
蒸蒸日上 zheng'zheng'ri'shang
一波三折 yi'bo'san'zhe
适得其反 shi'de'qi'fan
天马行空 tian'ma'xing'kong
无家可归 wu'jia'ke'gui
跌宕起伏 die'dang'qi'fu
异口同声 yi'kou'tong'sheng
茶余饭后 cha'yu'fan'hou
标本兼治 biao'ben'jian'zhi
不屑一顾 bu'xie'yi'gu
信誓旦旦 xin'shi'dan'dan
不动声色 bu'dong'sheng'se
任重道远 ren'zhong'dao'yuan
酸甜苦辣 suan'tian'ku'la
迎刃而解 ying'ren'er'jie
别有用心 bie'you'yong'xin
直言不讳 zhi'yan'bu'hui
声势浩大 sheng'shi'hao'da
无济于事 wu'ji'yu'shi
别无选择 bie'wu'xuan'ze
热情洋溢 re'qing'yang'yi
实话实说 shi'hua'shi'shuo
依依不舍 yi'yi'bu'she
司空见惯 si'kong'jian'guan
风风雨雨 feng'feng'yu'yu
尽如人意 jin'ru'ren'yi
格格不入 ge'ge'bu'ru
耿耿于怀 geng'geng'yu'huai
大惊小怪 da'jing'xiao'guai
虎视眈眈 hu'shi'dan'dan
从天而降 cong'tian'er'jiang
玩忽职守 wan'hu'zhi'shou
浩浩荡荡 hao'hao'dang'dang
奋不顾身 fen'bu'gu'shen
后来居上 hou'lai'ju'shang
世界末日 shi'jie'mo'ri
有的放矢 you'de'fang'shi
岌岌可危 ji'ji'ke'wei
风口浪尖 feng'kou'lang'jian
百花齐放 bai'hua'qi'fang
漫不经心 man'bu'jing'xin
许许多多 xu'xu'duo'duo
必由之路 bi'you'zhi'lu
大打出手 da'da'chu'shou
了如指掌 le'ru'zhi'zhang
放在眼里 fang'zai'yan'li
一生一世 yi'sheng'yi'shi
土生土长 tu'sheng'tu'zhang
不足为奇 bu'zu'wei'qi
天长地久 tian'zhang'di'jiu
心满意足 xin'man'yi'zu
家家户户 jia'jia'hu'hu
文艺复兴 wen'yi'fu'xing
津津有味 jin'jin'you'wei
绞尽脑汁 jiao'jin'nao'zhi
长治久安 zhang'zhi'jiu'an
不可分割 bu'ke'fen'ge
出类拔萃 chu'lei'ba'cui
气喘吁吁 qi'chuan'xu'xu
别具一格 bie'ju'yi'ge
防不胜防 fang'bu'sheng'fang
欢聚一堂 huan'ju'yi'tang
大同小异 da'tong'xiao'yi
红红火火 hong'hong'huo'huo

按部就班 an'bu'jiu'ban

一无是处 yi'wu'shi'chu

扣人心弦 kou'ren'xin'xian
感慨万千 gan'kai'wan'qian
青梅竹马 qing'mei'zhu'ma
今非昔比 jin'fei'xi'bi
进退两难 jin'tui'liang'nan
忍俊不禁 ren'jun'bu'jin
标新立异 biao'xin'li'yi
拳头产品 quan'tou'chan'pin
天方夜谭 tian'fang'ye'tan
功亏一篑 gong'kui'yi'kui
顾全大局 gu'quan'da'ju
保驾护航 bao'jia'hu'hang
春夏秋冬 chun'xia'qiu'dong
群策群力 qun'ce'qun'li
雄心壮志 xiong'xin'zhuangzhi'zhi
悲欢离合 bei'huan'li'he
自给自足 zi'gei'zi'zu
纵横交错 zong'heng'jiao'cuo
面面俱到 mian'mian'ju'dao
灵机一动 ling'ji'yi'dong
各有千秋 ge'you'qian'qiu
各自为政 ge'zi'wei'zheng
金碧辉煌 jin'bi'hui'huang
日积月累 ri'ji'yue'lei
异想天开 yi'xiang'tian'kai
不假思索 bu'jia'si'suo
用武之地 yong'wu'zhi'di
男女平等 nan'nv'ping'deng
自相矛盾 zi'xiang'mao'dun
如影随形 ru'ying'sui'xing
打下基础 da'xia'ji'chu
剑拔弩张 jian'ba'nu'zhang
光天化日 guang'tian'hua'ri
稳扎稳打 wen'zha'wen'da
不速之客 bu'su'zhi'ke
自负盈亏 zi'fu'ying'kui
冲锋陷阵 chong'feng'xian'zhen
三三两两 san'san'liang'liang
素不相识 su'bu'xiang'shi

真心实意 zhen'xin'shi'yi
众目睽睽 zhong'mu'kui'kui

心血来潮 xin'xue'lai'chao
不可估量 bu'ke'gu'liang

所剩无几 suo'sheng'wu'ji

狂风暴雨 kuang'feng'bao'yu

扬眉吐气 yang'mei'tu'qi
来势汹汹 lai'shi'xiong'xiong
招兵买马 zhao'bing'mai'ma

投案自首 tou'an'zi'shou
纸上谈兵 zhi'shang'tan'bing
男男女女 nan'nan'nv'nv
浓墨重彩 nong'mo'zhong'cai
绰绰有余 chao'chao'you'yu
名正言顺 ming'zheng'yan'shun
逃之夭夭 tao'zhi'yao'yao
无话可说 wu'hua'ke'shuo
变废为宝 bian'fei'wei'bao
入不敷出 ru'bu'fu'chu
变幻莫测 bian'huan'mo'ce
进进出出 jin'jin'chu'chu
百思不得其解 bai'si'bu'de'qi'jie
一言一行 yi'yan'yi'xing
群雄逐鹿 qun'xiong'zhu'lu
轻举妄动 qing'ju'wang'dong
过关斩将 guo'guan'zhan'jiang
力挽狂澜 li'wan'kuang'lan

独占鳌头 du'zhan'ao'tou

大红大紫 da'hong'da'zi
当机立断 dang'ji'li'duan
独到之处 du'dao'zhi'chu
炎黄子孙 yan'huang'zi'sun

震撼人心 zhen'han'ren'xin

浑然一体 hun'ran'yi'ti
原来如此 yuan'lai'ru'ci

初出茅庐 chu'chu'mao'lu

引以为戒 yin'yi'wei'jie
真知灼见 zhen'zhi'zhuo'jian

左邻右舍 zuo'lin'you'she
团结一致 tuan'jie'yi'zhi
稍纵即逝 shao'zong'ji'shi

破釜沉舟 po'fu'chen'zhou
一飞冲天 yi'fei'chong'tian

废寝忘食 fei'qin'wang'shi
孜孜以求 zi'zi'yi'qiu
交头接耳 jiao'tou'jie'er
惴惴不安 zhui'zhui'bu'an
人去楼空 ren'qu'lou'kong
安于现状 an'yu'xian'zhuang
原封不动 yuan'feng'bu'dong
灯火辉煌 deng'huo'hui'huang
负债累累 fu'zhai'lei'lei
险象环生 xian'xiang'huan'sheng
矢志不渝 shi'zhi'bu'yu
天高地厚 tian'gao'di'hou
杀气腾腾 sha'qi'teng'teng
含辛茹苦 han'xin'ru'ku
费尽心机 fei'jin'xin'ji
掩人耳目 yan'ren'er'mu
良苦用心 liang'ku'yong'xin
礼尚往来 li'shang'wang'lai
始料不及 shi'liao'bu'ji
功夫不负有心人 gong'fu'bu'fu'you'xin'ren
忘乎所以 wang'hu'suo'yi
大做文章 da'zuo'wen'zhang
永垂不朽 yong'chui'bu'xiu
一纸空文 yi'zhi'kong'wen
胡作非为 hu'zuo'fei'wei
迅雷不及掩耳 xun'lei'bu'ji'yan'er
充耳不闻 chong'er'bu'wen
安营扎寨 an'ying'zha'zhai
轻装上阵 qing'zhuang''zhen
真才实学 zhen'cai'shi'xue
相形见绌 xiang'xing'jian'chu
鳞次栉比 lin'ci'zhi'bi
重整旗鼓 zhong'zheng'qi'gu
得意洋洋 de'yi'yang'yang
文质彬彬 wen'zhi'bin'bin
血雨腥风 xue'yu'xing'feng
花团锦簇 hua'tuan'jin'cu
开源节流 kai'yuan'jie'liu
鹤立鸡群 he'li'ji'qun
治病救人 zhi'bing'jiu'ren
大获全胜 da'huo'quan'sheng
落花流水 luo'hua'liu'shui
赤手空拳 chi'shou'kong'quan
乘胜追击 cheng'sheng'zhui'ji
蜻蜓点水 qing'ting'dian'shui
奔走相告 ben'zou'xiang'gao
渐行渐远 jian'xing'jian'yuan
步履维艰 bu'lv'wei'jian
动荡不安 dong'dang'bu'an
大兴土木 da'xing'tu'mu
三更半夜 san'geng'ban'ye
道听途说 dao'ting'tu'shuo
风声鹤唳 feng'sheng'he'li
麻木不仁 ma'mu'bu'ren
土崩瓦解 tu'beng'wa'jie
雾里看花 wu'li'kan'hua
腰缠万贯 yao'chan'wan'guan
桀骜不驯 jie'ao'bu'xun
千头万绪 qian'tou'wan'xu
前仆后继 qian'pu'hou'ji
不苟言笑 bu'gou'yan'xiao
亦步亦趋 yi'bu'yi'qu
乌烟瘴气 wu'yan'zhang'qi
先睹为快 xian'du'wei'kuai
星星之火 xing'xing'zhi'huo
瞒天过海 man'tian'guo'hai
通情达理 tong'qing'da'li
门庭若市 men'ting'ruo'shi
繁荣富强 fan'rong'fu'qiang
先入为主 xian'ru'wei'zhu
开天辟地 kai'tian'pi'di
声情并茂 sheng'qing'bing'mao
朴实无华 pu'shi'wu'hua
有生以来 you'sheng'yi'lai
循规蹈矩 xun'gui'dao'ju
心有灵犀 xin'you'ling'xi
身经百战 shen'jing'bai'zhan
念念有词 nian'nian'you'ci
担惊受怕 dan'jing'shou'pa
合二为一 he'er'wei'yi
粗言秽语 cu'yan'hui'yu
毛遂自荐 mao'sui'zi'jian
说不过去 shuo'bu'guo'qu
怒气冲冲 nu'qi'chong'chong
席地而坐 xi'di'er'zuo
斗志昂扬 dou'zhi'ang'yang
祸不单行 huo'bu'dan'xing
花枝招展 hua'zhi'zhao'zhan
循循善诱 xun'xun'shan'you
辗转反侧 nian'zhuan'fan'ce
感激不尽 gan'ji'bu'jin
生老病死 sheng'lao'bing'si
独辟蹊径 du'pi'qi'jing
获益匪浅 huo'yi'fei'qian
过目不忘 guo'mu'bu'wang
相夫教子 xiang'fu'jiao'zi
远见卓识 yuan'jian'zhuo'shi
望眼欲穿 wang'yan'yu'chuan
大政方针 da'zheng'fang'zhen
简单明了 jian'dan'ming'le
头晕目眩 tou'yun'mu'xuan
大快人心 da'kuai'ren'xin
终身大事 zhong'shen'da'shi
九死一生 jiu'si'yi'sheng
忽冷忽热 hu'leng'hu're
倾盆大雨 qing'pen'da'yu
得过且过 de'guo'qie'guo
开诚布公 kai'cheng'bu'gong
量体裁衣 liang'ti'cai'yi
新鲜血液 xin'xian'xue'ye
振振有词 zhen'zhen'you'ci
憨态可掬 han'tai'ke'ju
寿终正寝 shou'zhong'zheng'qin
网开一面 wang'kai'yi'mian
各有所长 ge'you'suo'zhang
多事之秋 duo'shi'zhi'qiu
万紫千红 wan'zi'qian'hong
雨过天晴 yu'guo'tian'qing
时不我待 shi'bu'wo'dai
笑容满面 xiao'rong'man'mian
残缺不全 can'que'bu'quan
窈窕淑女 yao'tiao'shu'nv
必争之地 bi'zheng'zhi'di
无论何时 wu'lun'he'shi
东窗事发 dong'chuang''fa
化整为零 hua'zheng'wei'ling
门可罗雀 men'ke'luo'que
打击报复 da'ji'bao'fu
站不住脚 zhan'bu'zhu'jiao
惨绝人寰 can'jue'ren'huan
七零八落 qi'ling'ba'luo
悲痛欲绝 bei'tong'yu'jue
雷打不动 lei'da'bu'dong
分崩离析 fen'beng'li'xi
信口开河 xin'kou'kai'he
里里外外 li'li'wai'wai
出人头地 chu'ren'tou'di
深入细致 shen'ru'xi'zhi
死记硬背 si'ji'ying'bei
反客为主 fan'ke'wei'zhu
无力回天 wu'li'hui'tian
庐山真面目 lu'shan'zhen'mian'mu
名符其实 ming'fu'qi'shi
名存实亡 ming'cun'shi'wang
倾国倾城 qing'guo'qing'cheng
独来独往 du'lai'du'wang
哭哭啼啼 ku'ku'ti'ti
郑重其事 zheng'zhong'qi'shi
开足马力 kai'zu'ma'li
言谈举止 yan'tan'ju'zhi
难以启齿 nan'yi'qi'chi
纵横天下 zong'heng'tian'xia
约法三章 yue'fa'san'zhang
信手拈来 xin'shou'nian'lai
后会无期 hou'hui'wu'qi
朝思暮想 chao'si'mu'xiang
粗心大意 cu'xin'da'yi
喜上眉梢 xi'shang'mei'shao
千真万确 qian'zhen'wan'que
每时每刻 mei'shi'mei'ke
山珍海味 shan'zhen'hai'wei
闪闪发光 shan'shan'fa'guang
不痛不痒 bu'tong'bu'yang
劳逸结合 lao'yi'jie'he
五体投地 wu'ti'tou'di
一声不吭 yi'sheng'bu'keng
大喊大叫 da'han'da'jiao
硝烟弥漫 xiao'yan'mi'man
无奇不有 wu'qi'bu'you
一贫如洗 yi'pin'ru'xi
民以食为天 min'yi'shi'wei'tian
大庭广众 da'ting'guang'zhong
荷枪实弹 he'qiang'shi'dan
掌声雷动 zhang'sheng'lei'dong
枪林弹雨 qiang'lin'dan'yu
大手大脚 da'shou'da'jiao
红极一时 hong'ji'yi'shi
至理名言 zhi'li'ming'yan
妖魔鬼怪 yao'mo'gui'guai
韬光养晦 tao'guang'yang'hui
多如牛毛 duo'ru'niu'mao
点石成金 dian'shi'cheng'jin
无可非议 wu'ke'fei'yi
待人接物 dai'ren'jie'wu
无所顾忌 wu'suo'gu'ji
翻云覆雨 fan'yun'fu'yu
无功而返 wu'gong'er'fan
束手就擒 shu'shou'jiu'qin
交口称赞 jiao'kou'cheng'zan
空头支票 kong'tou'zhi'piao
屡教不改 lv'jiao'bu'gai
如坐针毡 ru'zuo'zhen'zhan
来历不明 lai'li'bu'ming
难兄难弟 nan'xiong'nan'di
改朝换代 gai'chao'huan'dai
笑逐颜开 xiao'zhu'yan'kai
铿锵有力 keng'qiang'you'li
大声疾呼 da'sheng'ji'hu
略胜一筹 e'sheng'yi'chou
入木三分 ru'mu'san'fen
此情此景 ci'qing'ci'jing
百里挑一 bai'li'tiao'yi
轻车熟路 qing'che'shu'lu
原原本本 yuan'yuan'ben'ben
漫天要价 man'tian'yao'jia
声泪俱下 sheng'lei'ju'xia
货比三家 huo'bi'san'jia
大公无私 da'gong'wu'si
凶神恶煞 xiong'shen'e'sha
洪水猛兽 hong'shui'meng'shou
大惑不解 da'huo'bu'jie
远走高飞 yuan'zou'gao'fei
保家卫国 bao'jia'wei'guo
无价之宝 wu'jia'zhi'bao
囤积居奇 dun'ji'ju'qi
呼朋唤友 hu'peng'huan'you
殊途同归 shu'tu'tong'gui
唇枪舌剑 chun'qiang'she'jian
万事俱备 wan'shi'ju'bei
起早贪黑 qi'zao'tan'hei
不冷不热 bu'leng'bu're
美其名曰 mei'qi'ming'yue
打情骂俏 da'qing'ma'qiao
捷报频传 jie'bao'pin'chuan
齐天大圣 qi'tian'da'sheng
浑水摸鱼 hun'shui'mo'yu
以此类推 yi'ci'lei'tui
五彩斑斓 wu'cai'ban'lan
石沉大海 shi'chen'da'hai
投机倒把 tou'ji'dao'ba
误入歧途 wu'ru'qi'tu
多此一举 duo'ci'yi'ju
双喜临门 shuangxi'xi'lin'men
例行公事 li'xing'gong'shi
蹦蹦跳跳 beng'beng'tiao'tiao
忘恩负义 wang'en'fu'yi
垂涎欲滴 chui'xian'yu'di
早出晚归 zao'chu'wan'gui
身败名裂 shen'bai'ming'lie
声名鹊起 sheng'ming'que'qi
情有可原 qing'you'ke'yuan
留有余地 liu'you'yu'di
大喜过望 da'xi'guo'wang
技高一筹 ji'gao'yi'chou
是是非非 shi'shi'fei'fei
活泼可爱 huo'po'ke'ai
年代久远 nian'dai'jiu'yuan
三番五次 san'fan'wu'ci
不止一次 bu'zhi'yi'ci
莫衷一是 mo'zhong'yi'shi
披荆斩棘 pi'jing'zhan'ji
说到做到 shuo'dao'zuo'dao
难解难分 nan'jie'nan'fen
通俗易懂 tong'su'yi'dong
暴风骤雨 bao'feng'zhou'yu
急中生智 ji'zhong'sheng'zhi
囊中羞涩 nang'zhong'xiu'se
呐喊助威 ne'han'zhu'wei
灵活多样 ling'huo'duo'yang
光怪陆离 guang'guai'lu'li
手无寸铁 shou'wu'cun'tie
经久不衰 jing'jiu'bu'shuai
跃然纸上 yue'ran'zhi'shang
趋利避害 qu'li'bi'hai
晃晃悠悠 huang'huang'you'you
切切实实 qie'qie'shi'shi
横七竖八 heng'qi'shu'ba
依山傍水 yi'shan'bang'shui
各自为战 ge'zi'wei'zhan
昭然若揭 zhao'ran'ruo'jie
截然相反 jie'ran'xiang'fan
确确实实 que'que'shi'shi
痴人说梦 chi'ren'shuo'meng
其貌不扬 qi'mao'bu'yang
生儿育女 sheng'r'yu'nv
娇生惯养 jiao'sheng'guan'yang
分一杯羹 fen'yi'bei'geng
反其道而行之 fan'qi'dao'er'xing'zhi
不思进取 bu'si'jin'qu
冷暖自知 leng'nuan'zi'zhi
委曲求全 wei'qu'qiu'quan
后悔莫及 hou'hui'mo'ji
以偏概全 yi'pian'gai'quan
骂骂咧咧 ma'ma'lie'lie
吹毛求疵 chui'mao'qiu'ci
人尽其才 ren'jin'qi'cai
数罪并罚 shu'zui'bing'fa
浓妆艳抹 nong'zhuangyan'yan'mo
无关痛痒 wu'guan'tong'yang
害群之马 hai'qun'zhi'ma
置身事外 zhi'shen'shi'wai
肝胆相照 gan'dan'xiang'zhao
游手好闲 you'shou'hao'xian
中西合璧 zhong'xi'he'bi
强身健体 qiang'shen'jian'ti
平心静气 ping'xin'jing'qi
空前绝后 kong'qian'jue'hou
莫明其妙 mo'ming'qi'miao
三言两语 san'yan'liang'yu
妙不可言 miao'bu'ke'yan
墨守成规 mo'shou'cheng'gui
一去不返 yi'qu'bu'fan
举世无双 ju'shi'wu'shuang
返璞归真 fan'pu'gui'zhen
拿手好戏 na'shou'hao'xi
心有余而力不足 xin'you'yu'er'li'bu'zu
老弱病残 lao'ruo'bing'can
不无道理 bu'wu'dao'li
白头到老 bai'tou'dao'lao
率先垂范 lv'xian'chui'fan
息事宁人 xi'shi'ning'ren
入乡随俗 ru'xiang'sui'su
正人君子 zheng'ren'jun'zi
心狠手辣 xin'hen'shou'la
无言以对 wu'yan'yi'dui
山穷水尽 shan'qiong'shui'jin
磕磕绊绊 ke'ke'ban'ban
心路历程 xin'lu'li'cheng
昏昏沉沉 hun'hun'chen'chen
奇形怪状 qi'xing'guai'zhuang
情投意合 qing'tou'yi'he
不得已而为之 bu'de'yi'er'wei'zhi
翻江倒海 fan'jiang'dao'hai
嬉皮笑脸 xi'pi'xiao'lian
风景如画 feng'jing'ru'hua
夸夸其谈 kua'kua'qi'tan
一览无遗 yi'lan'wu'yi
无边无际 wu'bian'wu'ji
精雕细琢 jing'diao'xi'zuo
抛砖引玉 pao'zhuan'yin'yu
不可限量 bu'ke'xian'liang
通风报信 tong'feng'bao'xin
遥不可及 yao'bu'ke'ji
诚惶诚恐 cheng'huang'cheng'kong
登堂入室 deng'tang'ru'shi
疑神疑鬼 yi'shen'yi'gui
一笑置之 yi'xiao'zhi'zhi
大大方方 da'da'fang'fang
乐在其中 le'zai'qi'zhong
不着边际 bu'zhe'bian'ji
左右逢源 zuo'you'feng'yuan
不惑之年 bu'huo'zhi'nian
萍水相逢 ping'shui'xiang'feng
任人宰割 ren'ren'zai'ge
有板有眼 you'ban'you'yan
环境恶化 huan'jing'e'hua
龙争虎斗 long'zheng'hu'dou
养家糊口 yang'jia'hu'kou
心悦诚服 xin'yue'cheng'fu
人杰地灵 ren'jie'di'ling
打道回府 da'dao'hui'fu
腥风血雨 xing'feng'xue'yu
顶头上司 ding'tou'shang'si
招摇过市 zhao'yao'guo'shi
冒名顶替 mao'ming'ding'ti
有鉴于此 you'jian'yu'ci
闻风而动 wen'feng'er'dong
金榜题名 jin'bang'ti'ming
阴谋诡计 yin'mou'gui'ji
人之常情 ren'zhi'chang'qing
受制于人 shou'zhi'yu'ren
安家落户 an'jia'luo'hu
当头一棒 dang'tou'yi'bang
寸步不离 cun'bu'bu'li
罗曼蒂克 luo'man'di'ke
神采飞扬 shen'cai'fei'yang
能歌善舞 neng'ge'shan'wu
大风大浪 da'feng'da'lang
简而言之 jian'er'yan'zhi
雅俗共赏 ya'su'gong'shang
甜甜蜜蜜 tian'tian'mi'mi
取之不尽 qu'zhi'bu'jin
已成定局 yi'cheng'ding'ju
盛况空前 sheng'kuang'kong'qian
病入膏肓 bing'ru'gao'huang
就地取材 jiu'di'qu'cai
稀里哗啦 xi'li'hua'la
推心置腹 tui'xin'zhi'fu
牵肠挂肚 qian'chang'gua'du
平安无事 ping'an'wu'shi
见利忘义 jian'li'wang'yi
锋芒毕露 feng'mang'bi'lu
招架不住 zhao'jia'bu'zhu
好事多磨 hao'shi'duo'mo
分工合作 fen'gong'he'zuo
日臻完善 ri'zhen'wan'shan
鱼米之乡 yu'mi'zhi'xiang
深情厚谊 shen'qing'hou'yi
长年累月 zhang'nian'lei'yue
赴汤蹈火 fu'tang'dao'huo
捧腹大笑 peng'fu'da'xiao
由浅入深 you'qian'ru'shen
大动干戈 da'dong'gan'ge
将心比心 jiang'xin'bi'xin
经久不息 jing'jiu'bu'xi
催人奋进 cui'ren'fen'jin
不知去向 bu'zhi'qu'xiang
金蝉脱壳 jin'chan'tuo'ke
故弄玄虚 gu'nong'xuan'xu
临危不惧 lin'wei'bu'ju
后继有人 hou'ji'you'ren
冥冥之中 ming'ming'zhi'zhong
海枯石烂 hai'ku'shi'lan
闭门造车 bi'men'zao'che
瞻前顾后 zhan'qian'gu'hou
封山育林 feng'shan'yu'lin
不辞而别 bu'ci'er'bie
拥军优属 yong'jun'you'shu
四平八稳 si'ping'ba'wen
水乳交融 shui'ru'jiao'rong
德艺双馨 de'yi'shuangxin'xin
国泰民安 guo'tai'min'an
陷入僵局 xian'ru'jiang'ju
坐享其成 zuo'xiang'qi'cheng
如梦初醒 ru'meng'chu'xing
愁眉不展 chou'mei'bu'zhan
拐弯抹角 guai'wan'mo'jiao
霸王别姬 ba'wang'bie'ji
另起炉灶 ling'qi'lu'zao
七上八下 qi'shang'ba'xia
朦朦胧胧 meng'meng'long'long
强弩之末 qiang'nu'zhi'mo
楼堂馆所 lou'tang'guan'suo
自由竞争 zi'you'jing'zheng
铩羽而归 sha'yu'er'gui
殚精竭虑 dan'jing'jie'lv
天时地利人和 tian'shi'di'li'ren'he
巧立名目 qiao'li'ming'mu
令人鼓舞 ling'ren'gu'wu
非同一般 fei'tong'yi'ban
束之高阁 shu'zhi'gao'ge
万般无奈 wan'ban'wu'nai
孤军奋战 gu'jun'fen'zhan
摧枯拉朽 cui'ku'la'xiu
民不聊生 min'bu'liao'sheng
唉声叹气 ai'sheng'tan'qi
不近人情 bu'jin'ren'qing
垂涎三尺 chui'xian'san'chi
摇旗呐喊 yao'qi'ne'han
天道酬勤 tian'dao'chou'qin
精兵强将 jing'bing'qiang'jiang
养生之道 yang'sheng'zhi'dao
毫不逊色 hao'bu'xun'se
只言片语 zhi'yan'pian'yu
百战百胜 bai'zhan'bai'sheng
汹涌澎湃 xiong'yong'peng'pai
调兵遣将 diao'bing'qian'jiang
假以时日 jia'yi'shi'ri
穷追不舍 qiong'zhui'bu'she
反复无常 fan'fu'wu'chang
蹑手蹑脚 nie'shou'nie'jiao
趾高气扬 zhi'gao'qi'yang
绘声绘色 hui'sheng'hui'se
不虚此行 bu'xu'ci'xing
临危受命 lin'wei'shou'ming
摇摆不定 yao'bai'bu'ding
坚忍不拔 jian'ren'bu'ba
洋洋洒洒 yang'yang'sa'sa
真真假假 zhen'zhen'jia'jia
银装素裹 yin'zhuang''guo
可怜巴巴 ke'lian'ba'ba
枝繁叶茂 zhi'fan'ye'mao
攻城略地 gong'cheng'e'di
两手空空 liang'shou'kong'kong
不义之财 bu'yi'zhi'cai
闻风丧胆 wen'feng'sang'dan
天旋地转 tian'xuan'di'zhuan
事倍功半 shi'bei'gong'ban
难言之隐 nan'yan'zhi'yin
滴水不漏 di'shui'bu'lou
先拔头筹 xian'ba'tou'chou
胆大妄为 dan'da'wang'wei
亭台楼阁 ting'tai'lou'ge
唯唯诺诺 wei'wei'nuo'nuo
风情万种 feng'qing'wan'zhong
万劫不复 wan'jie'bu'fu
循环往复 xun'huan'wang'fu
首战告捷 shou'zhan'gao'jie
无从下手 wu'cong'xia'shou
放荡不羁 fang'dang'bu'ji
血流成河 xue'liu'cheng'he
善始善终 shan'shi'shan'zhong
无依无靠 wu'yi'wu'kao
深更半夜 shen'geng'ban'ye
长命百岁 zhang'ming'bai'sui
固步自封 gu'bu'zi'feng
神不知鬼不觉 shen'bu'zhi'gui'bu'jue
悠然自得 you'ran'zi'de
凡夫俗子 fan'fu'su'zi
冤假错案 yuan'jia'cuo'an
骑虎难下 qi'hu'nan'xia
铜墙铁壁 tong'qiang'tie'bi
摸着石头过河 mo'zhe'shi'tou'guo'he
科班出身 ke'ban'chu'shen
增收节支 zeng'shou'jie'zhi
紧要关头 jin'yao'guan'tou
生死攸关 sheng'si'you'guan
换汤不换药 huan'tang'bu'huan'yao
养尊处优 yang'zun'chu'you
从今以后 cong'jin'yi'hou
一瘸一拐 yi'que'yi'guai
褒贬不一 bao'bian'bu'yi
尽人皆知 jin'ren'jie'zhi
沉默不语 chen'mo'bu'yu
康庄大道 kang'zhuang''dao
势不两立 shi'bu'liang'li
繁花似锦 fan'hua'shi'jin
招摇撞骗 zhao'yao'zhuangpian'pian
各得其所 ge'de'qi'suo
名不副实 ming'bu'fu'shi
裹足不前 guo'zu'bu'qian
洁身自好 jie'shen'zi'hao
其乐无穷 qi'le'wu'qiong
徒劳无功 tu'lao'wu'gong
文房四宝 wen'fang'si'bao
偷梁换柱 tou'liang'huan'zhu
在天之灵 zai'tian'zhi'ling
麻痹大意 ma'bi'da'yi
一草一木 yi'cao'yi'mu
兵不血刃 bing'bu'xue'ren
弱肉强食 ruo'rou'qiang'shi
速度滑冰 su'du'hua'bing
结结巴巴 jie'jie'ba'ba
花天酒地 hua'tian'jiu'di
不可战胜 bu'ke'zhan'sheng
鹿死谁手 lu'si'shui'shou
随叫随到 sui'jiao'sui'dao
神来之笔 shen'lai'zhi'bi
不进则退 bu'jin'ze'tui
小家碧玉 xiao'jia'bi'yu
千锤百炼 qian'chui'bai'lian
大不相同 da'bu'xiang'tong
生机盎然 sheng'ji'ang'ran
正襟危坐 zheng'jin'wei'zuo
风马牛不相及 feng'ma'niu'bu'xiang'ji
正大光明 zheng'da'guang'ming
济济一堂 ji'ji'yi'tang
饥寒交迫 ji'han'jiao'po
妙语连珠 miao'yu'lian'zhu
苦尽甘来 ku'jin'gan'lai
琴棋书画 qin'qi'shu'hua
深谋远虑 shen'mou'yuan'lv
一哄而上 yi'hong'er'shang
和盘托出 he'pan'tuo'chu
咎由自取 jiu'you'zi'qu
察言观色 cha'yan'guan'se
死于非命 si'yu'fei'ming
落实到位 luo'shi'dao'wei
幸免于难 xing'mian'yu'nan
步调一致 bu'diao'yi'zhi
心灵手巧 xin'ling'shou'qiao
空空荡荡 kong'kong'dang'dang
哭丧着脸 ku'sang'zhe'lian
眼见为实 yan'jian'wei'shi
投其所好 tou'qi'suo'hao
前途无量 qian'tu'wu'liang
孤家寡人 gu'jia'gua'ren
自圆其说 zi'yuan'qi'shuo
漂漂亮亮 piao'piao'liang'liang
妄自菲薄 wang'zi'fei'bao
百年好合 bai'nian'hao'he
固若金汤 gu'ruo'jin'tang
悬崖勒马 xuan'ya'lei'ma
龙飞凤舞 long'fei'feng'wu
苟延残喘 gou'yan'can'chuan
舍近求远 she'jin'qiu'yuan
患难与共 huan'nan'yu'gong
艰苦朴素 jian'ku'pu'su
因噎废食 yin'ye'fei'shi
愤世嫉俗 fen'shi'ji'su
为时尚早 wei'shi'shang'zao
认真落实 ren'zhen'luo'shi
指名道姓 zhi'ming'dao'xing
层次分明 ceng'ci'fen'ming
婆婆妈妈 po'po'ma'ma
积重难返 ji'zhong'nan'fan
摸不着头脑 mo'bu'zhe'tou'nao
老谋深算 lao'mou'shen'suan
退避三舍 tui'bi'san'she
打得火热 da'de'huo're
身强力壮 shen'qiang'li'zhuang
言不由衷 yan'bu'you'zhong
同流合污 tong'liu'he'wu
华灯初上 hua'deng'chu'shang
灯火通明 deng'huo'tong'ming
壮士断腕 zhuang''duan'wan
蒙混过关 meng'hun'guo'guan
见死不救 jian'si'bu'jiu
变化无常 bian'hua'wu'chang
泪如雨下 lei'ru'yu'xia
好吃懒做 hao'chi'lan'zuo
事无巨细 shi'wu'ju'xi
相见恨晚 xiang'jian'hen'wan
谨小慎微 jin'xiao'shen'wei
姹紫嫣红 cha'zi'yan'hong
十万火急 shi'wan'huo'ji
嚎啕大哭 hao'tao'da'ku
眉清目秀 mei'qing'mu'xiu
厚此薄彼 hou'ci'bao'bi
言过其实 yan'guo'qi'shi
敲锣打鼓 qiao'luo'da'gu
宠辱不惊 chong'ru'bu'jing
顺水推舟 shun'shui'tui'zhou
朗朗上口 lang'lang'shang'kou
不拘小节 bu'ju'xiao'jie
惨无人道 can'wu'ren'dao
汪洋大海 wang'yang'da'hai
一以贯之 yi'yi'guan'zhi
防微杜渐 fang'wei'du'jian
好人好事 hao'ren'hao'shi
一言九鼎 yi'yan'jiu'ding
龙腾虎跃 long'teng'hu'yue
星星点点 xing'xing'dian'dian
听之任之 ting'zhi'ren'zhi
多快好省 duo'kuai'hao'sheng
九牛二虎之力 jiu'niu'er'hu'zhi'li
明辨是非 ming'bian'shi'fei
合不拢嘴 he'bu'long'zui
作壁上观 zuo'bi'shang'guan
为非作歹 wei'fei'zuo'dai
忍痛割爱 ren'tong'ge'ai
尊老爱幼 zun'lao'ai'you
不修边幅 bu'xiu'bian'fu
人迹罕至 ren'ji'han'zhi
后发制人 hou'fa'zhi'ren
重见天日 zhong'jian'tian'ri
精疲力尽 jing'pi'li'jin
言之凿凿 yan'zhi'zao'zao
大雅之堂 da'ya'zhi'tang
老当益壮 lao'dang'yi'zhuang
宾至如归 bin'zhi'ru'gui
颠沛流离 dian'pei'liu'li
能工巧匠 neng'gong'qiao'jiang
天时地利 tian'shi'di'li
因循守旧 yin'xun'shou'jiu
有备无患 you'bei'wu'huan
有名无实 you'ming'wu'shi
夺眶而出 duo'kuang'er'chu
公之于众 gong'zhi'yu'zhong
十之八九 shi'zhi'ba'jiu
突然袭击 tu'ran'xi'ji
志存高远 zhi'cun'gao'yuan
天南海北 tian'nan'hai'bei
一口咬定 yi'kou'yao'ding
岂有此理 qi'you'ci'li
普天同庆 pu'tian'tong'qing
寻寻觅觅 xun'xun'mi'mi
如饥似渴 ru'ji'shi'ke
看家本领 kan'jia'ben'ling
春风化雨 chun'feng'hua'yu
三心二意 san'xin'er'yi
笑口常开 xiao'kou'chang'kai
口干舌燥 kou'gan'she'zao
动人心魄 dong'ren'xin'po
方便之门 fang'bian'zhi'men
不尽人意 bu'jin'ren'yi
一文不值 yi'wen'bu'zhi
驰名中外 chi'ming'zhong'wai
不费吹灰之力 bu'fei'chui'hui'zhi'li
顺手牵羊 shun'shou'qian'yang
柔情似水 rou'qing'shi'shui
绝处逢生 jue'chu'feng'sheng
语焉不详 yu'yan'bu'xiang
能上能下 neng'shang'neng'xia
泾渭分明 jing'wei'fen'ming
戒骄戒躁 jie'jiao'jie'zao
三思而后行 san'si'er'hou'xing
南征北战 nan'zheng'bei'zhan
修身养性 xiu'shen'yang'xing
掩耳盗铃 yan'er'dao'ling
拂袖而去 fu'xiu'er'qu
重于泰山 zhong'yu'tai'shan
移风易俗 yi'feng'yi'su
婀娜多姿 e'na'duo'zi
错失良机 cuo'shi'liang'ji
同仇敌忾 tong'chou'di'kai
心直口快 xin'zhi'kou'kuai
挥金如土 hui'jin'ru'tu
恨之入骨 hen'zhi'ru'gu
专款专用 zhuan'kuan'zhuan'yong
不时之需 bu'shi'zhi'xu
提出异议 ti'chu'yi'yi
不食人间烟火 bu'shi'ren'jian'yan'huo
万人空巷 wan'ren'kong'xiang
天生一对 tian'sheng'yi'dui
言听计从 yan'ting'ji'cong
鼓足干劲 gu'zu'gan'jin
唯利是图 wei'li'shi'tu
翘首以待 qiao'shou'yi'dai
小巫见大巫 xiao'wu'jian'da'wu
天罗地网 tian'luo'di'wang
丰衣足食 feng'yi'zu'shi
锣鼓喧天 luo'gu'xuan'tian
咬文嚼字 yao'wen'jue'zi
心如刀割 xin'ru'dao'ge
一五一十 yi'wu'yi'shi
兴师动众 xing'shi'dong'zhong
答非所问 da'fei'suo'wen
歪歪扭扭 wai'wai'niu'niu

不远千里 bu'yuan'qian'li
没头没脑 mei'tou'mei'nao

天上人间 tian'shang'ren'jian

不尽相同 bu'jin'xiang'tong

跋山涉水 ba'shan'she'shui
正本清源 zheng'ben'qing'yuan

反目成仇 fan'mu'cheng'chou
各就各位 ge'jiu'ge'wei
如意算盘 ru'yi'suan'pan

无可奉告 wu'ke'feng'gao

有模有样 you'mo'you'yang
难以形容 nan'yi'xing'rong

引经据典 yin'jing'ju'dian
才子佳人 cai'zi'jia'ren

盛极一时 sheng'ji'yi'shi
不战而胜 bu'zhan'er'sheng
好说歹说 hao'shuo'dai'shuo
各尽所能 ge'jin'suo'neng
广阔天地 guang'kuo'tian'di
左思右想 zuo'si'you'xiang
严峻考验 yan'jun'kao'yan
饱经风霜 bao'jing'feng'shuang
肝肠寸断 gan'chang'cun'duan
推而广之 tui'er'guang'zhi
饮水思源 yin'shui'si'yuan
童言无忌 tong'yan'wu'ji
岁月不饶人 sui'yue'bu'rao'ren
从头至尾 cong'tou'zhi'wei
为人父母 wei'ren'fu'mu
后生可畏 hou'sheng'ke'wei
能屈能伸 neng'qu'neng'shen
暴殄天物 bao'tian'tian'wu
三权分立 san'quan'fen'li
知法犯法 zhi'fa'fan'fa
如醉如痴 ru'zui'ru'chi
童心未泯 tong'xin'wei'min
破镜重圆 po'jing'zhong'yuan
虎虎生威 hu'hu'sheng'wei
恩爱夫妻 en'ai'fu'qi
一腔热血 yi'qiang're'xue
学无止境 xue'wu'zhi'jing
左右摇摆 zuo'you'yao'bai
急不可耐 ji'bu'ke'nai
哀鸿遍野 ai'hong'bian'ye
衣衫褴褛 yi'shan'lan'lv
散兵游勇 san'bing'you'yong
深居简出 shen'ju'jian'chu
三六九等 san'liu'jiu'deng
赤膊上阵 chi'bo'shang'zhen
三寸之舌 san'cun'zhi'she
不乏其人 bu'fa'qi'ren
小家子气 xiao'jia'zi'qi
合而为一 he'er'wei'yi
魂牵梦萦 hun'qian'meng'ying
以柔克刚 yi'rou'ke'gang
鬼哭狼嚎 gui'ku'lang'hao
重新做人 zhong'xin'zuo'ren
转眼之间 zhuan'yan'zhi'jian
笑里藏刀 xiao'li'cang'dao
地久天长 di'jiu'tian'zhang
五音不全 wu'yin'bu'quan
忠贞不渝 zhong'zhen'bu'yu
装疯卖傻 zhuang''mai'sha
人生在世 ren'sheng'zai'shi
偷天换日 tou'tian'huan'ri
文责自负 wen'ze'zi'fu
缘木求鱼 yuan'mu'qiu'yu
满脸通红 man'lian'tong'hong
突发奇想 tu'fa'qi'xiang
诡计多端 gui'ji'duo'duan
今生今世 jin'sheng'jin'shi
变化莫测 bian'hua'mo'ce
浓眉大眼 nong'mei'da'yan
做贼心虚 zuo'zei'xin'xu
心高气傲 xin'gao'qi'ao
路人皆知 lu'ren'jie'zhi
尽在不言中 jin'zai'bu'yan'zhong
千金小姐 qian'jin'xiao'jie
阴魂不散 yin'hun'bu'san
你一言我一语 ni'yi'yan'wo'yi'yu
促膝谈心 cu'xi'tan'xin
寒冬腊月 han'dong'la'yue
下不了台 xia'bu'le'tai
天崩地裂 tian'beng'di'lie
欺人太甚 qi'ren'tai'shen
万象更新 wan'xiang'geng'xin
徇私枉法 xun'si'wang'fa
有情有义 you'qing'you'yi
落叶归根 luo'ye'gui'gen
心仪已久 xin'yi'yi'jiu
女扮男装 nv'ban'nan'zhuang
头昏眼花 tou'hun'yan'hua
一哄而散 yi'hong'er'san
重振雄风 zhong'zhen'xiong'feng
瘦骨嶙峋 shou'gu'lin'xun
暗度陈仓 an'du'chen'cang
擦亮眼睛 ca'liang'yan'jing
隔岸观火 ge'an'guan'huo
前呼后拥 qian'hu'hou'yong
虚怀若谷 xu'huai'ruo'gu
绿水青山 lv'shui'qing'shan
东奔西走 dong'ben'xi'zou
响彻云霄 xiang'che'yun'xiao
狐朋狗友 hu'peng'gou'you
窗明几净 chuang''ji'jing
止步不前 zhi'bu'bu'qian
一而再再而三 yi'er'zai'zai'er'san
冲昏头脑 chong'hun'tou'nao
以小见大 yi'xiao'jian'da
叮叮当当 ding'ding'dang'dang
与子偕老 yu'zi'xie'lao
指点江山 zhi'dian'jiang'shan
别无他法 bie'wu'ta'fa
匠心独具 jiang'xin'du'ju
过河拆桥 guo'he'chai'qiao
瓜熟蒂落 gua'shu'di'luo
改弦更张 gai'xian'geng'zhang
精兵简政 jing'bing'jian'zheng
冤家路窄 yuan'jia'lu'zhai
伸张正义 shen'zhang'zheng'yi
帝王将相 di'wang'jiang'xiang
确有其事 que'you'qi'shi
班门弄斧 ban'men'nong'fu
一唱一和 yi'chang'yi'he
沧海一粟 cang'hai'yi'su
仰天大笑 yang'tian'da'xiao
误人子弟 wu'ren'zi'di
神经兮兮 shen'jing'xi'xi
病从口入 bing'cong'kou'ru

低人一等 di'ren'yi'deng
头昏脑胀 tou'hun'nao'zhang
含糊不清 han'hu'bu'qing
以毒攻毒 yi'du'gong'du
天作之合 tian'zuo'zhi'he
完美无瑕 wan'mei'wu'xia

放眼世界 fang'yan'shi'jie
谈古论今 tan'gu'lun'jin
声名狼藉 sheng'ming'lang'ji

一相情愿 yi'xiang'qing'yuan

眼明手快 yan'ming'shou'kuai
三教九流 san'jiao'jiu'liu
自鸣得意 zi'ming'de'yi
唏嘘不已 xi'xu'bu'yi
又红又专 you'hong'you'zhuan
寄人篱下 ji'ren'li'xia
择优录取 ze'you'lu'qu

囊中之物 nang'zhong'zhi'wu
怀才不遇 huai'cai'bu'yu
难以企及 nan'yi'qi'ji
铁板一块 tie'ban'yi'kuai
儿女情长 r'nv'qing'zhang
下有对策 xia'you'dui'ce
谦谦君子 qian'qian'jun'zi
博览群书 bo'lan'qun'shu
心浮气躁 xin'fu'qi'zao
低三下四 di'san'xia'si
虚虚实实 xu'xu'shi'shi
行行出状元 xing'xing'chu'zhuang'
旭日东升 xu'ri'dong'sheng
莫测高深 mo'ce'gao'shen
言多必失 yan'duo'bi'shi
超凡脱俗 chao'fan'tuo'su
久别重逢 jiu'bie'zhong'feng
伸手不见五指 shen'shou'bu'jian'wu'zhi
古已有之 gu'yi'you'zhi
刚正不阿 gang'zheng'bu'a
诸子百家 zhu'zi'bai'jia
洋为中用 yang'wei'zhong'yong
展翅高飞 zhan'chi'gao'fei
将功补过 jiang'gong'bu'guo
毫不相干 hao'bu'xiang'gan
两肋插刀 liang'le'cha'dao
负担过重 fu'dan'guo'zhong
混世魔王 hun'shi'mo'wang
闭一只眼 bi'yi'zhi'yan
文人墨客 wen'ren'mo'ke
神经错乱 shen'jing'cuo'luan
三十六计 san'shi'liu'ji
出头之日 chu'tou'zhi'ri
不成比例 bu'cheng'bi'li
养儿防老 yang'r'fang'lao
不胜其烦 bu'sheng'qi'fan
赤胆忠心 chi'dan'zhong'xin
过犹不及 guo'you'bu'ji
击鼓传花 ji'gu'chuan'hua
心无旁骛 xin'wu'pang'wu
清澈见底 qing'che'jian'di
一般见识 yi'ban'jian'shi
中庸之道 zhong'yong'zhi'dao
一哄而起 yi'hong'er'qi
大事化小 da'shi'hua'xiao
自由恋爱 zi'you'lian'ai
争取时间 zheng'qu'shi'jian
一钱不值 yi'qian'bu'zhi
胡搅蛮缠 hu'jiao'man'chan
作威作福 zuo'wei'zuo'fu
博学多才 bo'xue'duo'cai
一不做二不休 yi'bu'zuo'er'bu'xiu

刨根问底 pao'gen'wen'di
咫尺天涯 zhi'chi'tian'ya
歪歪斜斜 wai'wai'xie'xie
大慈大悲 da'ci'da'bei
长吁短叹 zhang'xu'duan'tan
罪孽深重 zui'nie'shen'zhong
政出多门 zheng'chu'duo'men
极乐世界 ji'le'shi'jie
靠山吃山 kao'shan'chi'shan
聪明反被聪明误 cong'ming'fan'bei'cong'ming'wu
临阵磨枪 lin'zhen'mo'qiang
势在必得 shi'zai'bi'de
垂帘听政 chui'lian'ting'zheng
自不待言 zi'bu'dai'yan
明日黄花 ming'ri'huang'hua
欺软怕硬 qi'ruan'pa'ying
无形之中 wu'xing'zhi'zhong
滴滴答答 di'di'da'da
聊以自慰 liao'yi'zi'wei
甘之如饴 gan'zhi'ru'yi
谋财害命 mou'cai'hai'ming
稍逊一筹 shao'xun'yi'chou
改弦易辙 gai'xian'yi'zhe
迎头痛击 ying'tou'tong'ji
比翼齐飞 bi'yi'qi'fei
影影绰绰 ying'ying'chao'chao
犬牙交错 quan'ya'jiao'cuo
放之四海而皆准 fang'zhi'si'hai'er'jie'zhun
人见人爱 ren'jian'ren'ai
日晒雨淋 ri'shai'yu'lin
为富不仁 wei'fu'bu'ren
百舸争流 bai'ge'zheng'liu
满盘皆输 man'pan'jie'shu
来去匆匆 lai'qu'cong'cong

丧权辱国 sang'quan'ru'guo
依然故我 yi'ran'gu'wo
灯火阑珊 deng'huo'lan'shan

忙得不可开交 mang'de'bu'ke'kai'jiao

如沐春风 ru'mu'chun'feng

生津止渴 sheng'jin'zhi'ke
毫无道理 hao'wu'dao'li
齐心合力 qi'xin'he'li
不破不立 bu'po'bu'li
神经过敏 shen'jing'guo'min
七情六欲 qi'qing'liu'yu
榜上无名 bang'shang'wu'ming
金玉良言 jin'yu'liang'yan
不见不散 bu'jian'bu'san

嘻皮笑脸 xi'pi'xiao'lian
化敌为友 hua'di'wei'you

含糊其辞 han'hu'qi'ci

竭泽而渔 jie'ze'er'yu
高不成低不就 gao'bu'cheng'di'bu'jiu

不堪入耳 bu'kan'ru'er
天文地理 tian'wen'di'li

谈虎色变 tan'hu'se'bian

人人皆知 ren'ren'jie'zhi
诲人不倦 hui'ren'bu'juan
革命烈士 ge'ming'lie'shi

一时无两 yi'shi'wu'liang
自立门户 zi'li'men'hu
歪打正着 wai'da'zheng'zhe

有权有势 you'quan'you'shi

头重脚轻 tou'zhong'jiao'qing
引以自豪 yin'yi'zi'hao

水天一色 shui'tian'yi'se
金屋藏娇 jin'wu'cang'jiao

半夜鸡叫 ban'ye'ji'jiao
秉公执法 bing'gong'zhi'fa

日久见人心 ri'jiu'jian'ren'xin

雷电交加 lei'dian'jiao'jia

永不磨灭 yong'bu'mo'mie

君子协定 jun'zi'xie'ding
无所不有 wu'suo'bu'you
以一当十 yi'yi'dang'shi

忠厚老实 zhong'hou'lao'shi
且战且退 qie'zhan'qie'tui
呼朋引伴 hu'peng'yin'ban
非比寻常 fei'bi'xun'chang
纸包不住火 zhi'bao'bu'zhu'huo
局促不安 ju'cu'bu'an
脱离群众 tuo'li'qun'zhong
风雪交加 feng'xue'jiao'jia
气息奄奄 qi'xi'yan'yan
占山为王 zhan'shan'wei'wang
人逢喜事精神爽 ren'feng'xi'shi'jing'shen'shuang
别无所求 bie'wu'suo'qiu
万马齐喑 wan'ma'qi'yin
尸横遍野 shi'heng'bian'ye
宝贝疙瘩 bao'bei'ge'da
照猫画虎 zhao'mao'hua'hu
水火不相容 shui'huo'bu'xiang'rong
成败得失 cheng'bai'de'shi
有胆有识 you'dan'you'shi
男左女右 nan'zuo'nv'you
反咬一口 fan'yao'yi'kou
呼啸而过 hu'xiao'er'guo
明码实价 ming'ma'shi'jia
老成持重 lao'cheng'chi'zhong
走马换将 zou'ma'huan'jiang
胡吃海喝 hu'chi'hai'he
回肠荡气 hui'chang'dang'qi
维妙维肖 wei'miao'wei'xiao
作鸟兽散 zuo'niao'shou'san
物换星移 wu'huan'xing'yi
名门望族 ming'men'wang'zu
天下乌鸦一般黑 tian'xia'wu'ya'yi'ban'hei
舒筋活络 shu'jin'huo'luo
弃之可惜 qi'zhi'ke'xi
眼不见为净 yan'bu'jian'wei'jing
不可终日 bu'ke'zhong'ri
习惯成自然 xi'guan'cheng'zi'ran
甩开膀子 shuai'kai'bang'zi
倒买倒卖 dao'mai'dao'mai
南腔北调 nan'qiang'bei'diao
一个心眼 yi'ge'xin'yan
心向往之 xin'xiang'wang'zhi
离心离德 li'xin'li'de
兵败如山倒 bing'bai'ru'shan'dao
红男绿女 hong'nan'lv'nv
耳听为虚 er'ting'wei'xu
三朝元老 san'chao'yuan'lao
暮鼓晨钟 mu'gu'chen'zhong
生死搏斗 sheng'si'bo'dou
公诸于众 gong'zhu'yu'zhong
芒刺在背 mang'ci'zai'bei
青云直上 qing'yun'zhi'shang
珍禽异兽 zhen'qin'yi'shou
悔过自新 hui'guo'zi'xin
合久必分 he'jiu'bi'fen
城乡差别 cheng'xiang'cha'bie
大雨倾盆 da'yu'qing'pen
深受其害 shen'shou'qi'hai
文韬武略 wen'tao'wu'e
满腹牢骚 man'fu'lao'sao
依葫芦画瓢 yi'hu'lu'hua'piao
英雄所见略同 ying'xiong'suo'jian'e'tong
独出心裁 du'chu'xin'cai
出头露面 chu'tou'lu'mian
乡规民约 xiang'gui'min'yue
人困马乏 ren'kun'ma'fa
之乎者也 zhi'hu'zhe'ye
脑满肠肥 nao'man'chang'fei
吹吹打打 chui'chui'da'da
徒子徒孙 tu'zi'tu'sun
危急关头 wei'ji'guan'tou
凭空捏造 ping'kong'nie'zao
插翅难飞 cha'chi'nan'fei
波澜起伏 bo'lan'qi'fu
见贤思齐 jian'xian'si'qi
言归于好 yan'gui'yu'hao
惟恐天下不乱 wei'kong'tian'xia'bu'luan
鹦鹉学舌 ying'wu'xue'she
贯彻始终 guan'che'shi'zhong
羽翼丰满 yu'yi'feng'man
破壳而出 po'ke'er'chu
嫁祸于人 jia'huo'yu'ren
得饶人处且饶人 de'rao'ren'chu'qie'rao'ren
四海为家 si'hai'wei'jia
不疾不徐 bu'ji'bu'xu
钢筋铁骨 gang'jin'tie'gu
横征暴敛 heng'zheng'bao'lian
俯拾即是 fu'shi'ji'shi
温故知新 wen'gu'zhi'xin
胆颤心惊 dan'chan'xin'jing
水银泻地 shui'yin'xie'di
半老徐娘 ban'lao'xu'niang
血脉贲张 xue'mai'ben'zhang
下回分解 xia'hui'fen'jie
一无所得 yi'wu'suo'de
狗仗人势 gou'zhang'ren'shi
心神不安 xin'shen'bu'an
来势凶猛 lai'shi'xiong'meng
刀山火海 dao'shan'huo'hai
每逢佳节倍思亲 mei'feng'jia'jie'bei'si'qin
奇门遁甲 qi'men'dun'jia
根正苗红 gen'zheng'miao'hong
无可辩驳 wu'ke'bian'bo
群起而攻之 qun'qi'er'gong'zhi
一把鼻涕一把泪 yi'ba'bi'ti'yi'ba'lei
翻脸不认人 fan'lian'bu'ren'ren
不成方圆 bu'cheng'fang'yuan
坚壁清野 jian'bi'qing'ye
唱独角戏 chang'du'jiao'xi
众星拱月 zhong'xing'gong'yue
不绝如缕 bu'jue'ru'lv
梦幻泡影 meng'huan'pao'ying
东方不亮西方亮 dong'fang'bu'liang'xi'fang'liang
丢盔弃甲 diu'kui'qi'jia
一路风尘 yi'lu'feng'chen
闲云野鹤 xian'yun'ye'he
开山鼻祖 kai'shan'bi'zu
攻其不备 gong'qi'bu'bei
春去秋来 chun'qu'qiu'lai
常备不懈 chang'bei'bu'xie
青天白日 qing'tian'bai'ri
孔武有力 kong'wu'you'li
古木参天 gu'mu'can'tian
志在千里 zhi'zai'qian'li
舆论哗然 yu'lun'hua'ran
后院起火 hou'yuan'qi'huo
授人以柄 shou'ren'yi'bing
笼络人心 long'luo'ren'xin
家道中落 jia'dao'zhong'luo
坎坷不平 kan'jiong'bu'ping
常来常往 chang'lai'chang'wang
难以挽回 nan'yi'wan'hui
出口伤人 chu'kou'shang'ren
刀下留人 dao'xia'liu'ren
鞭辟入里 bian'pi'ru'li
吵吵嚷嚷 chao'chao'rang'rang
格物致知 ge'wu'zhi'zhi
心比天高 xin'bi'tian'gao
王者之师 wang'zhe'zhi'shi
人间仙境 ren'jian'xian'jing

公私分明 gong'si'fen'ming

诱敌深入 you'di'shen'ru

若有所失 ruo'you'suo'shi

返朴归真 fan'pu'gui'zhen

色彩鲜明 se'cai'xian'ming

大笔一挥 da'bi'yi'hui

道不同不相为谋 dao'bu'tong'bu'xiang'wei'mou
独门独户 du'men'du'hu
受之有愧 shou'zhi'you'kui

自毁长城 zi'hui'zhang'cheng
由始至终 you'shi'zhi'zhong
没大没小 mei'da'mei'xiao
远亲不如近邻 yuan'qin'bu'ru'jin'lin
大干快上 da'gan'kuai'shang
划清界线 hua'qing'jie'xian
争名夺利 zheng'ming'duo'li
暮气沉沉 mu'qi'chen'chen
爬山涉水 pa'shan'she'shui
飞短流长 fei'duan'liu'zhang
和气生财 he'qi'sheng'cai
窥见一斑 kui'jian'yi'ban
三妻四妾 san'qi'si'qie
一百八十度 yi'bai'ba'shi'du
日月如梭 ri'yue'ru'suo
肤如凝脂 fu'ru'ning'zhi
慷慨悲歌 kang'kai'bei'ge
对酒当歌 dui'jiu'dang'ge
山水相连 shan'shui'xiang'lian
铭心刻骨 ming'xin'ke'gu
父母之命 fu'mu'zhi'ming
数典忘祖 shu'dian'wang'zu
形影相吊 xing'ying'xiang'diao
做人做事 zuo'ren'zuo'shi
反攻倒算 fan'gong'dao'suan
喘不过气 chuan'bu'guo'qi
逃避责任 tao'bi'ze'ren

神态自若 shen'tai'zi'ruo
在水一方 zai'shui'yi'fang
普度众生 pu'du'zhong'sheng
其利断金 qi'li'duan'jin
赤身露体 chi'shen'lu'ti
敝帚自珍 bi'zhou'zi'zhen
脸上贴金 lian'shang'tie'jin
不干不净 bu'gan'bu'jing

流里流气 liu'li'liu'qi
无人之境 wu'ren'zhi'jing

乐见其成 le'jian'qi'cheng
神气十足 shen'qi'shi'zu
吉星高照 ji'xing'gao'zhao
敢作敢当 gan'zuo'gan'dang
孤军深入 gu'jun'shen'ru
一来一往 yi'lai'yi'wang
疙疙瘩瘩 ge'ge'da'da

生财有道 sheng'cai'you'dao
一语不发 yi'yu'bu'fa

斯文扫地 si'wen'sao'di

半壁河山 ban'bi'he'shan
本本分分 ben'ben'fen'fen
天下归心 tian'xia'gui'xin
益寿延年 yi'shou'yan'nian
拿定主意 na'ding'zhu'yi
城市贫民 cheng'shi'pin'min
怡情养性 yi'qing'yang'xing
哪吒闹海 na'zha'nao'hai
项庄舞剑 xiang'zhuangwu'wu'jian
此时无声胜有声 ci'shi'wu'sheng'sheng'you'sheng
马放南山 ma'fang'nan'shan
好生之德 hao'sheng'zhi'de
独霸一方 du'ba'yi'fang
靠水吃水 kao'shui'chi'shui
苦乐不均 ku'le'bu'jun
昭君出塞 zhao'jun'chu'sai
万里迢迢 wan'li'tiao'tiao
自卖自夸 zi'mai'zi'kua
披肝沥胆 pi'gan'li'dan
触景伤情 chu'jing'shang'qing
独揽大权 du'lan'da'quan
满腹狐疑 man'fu'hu'yi
雄伟壮丽 xiong'wei'zhuang'
普渡众生 pu'du'zhong'sheng
以夷制夷 yi'yi'zhi'yi
明枪暗箭 ming'qiang'an'jian
以强凌弱 yi'qiang'ling'ruo
不测风云 bu'ce'feng'yun
疾风骤雨 ji'feng'zhou'yu
此言差矣 ci'yan'cha'yi
青史留名 qing'shi'liu'ming
沟沟坎坎 gou'gou'kan'kan
自立自强 zi'li'zi'qiang
荣登榜首 rong'deng'bang'shou
改土归流 gai'tu'gui'liu
三个臭皮匠 san'ge'chou'pi'jiang
正正经经 zheng'zheng'jing'jing
不识好歹 bu'shi'hao'dai
仪态万千 yi'tai'wan'qian
不怕没柴烧 bu'pa'mei'chai'shao
公之于世 gong'zhi'yu'shi
内圣外王 nei'sheng'wai'wang
乱臣贼子 luan'chen'zei'zi
无福消受 wu'fu'xiao'shou
生花妙笔 sheng'hua'miao'bi
焕发青春 huan'fa'qing'chun
恭敬不如从命 gong'jing'bu'ru'cong'ming
仁者见仁智者见智 ren'zhe'jian'ren'zhi'zhe'jian'zhi
失道寡助 shi'dao'gua'zhu
乐而忘返 le'er'wang'fan
士为知己者死 shi'wei'zhi'ji'zhe'si
恰好相反 qia'hao'xiang'fan
一代不如一代 yi'dai'bu'ru'yi'dai
一睹为快 yi'du'wei'kuai
城下之盟 cheng'xia'zhi'meng
片面强调 pian'mian'qiang'diao
白里透红 bai'li'tou'hong
天赋人权 tian'fu'ren'quan
贫病交加 pin'bing'jiao'jia
九五之尊 jiu'wu'zhi'zun
叽哩咕噜 ji'li'gu'lu
公正廉洁 gong'zheng'lian'jie
余波未平 yu'bo'wei'ping
江东父老 jiang'dong'fu'lao
一分价钱一分货 yi'fen'jia'qian'yi'fen'huo
如假包换 ru'jia'bao'huan
至亲好友 zhi'qin'hao'you
虎口夺食 hu'kou'duo'shi
条条大路通罗马 tiao'tiao'da'lu'tong'luo'ma
身价倍增 shen'jia'bei'zeng
不识庐山真面目 bu'shi'lu'shan'zhen'mian'mu
卓有成就 zhuo'you'cheng'jiu
惹火烧身 re'huo'shao'shen
士可杀不可辱 shi'ke'sha'bu'ke'ru
轻言细语 qing'yan'xi'yu
头昏目眩 tou'hun'mu'xuan
谓我心忧 wei'wo'xin'you
强国富民 qiang'guo'fu'min
兵不厌诈 bing'bu'yan'zha
潇潇洒洒 xiao'xiao'sa'sa
鼎足而立 ding'zu'er'li
常年累月 chang'nian'lei'yue
并无不当 bing'wu'bu'dang
长长短短 zhang'zhang'duan'duan
颗粒归仓 ke'li'gui'cang
全盘托出 quan'pan'tuo'chu
阴云密布 yin'yun'mi'bu
节哀顺变 jie'ai'shun'bian
鼓乐喧天 gu'le'xuan'tian
放下屠刀 fang'xia'tu'dao
外圆内方 wai'yuan'nei'fang
赌咒发誓 du'zhou'fa'shi
骨肉分离 gu'rou'fen'li
狗眼看人低 gou'yan'kan'ren'di
大好时机 da'hao'shi'ji
正反两面 zheng'fan'liang'mian
鱼水情深 yu'shui'qing'shen
惹人注目 re'ren'zhu'mu
千依百顺 qian'yi'bai'shun
海底捞月 hai'di'lao'yue
脑袋瓜子 nao'dai'gua'zi
穷极无聊 qiong'ji'wu'liao
泛泛之辈 fan'fan'zhi'bei
饿虎扑食 e'hu'pu'shi
一无所长 yi'wu'suo'zhang
胜人一筹 sheng'ren'yi'chou
历久弥坚 li'jiu'mi'jian
锐不可挡 rui'bu'ke'dang
渺无人烟 miao'wu'ren'yan
站得住脚 zhan'de'zhu'jiao
缄口不言 jian'kou'bu'yan
奉为圭臬 feng'wei'gui'nie
尺有所短 chi'you'suo'duan
压寨夫人 ya'zhai'fu'ren
俯首听命 fu'shou'ting'ming
不药而愈 bu'yao'er'yu
无庸讳言 wu'yong'hui'yan
遗世独立 yi'shi'du'li
二龙戏珠 er'long'xi'zhu
白云苍狗 bai'yun'cang'gou
英姿勃发 ying'zi'bo'fa
慧眼识英雄 hui'yan'shi'ying'xiong
畸轻畸重 ji'qing'ji'zhong
庖丁解牛 pao'ding'jie'niu
尖嘴猴腮 jian'zui'hou'sai
西天取经 xi'tian'qu'jing
离愁别绪 li'chou'bie'xu
自己方便 zi'ji'fang'bian
投亲靠友 tou'qin'kao'you
鲤鱼跳龙门 li'yu'tiao'long'men
严词拒绝 yan'ci'ju'jue
亦能覆舟 yi'neng'fu'zhou
一根毫毛 yi'gen'hao'mao
临危授命 lin'wei'shou'ming
酒酣耳热 jiu'han'er're
激扬文字 ji'yang'wen'zi
鸡零狗碎 ji'ling'gou'sui
怪力乱神 guai'li'luan'shen
怒火冲天 nu'huo'chong'tian
三山五岳 san'shan'wu'yue
就地正法 jiu'di'zheng'fa
英雄气短 ying'xiong'qi'duan
首尾相接 shou'wei'xiang'jie
知书达礼 zhi'shu'da'li
病魔缠身 bing'mo'chan'shen
求知若渴 qiu'zhi'ruo'ke
长歌当哭 zhang'ge'dang'ku
开卷有益 kai'juan'you'yi
说来说去 shuo'lai'shuo'qu
文以载道 wen'yi'zai'dao
赤地千里 chi'di'qian'li
失之毫厘 shi'zhi'hao'li
长篇累牍 zhang'pian'lei'du
歃血为盟 sha'xue'wei'meng
经营惨淡 jing'ying'can'dan
目不忍睹 mu'bu'ren'du
男耕女织 nan'geng'nv'zhi
能征善战 neng'zheng'shan'zhan
无敌于天下 wu'di'yu'tian'xia
如意郎君 ru'yi'lang'jun
各打五十大板 ge'da'wu'shi'da'ban
实践出真知 shi'jian'chu'zhen'zhi
志大才疏 zhi'da'cai'shu
晓以大义 xiao'yi'da'yi
还没有解决 hai'mei'you'jie'jue
黯然无光 an'ran'wu'guang
解剖麻雀 jie'pou'ma'que
水火之中 shui'huo'zhi'zhong
各尽其责 ge'jin'qi'ze

好事成双 hao'shi'cheng'shuang
承先启后 cheng'xian'qi'hou

傲慢无礼 ao'man'wu'li

怪模怪样 guai'mo'guai'yang
念兹在兹 nian'ci'zai'ci

削铁如泥 xue'tie'ru'ni
小脚女人 xiao'jiao'nv'ren

字如其人 zi'ru'qi'ren

天神下凡 tian'shen'xia'fan
进退有度 jin'tui'you'du

波诡云谲 bo'gui'yun'jue

归根究底 gui'gen'jiu'di

孝子贤孙 xiao'zi'xian'sun

天下一家 tian'xia'yi'jia
哀兵必胜 ai'bing'bi'sheng
一个萝卜一个坑 yi'ge'luo'bo'yi'ge'keng

南郭先生 nan'guo'xian'sheng
酒逢知己千杯少 jiu'feng'zhi'ji'qian'bei'shao
扑鼻而来 pu'bi'er'lai
山长水远 shan'zhang'shui'yuan

为人作嫁 wei'ren'zuo'jia
含而不露 han'er'bu'lu
万夫莫敌 wan'fu'mo'di
立功赎罪 li'gong'shu'zui
风流云散 feng'liu'yun'san
身无长物 shen'wu'zhang'wu
手足情深 shou'zu'qing'shen
不肖子孙 bu'xiao'zi'sun
长幼有序 zhang'you'you'xu
求仁得仁 qiu'ren'de'ren
不落窠臼 bu'luo'ke'jiu
桀骜不逊 jie'ao'bu'xun
包藏祸心 bao'cang'huo'xin
骨头架子 gu'tou'jia'zi
英雄末路 ying'xiong'mo'lu
五味俱全 wu'wei'ju'quan
八王之乱 ba'wang'zhi'luan
盲目崇拜 mang'mu'chong'bai
血债血还 xue'zhai'xue'hai
与人方便 yu'ren'fang'bian
敬酒不吃吃罚酒 jing'jiu'bu'chi'chi'fa'jiu
文治武功 wen'zhi'wu'gong
四十不惑 si'shi'bu'huo
动若脱兔 dong'ruo'tuo'tu
昼夜兼程 zhou'ye'jian'cheng
手眼通天 shou'yan'tong'tian
水中捞月 shui'zhong'lao'yue
言不及义 yan'bu'ji'yi
烈火真金 lie'huo'zhen'jin
覆雨翻云 fu'yu'fan'yun
以观后效 yi'guan'hou'xiao
东征西讨 dong'zheng'xi'tao
水来土掩 shui'lai'tu'yan
古里古怪 gu'li'gu'guai
气不打一处来 qi'bu'da'yi'chu'lai
没有做不到 mei'you'zuo'bu'dao
绝尘而去 jue'chen'er'qu
缺心眼儿 que'xin'yan'r
吉凶祸福 ji'xiong'huo'fu
重赏之下必有勇夫 zhong'shang'zhi'xia'bi'you'yong'fu
幼吾幼以及人之幼 you'wu'you'yi'ji'ren'zhi'you
典章制度 dian'zhang'zhi'du
卖官鬻爵 mai'guan'yu'jue
无名小辈 wu'ming'xiao'bei
琼楼玉宇 qiong'lou'yu'yu
岁月蹉跎 sui'yue'cuo'tuo
多谋善断 duo'mou'shan'duan
贪心不足 tan'xin'bu'zu
奥妙无穷 ao'miao'wu'qiong
故意刁难 gu'yi'diao'nan
计上心来 ji'shang'xin'lai
代罪羔羊 dai'zui'gao'yang
河图洛书 he'tu'luo'shu
谋事在人 mou'shi'zai'ren
事无大小 shi'wu'da'xiao
开国功臣 kai'guo'gong'chen
天机不可泄漏 tian'ji'bu'ke'xie'lou
怨气冲天 yuan'qi'chong'tian
决一胜负 jue'yi'sheng'fu
亢龙有悔 kang'long'you'hui
还我河山 hai'wo'he'shan
轻于鸿毛 qing'yu'hong'mao
千里之行始于足下 qian'li'zhi'xing'shi'yu'zu'xia
大道至简 da'dao'zhi'jian
以守为攻 yi'shou'wei'gong
界限分明 jie'xian'fen'ming
万般皆下品 wan'ban'jie'xia'pin
羊入虎口 yang'ru'hu'kou
死心眼儿 si'xin'yan'r
漠然置之 mo'ran'zhi'zhi
自叹弗如 zi'tan'fu'ru
五一国际劳动节 wu'yi'guo'ji'lao'dong'jie
得理不饶人 de'li'bu'rao'ren
视野范围 shi'ye'fan'wei
坚定意志 jian'ding'yi'zhi
懦弱无能 nuo'ruo'wu'neng
无远弗届 wu'yuan'fu'jie
邪不压正 xie'bu'ya'zheng
空空洞洞 kong'kong'dong'dong
人约黄昏 ren'yue'huang'hun

一来二往 yi'lai'er'wang

聪明能干 cong'ming'neng'gan

好景不常 hao'jing'bu'chang

女大不中留 nv'da'bu'zhong'liu

虎踞龙盘 hu'ju'long'pan

终身不得 zhong'shen'bu'de

行百里者半九十 xing'bai'li'zhe'ban'jiu'shi
秦晋之好 qin'jin'zhi'hao
鹞子翻身 yao'zi'fan'shen
英姿勃勃 ying'zi'bo'bo

判若云泥 pan'ruo'yun'ni

豪气干云 hao'qi'gan'yun
自食其言 zi'shi'qi'yan

自食恶果 zi'shi'e'guo
得失成败 de'shi'cheng'bai

悲观论调 bei'guan'lun'diao
百花盛开 bai'hua'sheng'kai
人多嘴杂 ren'duo'zui'za
立身处世 li'shen'chu'shi
奇技淫巧 qi'ji'yin'qiao
上情下达 shang'qing'xia'da
大卸八块 da'xie'ba'kuai
化公为私 hua'gong'wei'si
晴空霹雳 qing'kong'pi'li
日月光华 ri'yue'guang'hua
悄然离去 qiao'ran'li'qu
良药苦口利于病 liang'yao'ku'kou'li'yu'bing
龙吟虎啸 long'yin'hu'xiao
英雄出少年 ying'xiong'chu'shao'nian
雕栏玉砌 diao'lan'yu'qi
吃了豹子胆 chi'le'bao'zi'dan
报国无门 bao'guo'wu'men
南橘北枳 nan'ju'bei'zhi
齐东野语 qi'dong'ye'yu
吃斋念佛 chi'zhai'nian'fu
披坚执锐 pi'jian'zhi'rui
前腐后继 qian'fu'hou'ji
常在河边走 chang'zai'he'bian'zou
绝世无双 jue'shi'wu'shuang
人穷志短 ren'qiong'zhi'duan
所在多有 suo'zai'duo'you
发菩提心 fa'pu'ti'xin
烟雨蒙蒙 yan'yu'meng'meng
大得人心 da'de'ren'xin
关门闭户 guan'men'bi'hu
坐收渔人之利 zuo'shou'yu'ren'zhi'li
无可如何 wu'ke'ru'he
切中肯綮 qie'zhong'ken'qi
颠鸾倒凤 dian'luan'dao'feng
古井不波 gu'jing'bu'bo
名震一时 ming'zhen'yi'shi
吴侬软语 wu'nong'ruan'yu
广结善缘 guang'jie'shan'yuan
大马金刀 da'ma'jin'dao
安土重迁 an'tu'zhong'qian
一字不识 yi'zi'bu'shi
声若洪钟 sheng'ruo'hong'zhong
送往迎来 song'wang'ying'lai
天大笑话 tian'da'xiao'hua
七擒孟获 qi'qin'meng'huo
感慨系之 gan'kai'xi'zhi
名留青史 ming'liu'qing'shi
福禄寿喜 fu'lu'shou'xi
满腔怒火 man'qiang'nu'huo
擒贼擒王 qin'zei'qin'wang
这山望着那山高 zhe'shan'wang'zhe'na'shan'gao
心里有鬼 xin'li'you'gui
劈头盖脑 pi'tou'gai'nao
铁马金戈 tie'ma'jin'ge
二门不迈 er'men'bu'mai
弯腰驼背 wan'yao'tuo'bei
大有所为 da'you'suo'wei
如临其境 ru'lin'qi'jing
阳关大道 yang'guan'da'dao
青梅煮酒 qing'mei'zhu'jiu
露出破绽 lu'chu'po'zhan
手心手背都是肉 shou'xin'shou'bei'dou'shi'rou
山摇地动 shan'yao'di'dong
无出其右者 wu'chu'qi'you'zhe
胸无城府 xiong'wu'cheng'fu
踏破铁鞋 ta'po'tie'xie
篡党夺权 cuan'dang'duo'quan
见棱见角 jian'leng'jian'jiao
茫然若失 mang'ran'ruo'shi
说一套做一套 shuo'yi'tao'zuo'yi'tao
旦夕之间 dan'xi'zhi'jian
在所不计 zai'suo'bu'ji
恶语伤人 e'yu'shang'ren
寸步难移 cun'bu'nan'yi
敢做敢当 gan'zuo'gan'dang
逼人太甚 bi'ren'tai'shen
欺人之谈 qi'ren'zhi'tan
忍俊不住 ren'jun'bu'zhu
披红戴花 pi'hong'dai'hua
穿新鞋走老路 chuan'xin'xie'zou'lao'lu
雷霆一击 lei'ting'yi'ji
撼天动地 han'tian'dong'di
横平竖直 heng'ping'shu'zhi
虎虎有生气 hu'hu'you'sheng'qi
勤政爱民 qin'zheng'ai'min
同气连枝 tong'qi'lian'zhi
雄赳赳气昂昂 xiong'jiu'jiu'qi'ang'ang
读书破万卷 du'shu'po'wan'juan
剑胆琴心 jian'dan'qin'xin
天公地道 tian'gong'di'dao
食言而肥 shi'yan'er'fei
收支相抵 shou'zhi'xiang'di
台下十年功 tai'xia'shi'nian'gong
邋邋遢遢 la'la'ta'ta
故作高深 gu'zuo'gao'shen
人心不足蛇吞象 ren'xin'bu'zu'she'tun'xiang
有山有水 you'shan'you'shui
身残志不残 shen'can'zhi'bu'can
含混不清 han'hun'bu'qing
倍受欢迎 bei'shou'huan'ying
达旦通宵 da'dan'tong'xiao
反骄破满 fan'jiao'po'man
爱惜羽毛 ai'xi'yu'mao
洪福齐天 hong'fu'qi'tian
未能免俗 wei'neng'mian'su
博学多识 bo'xue'duo'shi
一人做事一人当 yi'ren'zuo'shi'yi'ren'dang
天人相应 tian'ren'xiang'ying
刀光血影 dao'guang'xue'ying
变动不居 bian'dong'bu'ju
捐弃前嫌 juan'qi'qian'xian
舍身取义 she'shen'qu'yi
苦难深重 ku'nan'shen'zhong
委屈求全 wei'qu'qiu'quan
不以物喜 bu'yi'wu'xi
万古流芳 wan'gu'liu'fang
一东一西 yi'dong'yi'xi
身体发肤 shen'ti'fa'fu
安步当车 an'bu'dang'che
御风而行 yu'feng'er'xing
君子动口不动手 jun'zi'dong'kou'bu'dong'shou
是非得失 shi'fei'de'shi
以茶代酒 yi'cha'dai'jiu
屹立不动 yi'li'bu'dong
风月无边 feng'yue'wu'bian
爱财如命 ai'cai'ru'ming
稳坐钓鱼台 wen'zuo'diao'yu'tai
吃眼前亏 chi'yan'qian'kui
歪嘴和尚 wai'zui'he'shang
怒容满面 nu'rong'man'mian
自由泛滥 zi'you'fan'lan
七窍流血 qi'qiao'liu'xue
一笑倾城 yi'xiao'qing'cheng
买卖公平 mai'mai'gong'ping
卧榻之侧 wo'ta'zhi'ce
蝇头小楷 ying'tou'xiao'jie
不能自主 bu'neng'zi'zhu
国无宁日 guo'wu'ning'ri
六十四卦 liu'shi'si'gua
稍安勿躁 shao'an'wu'zao
大兵压境 da'bing'ya'jing
情场失意 qing'chang'shi'yi
有进无退 you'jin'wu'tui
颇费周折 po'fei'zhou'zhe
灿烂夺目 can'lan'duo'mu
指东打西 zhi'dong'da'xi
慢慢腾腾 man'man'teng'teng
身教重于言教 shen'jiao'zhong'yu'yan'jiao
活到老学到老 huo'dao'lao'xue'dao'lao
经世济民 jing'shi'ji'min
跃马扬鞭 yue'ma'yang'bian
户枢不蠹 hu'shu'bu'du
置之不顾 zhi'zhi'bu'gu
看家本事 kan'jia'ben'shi
不见森林 bu'jian'sen'lin
令人喷饭 ling'ren'pen'fan
在江湖中 zai'jiang'hu'zhong
束手就缚 shu'shou'jiu'fu
授受不亲 shou'shou'bu'qin
不如归去 bu'ru'gui'qu
位极人臣 wei'ji'ren'chen
带眼识人 dai'yan'shi'ren
不足为道 bu'zu'wei'dao
一言既出 yi'yan'ji'chu
较量较量 jiao'liang'jiao'liang
削尖脑袋 xue'jian'nao'dai
吹糠见米 chui'kang'jian'mi
愚民政策 yu'min'zheng'ce
漠然视之 mo'ran'shi'zhi
平平淡淡才是真 ping'ping'dan'dan'cai'shi'zhen
纤毫毕现 xian'hao'bi'xian
春风和煦 chun'feng'he'xu
神交已久 shen'jiao'yi'jiu
屡建奇功 lv'jian'qi'gong
魂兮归来 hun'xi'gui'lai
狂风恶浪 kuang'feng'e'lang
陈陈相因 chen'chen'xiang'yin
一丝不乱 yi'si'bu'luan
放浪不羁 fang'lang'bu'ji
壮志豪情 zhuangzhi'zhi'hao'qing
御用文人 yu'yong'wen'ren
拥兵自重 yong'bing'zi'zhong
功高震主 gong'gao'zhen'zhu
死水微澜 si'shui'wei'lan
不阴不阳 bu'yin'bu'yang
不尽一致 bu'jin'yi'zhi
血泪斑斑 xue'lei'ban'ban
万世师表 wan'shi'shi'biao
碧海青天 bi'hai'qing'tian
又见一帘幽梦 you'jian'yi'lian'you'meng
命该如此 ming'gai'ru'ci
作嫁衣裳 zuo'jia'yi'shang
花钱如流水 hua'qian'ru'liu'shui
清风徐来 qing'feng'xu'lai
百善孝为先 bai'shan'xiao'wei'xian
低声细语 di'sheng'xi'yu
从重从快 cong'zhong'cong'kuai
五福临门 wu'fu'lin'men
言不尽意 yan'bu'jin'yi
天地不容 tian'di'bu'rong
活学活用 huo'xue'huo'yong
毁天灭地 hui'tian'mie'di
气宇不凡 qi'yu'bu'fan
如闻其声 ru'wen'qi'sheng
头痛医头脚痛医脚 tou'tong'yi'tou'jiao'tong'yi'jiao
惊魂不定 jing'hun'bu'ding
举止大方 ju'zhi'da'fang
千军易得 qian'jun'yi'de
六宫粉黛 liu'gong'fen'dai
有害无利 you'hai'wu'li
不见棺材不落泪 bu'jian'guan'cai'bu'luo'lei
拿腔拿调 na'qiang'na'diao
小米加步枪 xiao'mi'jia'bu'qiang
掩鼻而过 yan'bi'er'guo
柔肠百转 rou'chang'bai'zhuan
站着说话不腰疼 zhan'zhe'shuo'hua'bu'yao'teng
无法可施 wu'fa'ke'shi
金刚怒目 jin'gang'nu'mu
好管闲事 hao'guan'xian'shi
庄周梦蝶 zhuang''meng'die
卢沟晓月 lu'gou'xiao'yue
谎话连篇 huang'hua'lian'pian
找不自在 zhao'bu'zi'zai
蛇蝎心肠 she'xie'xin'chang
庶民同罪 shu'min'tong'zui
巴山蜀水 ba'shan'shu'shui
议论风生 yi'lun'feng'sheng
顾盼生姿 gu'pan'sheng'zi
不谋其政 bu'mou'qi'zheng
好死不如赖活 hao'si'bu'ru'lai'huo
远水救不了近火 yuan'shui'jiu'bu'le'jin'huo
聪明睿智 cong'ming'rui'zhi
门前冷落 men'qian'leng'luo
金口玉言 jin'kou'yu'yan
呜呜咽咽 wu'wu'yan'yan
不知所为 bu'zhi'suo'wei
州官放火 zhou'guan'fang'huo
邂逅相遇 xie'hou'xiang'yu
云谲波诡 yun'jue'bo'gui
从谏如流 cong'jian'ru'liu
思潮起伏 si'chao'qi'fu
兄友弟恭 xiong'you'di'gong
琐琐碎碎 suo'suo'sui'sui
十二经脉 shi'er'jing'mai
小荷才露尖尖角 xiao'he'cai'lu'jian'jian'jiao
洪水滔天 hong'shui'tao'tian
不当之处 bu'dang'zhi'chu
另请高明 ling'qing'gao'ming
轻轻巧巧 qing'qing'qiao'qiao
拔刀相向 ba'dao'xiang'xiang
毛将焉附 mao'jiang'yan'fu
应者云集 ying'zhe'yun'ji
另有企图 ling'you'qi'tu
卖身投靠 mai'shen'tou'kao
汪洋恣肆 wang'yang'zi'si
竹筒倒豆子 zhu'tong'dao'dou'zi

三个女人一台戏 san'ge'nv'ren'yi'tai'xi
片面之词 pian'mian'zhi'ci
麻雀虽小五脏俱全 ma'que'sui'xiao'wu'zang'ju'quan

人为财死 ren'wei'cai'si
为尊者讳 wei'zun'zhe'hui
军法从事 jun'fa'cong'shi
颜色不变 yan'se'bu'bian
强扭的瓜不甜 qiang'niu'de'gua'bu'tian

沃野千里 wo'ye'qian'li
儿女英雄 r'nv'ying'xiong
看人下菜 kan'ren'xia'cai
金风送爽 jin'feng'song'shuang

各人自扫门前雪 ge'ren'zi'sao'men'qian'xue

情同父子 qing'tong'fu'zi
自以为得计 zi'yi'wei'de'ji
同心合力 tong'xin'he'li
饕餮之徒 tao'tie'zhi'tu
正人先正己 zheng'ren'xian'zheng'ji

内阁中书 nei'ge'zhong'shu

高手如林 gao'shou'ru'lin
好事之徒 hao'shi'zhi'tu

相机而动 xiang'ji'er'dong
永结同心 yong'jie'tong'xin

乘人不备 cheng'ren'bu'bei
文化交融 wen'hua'jiao'rong

眉梢眼角 mei'shao'yan'jiao
凤凰于飞 feng'huang'yu'fei
人间天上 ren'jian'tian'shang
以大欺小 yi'da'qi'xiao
分进合击 fen'jin'he'ji
正正当当 zheng'zheng'dang'dang
良莠不分 liang'you'bu'fen
悠哉游哉 you'zai'you'zai
死要面子活受罪 si'yao'mian'zi'huo'shou'zui
一场春梦 yi'chang'chun'meng
万物皆备于我 wan'wu'jie'bei'yu'wo

天下大事 tian'xia'da'shi
嘘声四起 xu'sheng'si'qi
别树一帜 bie'shu'yi'zhi

一夜未眠 yi'ye'wei'mian
有利无弊 you'li'wu'bi
奇花异卉 qi'hua'yi'hui
吴下阿蒙 wu'xia'a'meng

儒家学说 ru'jia'xue'shuo
无所忌惮 wu'suo'ji'dan
郁郁不乐 yu'yu'bu'le

空前团结 kong'qian'tuan'jie

富国天惠 fu'guo'tian'hui
有头无尾 you'tou'wu'wei

家有一老 jia'you'yi'lao
东跑西颠 dong'pao'xi'dian

巧笑嫣然 qiao'xiao'yan'ran

竭尽心力 jie'jin'xin'li
此地无银 ci'di'wu'yin
张皇失措 zhang'huang'shi'cuo
合家欢乐 he'jia'huan'le

占着茅坑不拉屎 zhan'zhe'mao'keng'bu'la'shi
升斗小民 sheng'dou'xiao'min

不足为训 bu'zu'wei'xun

活龙活现 huo'long'huo'xian
行若无事 xing'ruo'wu'shi

拔出萝卜带出泥 ba'chu'luo'bo'dai'chu'ni
晓以利害 xiao'yi'li'hai
上兵伐谋 shang'bing'fa'mou
袅袅娜娜 niao'niao'na'na

笔记小说 bi'ji'xiao'shuo

比上不足 bi'shang'bu'zu
恶向胆边生 e'xiang'dan'bian'sheng
以德报德 yi'de'bao'de
江湖医生 jiang'hu'yi'sheng
不及其余 bu'ji'qi'yu
耳根清净 er'gen'qing'jing
前倨后恭 qian'ju'hou'gong
饱经忧患 bao'jing'you'huan
不知其所以然 bu'zhi'qi'suo'yi'ran
临时动议 lin'shi'dong'yi
乘风归去 cheng'feng'gui'qu
功臣自居 gong'chen'zi'ju
反躬自问 fan'gong'zi'wen
权衡轻重 quan'heng'qing'zhong
修桥补路 xiu'qiao'bu'lu
如是我闻 ru'shi'wo'wen
无毒不丈夫 wu'du'bu'zhang'fu
遇强不弱 yu'qiang'bu'ruo
三家分晋 san'jia'fen'jin
知人之明 zhi'ren'zhi'ming
对薄公堂 dui'bao'gong'tang
二者不可得兼 er'zhe'bu'ke'de'jian
疏影横斜 shu'ying'heng'xie
书声琅琅 shu'sheng'lang'lang
拈轻怕重 nian'qing'pa'zhong
洞房花烛夜 dong'fang'hua'zhu'ye
一山不容二虎 yi'shan'bu'rong'er'hu
王顾左右而言他 wang'gu'zuo'you'er'yan'ta
无耻谰言 wu'chi'lan'yan
困兽之斗 kun'shou'zhi'dou
尽地主之谊 jin'di'zhu'zhi'yi
楚楚可人 chu'chu'ke'ren
书生气十足 shu'sheng'qi'shi'zu
光说不练 guang'shuo'bu'lian
说时迟那时快 shuo'shi'chi'na'shi'kuai
山中无老虎 shan'zhong'wu'lao'hu
经天纬地 jing'tian'wei'di
艳丽夺目 yan'li'duo'mu
烂泥扶不上墙 lan'ni'fu'bu'shang'qiang
不杀之恩 bu'sha'zhi'en
庐山真面 lu'shan'zhen'mian

问心有愧 wen'xin'you'kui
平平庸庸 ping'ping'yong'yong
静极思动 jing'ji'si'dong
杂乱无序 za'luan'wu'xu
平庸之辈 ping'yong'zhi'bei
束手无措 shu'shou'wu'cuo
雄霸一方 xiong'ba'yi'fang
图财害命 tu'cai'hai'ming
人烟稠密 ren'yan'chou'mi
宽宏大度 kuan'hong'da'du
寻章摘句 xun'zhang'zhai'ju
畏葸不前 wei'xi'bu'qian
评功摆好 ping'gong'bai'hao
远近驰名 yuan'jin'chi'ming
旦夕祸福 dan'xi'huo'fu
事事关心 shi'shi'guan'xin

横眉怒目 heng'mei'nu'mu
重峦叠嶂 zhong'luan'die'zhang
情深意重 qing'shen'yi'zhong
海内存知己 hai'nei'cun'zhi'ji
不可胜计 bu'ke'sheng'ji
歪瓜裂枣 wai'gua'lie'zao
年老力衰 nian'lao'li'shuai
大水冲了龙王庙 da'shui'chong'le'long'wang'miao
清香四溢 qing'xiang'si'yi
以身许国 yi'shen'xu'guo
神情自若 shen'qing'zi'ruo
股掌之上 gu'zhang'zhi'shang
丈二和尚 zhang'er'he'shang
善罢干休 shan'ba'gan'xiu
悔恨交加 hui'hen'jiao'jia
通衢大道 tong'qu'da'dao
知情不报 zhi'qing'bu'bao
诚心实意 cheng'xin'shi'yi
灭自己威风 mie'zi'ji'wei'feng
随时变化 sui'shi'bian'hua
坐言起行 zuo'yan'qi'xing
不明事理 bu'ming'shi'li
赞口不绝 zan'kou'bu'jue
鼻孔朝天 bi'kong'chao'tian
富商大贾 fu'shang'da'gu
夸父逐日 kua'fu'zhu'ri
浪子燕青 lang'zi'yan'qing
男女搭配 nan'nv'da'pei
前事不忘后事之师 qian'shi'bu'wang'hou'shi'zhi'shi
毫无所知 hao'wu'suo'zhi
疏疏落落 shu'shu'luo'luo
莽莽撞撞 mang'mang'zhuangzhuang
'zhuang
打遍天下无敌手 da'bian'tian'xia'wu'di'shou
国士无双 guo'shi'wu'shuang
密不通风 mi'bu'tong'feng
得其所哉 de'qi'suo'zai
得来全不费工夫 de'lai'quan'bu'fei'gong'fu
千古奇冤 qian'gu'qi'yuan
不好不坏 bu'hao'bu'huai
万籁俱静 wan'lai'ju'jing
时移世易 shi'yi'shi'yi
无立锥之地 wu'li'zhui'zhi'di
夜半三更 ye'ban'san'geng
拒人千里 ju'ren'qian'li
墙内开花墙外香 qiang'nei'kai'hua'qiang'wai'xiang
胳膊拧不过大腿 ge'bo'ning'bu'guo'da'tui
温香软玉 wen'xiang'ruan'yu
温良恭俭 wen'liang'gong'jian
识文断字 shi'wen'duan'zi
兼善天下 jian'shan'tian'xia
小葱拌豆腐 xiao'cong'ban'dou'fu
力有未逮 li'you'wei'dai
利利索索 li'li'suo'suo
炼石补天 lian'shi'bu'tian
知情识趣 zhi'qing'shi'qu
自作孽不可活 zi'zuo'nie'bu'ke'huo
目无尊长 mu'wu'zun'zhang
浓淡相宜 nong'dan'xiang'yi
风雨如磐 feng'yu'ru'pan
冷酷到底 leng'ku'dao'di
事不可为 shi'bu'ke'wei
担待不起 dan'dai'bu'qi
离情别绪 li'qing'bie'xu
众所瞩目 zhong'suo'zhu'mu
合作无间 he'zuo'wu'jian
派头十足 pai'tou'shi'zu
恩威并重 en'wei'bing'zhong
看人下菜碟 kan'ren'xia'cai'die
惠风和畅 hui'feng'he'chang
上知天文 shang'zhi'tian'wen
一唱三叹 yi'chang'san'tan
一把钥匙开一把锁 yi'ba'yao'shi'kai'yi'ba'suo
上了贼船 shang'le'zei'chuan
急人所急 ji'ren'suo'ji
难辨真伪 nan'bian'zhen'wei
万里江山 wan'li'jiang'shan
弄巧反拙 nong'qiao'fan'zhuo
妙手偶得 miao'shou'ou'de
仓皇出逃 cang'huang'chu'tao
山环水抱 shan'huan'shui'bao
大放悲声 da'fang'bei'sheng
明月清风 ming'yue'qing'feng
横眉竖眼 heng'mei'shu'yan
青眼有加 qing'yan'you'jia
穿山越岭 chuan'shan'yue'ling
沦落风尘 lun'luo'feng'chen
天遂人愿 tian'sui'ren'yuan
直接了当 zhi'jie'le'dang
烘云托月 hong'yun'tuo'yue
千秋万载 qian'qiu'wan'zai
天下奇观 tian'xia'qi'guan
眨眼之间 zha'yan'zhi'jian

花开两朵 hua'kai'liang'duo
有凤来仪 you'feng'lai'yi
悬梁刺股 xuan'liang'ci'gu
一语破的 yi'yu'po'de
世家子弟 shi'jia'zi'di
上天下地 shang'tian'xia'di
离题万里 li'ti'wan'li
邪魔歪道 xie'mo'wai'dao
囊空如洗 nang'kong'ru'xi
扭捏作态 niu'nie'zuo'tai
慌慌忙忙 huang'huang'mang'mang

笔墨官司 bi'mo'guan'si
法外施恩 fa'wai'shi'en

文采风流 wen'cai'feng'liu

大喝一声 da'he'yi'sheng
杀猪宰羊 sha'zhu'zai'yang
孰能无过 shu'neng'wu'guo

惊恐万分 jing'kong'wan'fen
世袭罔替 shi'xi'wang'ti
便宜没好货 bian'yi'mei'hao'huo
幅员广大 fu'yuan'guang'da
一时瑜亮 yi'shi'yu'liang
苦口良药 ku'kou'liang'yao
白发人送黑发人 bai'fa'ren'song'hei'fa'ren
宾朋满座 bin'peng'man'zuo
爽心悦目 shuang''yue'mu
狗嘴里吐不出象牙 gou'zui'li'tu'bu'chu'xiang'ya
无官一身轻 wu'guan'yi'shen'qing
物伤其类 wu'shang'qi'lei
虎入羊群 hu'ru'yang'qun
人强马壮 ren'qiang'ma'zhuang
不撞南墙不回头 bu'zhuang''qiang'bu'hui'tou
商山四皓 shang'shan'si'hao
大败亏输 da'bai'kui'shu
丝绸古道 si'chou'gu'dao
欺善怕恶 qi'shan'pa'e
不世之功 bu'shi'zhi'gong
盲人骑瞎马 mang'ren'qi'xia'ma
乘其不备 cheng'qi'bu'bei
济世救人 ji'shi'jiu'ren
空头交易 kong'tou'jiao'yi
塞翁失马焉知非福 sai'weng'shi'ma'yan'zhi'fei'fu
金玉其外败絮其中 jin'yu'qi'wai'bai'xu'qi'zhong
万夫不当之勇 wan'fu'bu'dang'zhi'yong
倾注全力 qing'zhu'quan'li
知难行易 zhi'nan'xing'yi
不露锋芒 bu'lu'feng'mang
豁然贯通 huo'ran'guan'tong
我为鱼肉 wo'wei'yu'rou
前途渺茫 qian'tu'miao'mang
万事俱备只欠东风 wan'shi'ju'bei'zhi'qian'dong'feng
恶语相加 e'yu'xiang'jia
不值一文 bu'zhi'yi'wen
其心必异 qi'xin'bi'yi
蹒跚而行 pan'shan'er'xing
记不起来 ji'bu'qi'lai
以血还血 yi'xue'hai'xue
文武之道 wen'wu'zhi'dao
擅自作主 shan'zi'zuo'zhu
投河自尽 tou'he'zi'jin
咬紧牙根 yao'jin'ya'gen
勒紧裤带 lei'jin'ku'dai
乘机而入 cheng'ji'er'ru
死而无怨 si'er'wu'yuan
黄口小儿 huang'kou'xiao'r
死生有命 si'sheng'you'ming
缄口不语 jian'kou'bu'yu
以备万一 yi'bei'wan'yi
一箭穿心 yi'jian'chuan'xin
毫无顾虑 hao'wu'gu'lv
不咸不淡 bu'xian'bu'dan
蜂拥而起 feng'yong'er'qi
渔人之利 yu'ren'zhi'li
毫不关心 hao'bu'guan'xin
报仇雪耻 bao'chou'xue'chi
能征惯战 neng'zheng'guan'zhan
疲劳轰炸 pi'lao'hong'zha
相形失色 xiang'xing'shi'se
岁月如流 sui'yue'ru'liu
猪朋狗友 zhu'peng'gou'you
龙行虎步 long'xing'hu'bu
置之死地而后快 zhi'zhi'si'di'er'hou'kuai
鲜衣怒马 xian'yi'nu'ma
污七八糟 wu'qi'ba'zao
名不正则言不顺 ming'bu'zheng'ze'yan'bu'shun
精力过人 jing'li'guo'ren
汗流夹背 han'liu'jia'bei
别无出路 bie'wu'chu'lu
喃喃细语 nan'nan'xi'yu
一片丹心 yi'pian'dan'xin
香消玉损 xiang'xiao'yu'sun
挨打受骂 ai'da'shou'ma
八百壮士 ba'bai'zhuang'
承欢膝下 cheng'huan'xi'xia
脸朝黄土背朝天 lian'chao'huang'tu'bei'chao'tian
封建割据 feng'jian'ge'ju
大碗喝酒 da'wan'he'jiu
必有一失 bi'you'yi'shi
修齐治平 xiu'qi'zhi'ping
必有我师 bi'you'wo'shi
名扬中外 ming'yang'zhong'wai
一脚踩空 yi'jiao'cai'kong
羚羊挂角 ling'yang'gua'jiao
一线光明 yi'xian'guang'ming
眼中钉肉中刺 yan'zhong'ding'rou'zhong'ci
吃穿用度 chi'chuan'yong'du
打铁趁热 da'tie'chen're
抱头大哭 bao'tou'da'ku
一夫当关万夫莫开 yi'fu'dang'guan'wan'fu'mo'kai
东游西逛 dong'you'xi'guang
又说又笑 you'shuo'you'xiao
步人后尘 bu'ren'hou'chen
是非之心 shi'fei'zhi'xin
坐地分赃 zuo'di'fen'zang
不求上进 bu'qiu'shang'jin
杯中之物 bei'zhong'zhi'wu
自报公议 zi'bao'gong'yi
上智下愚 shang'zhi'xia'yu
君君臣臣 jun'jun'chen'chen
学识渊博 xue'shi'yuan'bo
步步进逼 bu'bu'jin'bi
雍容典雅 yong'rong'dian'ya
不事生产 bu'shi'sheng'chan
未定之天 wei'ding'zhi'tian
妇人之见 fu'ren'zhi'jian
口乾舌燥 kou'gan'she'zao
开花结实 kai'hua'jie'shi
将欲取之 jiang'yu'qu'zhi
打蛇打七寸 da'she'da'qi'cun
疲倦不堪 pi'juan'bu'kan
骄横跋扈 jiao'heng'ba'hu
积习难改 ji'xi'nan'gai
一醉解千愁 yi'zui'jie'qian'chou
劫数难逃 jie'shu'nan'tao
怒从心起 nu'cong'xin'qi
完事大吉 wan'shi'da'ji
一溃千里 yi'kui'qian'li
最后五分钟 zui'hou'wu'fen'zhong
留住青春 liu'zhu'qing'chun
只听楼梯响 zhi'ting'lou'ti'xiang
因循苟且 yin'xun'gou'qie
要言不烦 yao'yan'bu'fan
一举成功 yi'ju'cheng'gong
欲火焚身 yu'huo'fen'shen
无容置疑 wu'rong'zhi'yi
七级浮屠 qi'ji'fu'tu
不能忘怀 bu'neng'wang'huai
唯舞独尊 wei'wu'du'zun
忽忽悠悠 hu'hu'you'you
旭日初升 xu'ri'chu'sheng
转悲为喜 zhuan'bei'wei'xi
大胆假设 da'dan'jia'she
凛然正气 lin'ran'zheng'qi
好心办坏事 hao'xin'ban'huai'shi
雄才伟略 xiong'cai'wei'e
人何以堪 ren'he'yi'kan
互相残杀 hu'xiang'can'sha
身在江湖 shen'zai'jiang'hu
当众出丑 dang'zhong'chu'chou
陌路相逢 mo'lu'xiang'feng
比手画脚 bi'shou'hua'jiao
文不加点 wen'bu'jia'dian
一搭一唱 yi'da'yi'chang

暗通款曲 an'tong'kuan'qu
油光水滑 you'guang'shui'hua
广开门路 guang'kai'men'lu
接人待物 jie'ren'dai'wu
烈火金刚 lie'huo'jin'gang
一片冰心 yi'pian'bing'xin
面色如土 mian'se'ru'tu
三千世界 san'qian'shi'jie

色艺双绝 se'yi'shuangjue'jue

忠臣义士 zhong'chen'yi'shi
终须一别 zhong'xu'yi'bie
无踪无影 wu'zong'wu'ying

有利有节 you'li'you'jie
民为邦本 min'wei'bang'ben

烈日当头 lie'ri'dang'tou
血肉相联 xue'rou'xiang'lian
胡吃海塞 hu'chi'hai'sai
葬身鱼腹 zang'shen'yu'fu
敏而好学 min'er'hao'xue
市井小人 shi'jing'xiao'ren
登门造访 deng'men'zao'fang
焚琴煮鹤 fen'qin'zhu'he
鹊巢鸠占 que'chao'jiu'zhan
以一当百 yi'yi'dang'bai
箪食壶浆 dan'shi'hu'jiang

横加干涉 heng'jia'gan'she
杳无踪迹 yao'wu'zong'ji
不安于室 bu'an'yu'shi
兵无常势 bing'wu'chang'shi
上穷碧落下黄泉 shang'qiong'bi'luo'xia'huang'quan
分毫不差 fen'hao'bu'cha
亲仁善邻 qin'ren'shan'lin

惹火上身 re'huo'shang'shen
专美于前 zhuan'mei'yu'qian
知耻近乎勇 zhi'chi'jin'hu'yong

舍得一身剐 she'de'yi'shen'gua

无头无尾 wu'tou'wu'wei
生活美满 sheng'huo'mei'man
又当别论 you'dang'bie'lun

不改其乐 bu'gai'qi'le
娉娉袅袅 ping'ping'niao'niao

海底捞针 hai'di'lao'zhen
窥豹一斑 kui'bao'yi'ban
远水难救近火 yuan'shui'nan'jiu'jin'huo
赏罚严明 shang'fa'yan'ming
相煎何急 xiang'jian'he'ji
若烹小鲜 ruo'peng'xiao'xian
人穷志不穷 ren'qiong'zhi'bu'qiong
天子门生 tian'zi'men'sheng
创造发明 chuangzao'zao'fa'ming
受命于天 shou'ming'yu'tian
敷衍搪塞 fu'yan'tang'sai
山高水远 shan'gao'shui'yuan
生米做成熟饭 sheng'mi'zuo'cheng'shu'fan
拜把兄弟 bai'ba'xiong'di
仁者乐山 ren'zhe'le'shan
行成于思 xing'cheng'yu'si
柔肠百结 rou'chang'bai'jie
吹胡子瞪眼睛 chui'hu'zi'deng'yan'jing
引咎自责 yin'jiu'zi'ze
开门揖盗 kai'men'yi'dao
众口一辞 zhong'kou'yi'ci
名声扫地 ming'sheng'sao'di
不以为怪 bu'yi'wei'guai
及笄之年 ji'ji'zhi'nian
野性难驯 ye'xing'nan'xun
孤苦零丁 gu'ku'ling'ding
以勤补拙 yi'qin'bu'zhuo
装点一新 zhuang''yi'xin
夹枪带棒 jia'qiang'dai'bang
出卖灵魂 chu'mai'ling'hun
协力同心 xie'li'tong'xin
水月镜花 shui'yue'jing'hua
确信无疑 que'xin'wu'yi
敢怒敢言 gan'nu'gan'yan
难登大雅之堂 nan'deng'da'ya'zhi'tang
支吾其词 zhi'wu'qi'ci
闷声闷气 men'sheng'men'qi
梦笔生花 meng'bi'sheng'hua
凿壁偷光 zao'bi'tou'guang
智勇兼备 zhi'yong'jian'bei
鹤林玉露 he'lin'yu'lu
恨入骨髓 hen'ru'gu'sui
低头认罪 di'tou'ren'zui
苟全性命 gou'quan'xing'ming
好奇害死猫 hao'qi'hai'si'mao
秉烛夜游 bing'zhu'ye'you
和衣而睡 he'yi'er'shui
舐犊之情 shi'du'zhi'qing
以绝后患 yi'jue'hou'huan
御敌于国门之外 yu'di'yu'guo'men'zhi'wai
傲然挺立 ao'ran'ting'li
萋萋芳草 qi'qi'fang'cao
神采焕发 shen'cai'huan'fa
奸夫淫妇 jian'fu'yin'fu
习焉不察 xi'yan'bu'cha
出言无状 chu'yan'wu'zhuang
盈盈一水 ying'ying'yi'shui
上梁不正 shang'liang'bu'zheng
大肆挥霍 da'si'hui'huo
梳洗打扮 shu'xi'da'ban
偷香窃玉 tou'xiang'qie'yu
中看不中吃 zhong'kan'bu'zhong'chi
阿谀逢迎 a'yu'feng'ying
耳目喉舌 er'mu'hou'she
情不自已 qing'bu'zi'yi
一分耕耘 yi'fen'geng'yun
碧草如茵 bi'cao'ru'yin
同出一辙 tong'chu'yi'zhe
一手包揽 yi'shou'bao'lan
肉眼凡胎 rou'yan'fan'tai
姑妄言之 gu'wang'yan'zhi
音容宛在 yin'rong'wan'zai
后悔不及 hou'hui'bu'ji
豪杰之士 hao'jie'zhi'shi
大人先生 da'ren'xian'sheng
东岳大帝 dong'yue'da'di
千金之躯 qian'jin'zhi'qu
官僚政治 guan'liao'zheng'zhi
养儿方知父母恩 yang'r'fang'zhi'fu'mu'en
足以自豪 zu'yi'zi'hao
无根之木 wu'gen'zhi'mu
哄然大笑 hong'ran'da'xiao
坐困愁城 zuo'kun'chou'cheng
贵不可言 gui'bu'ke'yan
向隅而泣 xiang'yu'er'qi
精诚所至 jing'cheng'suo'zhi
天理昭昭 tian'li'zhao'zhao
地覆天翻 di'fu'tian'fan
曲尽其妙 qu'jin'qi'miao
广征博引 guang'zheng'bo'yin
幕天席地 mu'tian'xi'di
漫天飞雪 man'tian'fei'xue
天下本无事 tian'xia'ben'wu'shi
草草收兵 cao'cao'shou'bing
逆我者亡 ni'wo'zhe'wang
门禁森严 men'jin'sen'yan
有进无出 you'jin'wu'chu
面有菜色 mian'you'cai'se
诛心之论 zhu'xin'zhi'lun
有行无市 you'xing'wu'shi
逆水行舟不进则退 ni'shui'xing'zhou'bu'jin'ze'tui
不改初衷 bu'gai'chu'zhong
寸金难买寸光阴 cun'jin'nan'mai'cun'guang'yin
故技重演 gu'ji'zhong'yan
以其昏昏 yi'qi'hun'hun
悱恻缠绵 fei'ce'chan'mian
各霸一方 ge'ba'yi'fang
人多口杂 ren'duo'kou'za
门生故吏 men'sheng'gu'li
拈花一笑 nian'hua'yi'xiao
心腹之人 xin'fu'zhi'ren

大中至正 da'zhong'zhi'zheng
六出祁山 liu'chu'qi'shan

力不能及 li'bu'neng'ji
无边无涯 wu'bian'wu'ya
令人齿冷 ling'ren'chi'leng
病来如山倒 bing'lai'ru'shan'dao
显露端倪 xian'lu'duan'ni
鸡鸣犬吠 ji'ming'quan'fei
暴露目标 bao'lu'mu'biao
命里有时终须有 ming'li'you'shi'zhong'xu'you
悲观厌世 bei'guan'yan'shi
金马碧鸡 jin'ma'bi'ji
百媚千娇 bai'mei'qian'jiao
出师有名 chu'shi'you'ming

动魄惊心 dong'po'jing'xin

势成水火 shi'cheng'shui'huo

人单势孤 ren'dan'shi'gu
不蔓不枝 bu'man'bu'zhi

优胜劣败 you'sheng'lie'bai
不是省油的灯 bu'shi'sheng'you'de'deng

书香人家 shu'xiang'ren'jia
仆仆风尘 pu'pu'feng'chen
声色不动 sheng'se'bu'dong
纲常伦理 gang'chang'lun'li
恩威并用 en'wei'bing'yong
尽忠职守 jin'zhong'zhi'shou
三起三落 san'qi'san'luo
一个不留神 yi'ge'bu'liu'shen

相辅而行 xiang'fu'er'xing

偷鸡不着蚀把米 tou'ji'bu'zhe'shi'ba'mi
寿山福海 shou'shan'fu'hai
世态人情 shi'tai'ren'qing
爱国一家 ai'guo'yi'jia
绝不护短 jue'bu'hu'duan
唯一无二 wei'yi'wu'er
解惑释疑 jie'huo'shi'yi
唇干舌燥 chun'gan'she'zao
贪小失大 tan'xiao'shi'da
千乘之国 qian'cheng'zhi'guo
唾面自干 tuo'mian'zi'gan
狮子大张口 shi'zi'da'zhang'kou
身无寸缕 shen'wu'cun'lv
没齿不忘 mei'chi'bu'wang
桑间濮上 sang'jian'pu'shang
屏声静气 ping'sheng'jing'qi
超人一等 chao'ren'yi'deng
忽起忽落 hu'qi'hu'luo
三杯两盏 san'bei'liang'zhan
改过迁善 gai'guo'qian'shan
见景生情 jian'jing'sheng'qing
荼毒生灵 tu'du'sheng'ling
居大不易 ju'da'bu'yi
前程万里 qian'cheng'wan'li
贸然行事 mao'ran'xing'shi
一饭之恩 yi'fan'zhi'en
奇光异彩 qi'guang'yi'cai
顺我者昌逆我者亡 shun'wo'zhe'chang'ni'wo'zhe'wang
无本生意 wu'ben'sheng'yi
骨肉至亲 gu'rou'zhi'qin
当场被捕 dang'chang'bei'bu
年少气盛 nian'shao'qi'sheng
流水行云 liu'shui'xing'yun
三十六天 san'shi'liu'tian
不屈不饶 bu'qu'bu'rao
太上忘情 tai'shang'wang'qing
清水出芙蓉 qing'shui'chu'fu'rong
漫天遍野 man'tian'bian'ye
口角流涎 kou'jiao'liu'xian
弓马娴熟 gong'ma'xian'shu
天王老子 tian'wang'lao'zi
不知就里 bu'zhi'jiu'li
泪下如雨 lei'xia'ru'yu
上下同欲 shang'xia'tong'yu
旧恨新仇 jiu'hen'xin'chou
发愤忘食 fa'fen'wang'shi
碧空万里 bi'kong'wan'li
民穷财尽 min'qiong'cai'jin
进德修业 jin'de'xiu'ye
不食周粟 bu'shi'zhou'su
挨门逐户 ai'men'zhu'hu
万事亨通 wan'shi'heng'tong

对症用药 dui'zheng'yong'yao
形格势禁 xing'ge'shi'jin
凉了半截 liang'le'ban'jie

聚众滋事 ju'zhong'zi'shi
劝善惩恶 quan'shan'cheng'e
改弦易张 gai'xian'yi'zhang

羽化成仙 yu'hua'cheng'xian
挨挨挤挤 ai'ai'ji'ji
信而好古 xin'er'hao'gu
问鼎中原 wen'ding'zhong'yuan
寸草春晖 cun'cao'chun'hui

大肆攻击 da'si'gong'ji
忤逆不孝 wu'ni'bu'xiao
柴米夫妻 chai'mi'fu'qi
敬老尊贤 jing'lao'zun'xian
名士风流 ming'shi'feng'liu
以求一逞 yi'qiu'yi'cheng
人情之常 ren'qing'zhi'chang
目无余子 mu'wu'yu'zi
玩人丧德 wan'ren'sang'de
饭后茶余 fan'hou'cha'yu
不瘟不火 bu'wen'bu'huo
聊备一格 liao'bei'yi'ge
卖狗皮膏药 mai'gou'pi'gao'yao

秉公办事 bing'gong'ban'shi

不得不低头 bu'de'bu'di'tou
将熊熊一窝 jiang'xiong'xiong'yi'wo
嘴上无毛 zui'shang'wu'mao
彷徨失措 fang'huang'shi'cuo
削职为民 xue'zhi'wei'min

嚣张一时 ao'zhang'yi'shi

引以为憾 yin'yi'wei'han

小试锋芒 xiao'shi'feng'mang
亲痛仇快 qin'tong'chou'kuai
伏尸百万 fu'shi'bai'wan
蔫头耷脑 nian'tou'da'nao
干将莫邪 gan'jiang'mo'xie

开场锣鼓 kai'chang'luo'gu
娇声娇气 jiao'sheng'jiao'qi
民惟邦本 min'wei'bang'ben

历历可见 li'li'ke'jian
念念不舍 nian'nian'bu'she
舍身求法 she'shen'qiu'fa

轻拢慢捻 qing'long'man'nian
能伸能屈 neng'shen'neng'qu

抽抽搭搭 chou'chou'da'da

纸里包不住火 zhi'li'bao'bu'zhu'huo

视财如命 shi'cai'ru'ming
八仙过海各显其能 ba'xian'guo'hai'ge'xian'qi'neng
眼明心亮 yan'ming'xin'liang
官官相卫 guan'guan'xiang'wei
来处不易 lai'chu'bu'yi
仁民爱物 ren'min'ai'wu
树犹如此 shu'you'ru'ci
缺心少肺 que'xin'shao'fei
不守本分 bu'shou'ben'fen
点头会意 dian'tou'hui'yi
吃香的喝辣的 chi'xiang'de'he'la'de
应运而出 ying'yun'er'chu
如如不动 ru'ru'bu'dong
秘不示人 mi'bu'shi'ren
陈旧不堪 chen'jiu'bu'kan
恩恩相报 en'en'xiang'bao
礼乐征伐 li'le'zheng'fa
迷途羔羊 mi'tu'gao'yang
封狼居胥 feng'lang'ju'xu
风寒暑湿 feng'han'shu'shi
有负众望 you'fu'zhong'wang
溯流而上 su'liu'er'shang
各得其宜 ge'de'qi'yi
鬼鬼崇崇 gui'gui'chong'chong
望风而降 wang'feng'er'jiang
焦灼不安 jiao'zhuo'bu'an
红花绿叶 hong'hua'lv'ye
心之所向 xin'zhi'suo'xiang
莫逆于心 mo'ni'yu'xin
流血漂橹 liu'xue'piao'lu
摔摔打打 shuai'shuai'da'da
吃人不吐骨头 chi'ren'bu'tu'gu'tou
所费不赀 suo'fei'bu'zi
健壮如牛 jian'zhuangru'ru'niu
弯弯扭扭 wan'wan'niu'niu
时不可失 shi'bu'ke'shi
黄山归来不看岳 huang'shan'gui'lai'bu'kan'yue
创作冲动 chuang''chong'dong
疏不间亲 shu'bu'jian'qin
痛打一顿 tong'da'yi'dun
独木难成林 du'mu'nan'cheng'lin
勾三搭四 gou'san'da'si
三年不成 san'nian'bu'cheng
历久常新 li'jiu'chang'xin
不能出口 bu'neng'chu'kou
夹起尾巴 jia'qi'wei'ba
饮中八仙 yin'zhong'ba'xian
国人暴动 guo'ren'bao'dong
络驿不绝 luo'yi'bu'jue
气急攻心 qi'ji'gong'xin
巨细靡遗 ju'xi'mi'yi
长亭送别 zhang'ting'song'bie
书香门弟 shu'xiang'men'di
看朱成碧 kan'zhu'cheng'bi
烈士暮年 lie'shi'mu'nian
黏黏糊糊 nian'nian'hu'hu
功遂身退 gong'sui'shen'tui
袒胸露背 tan'xiong'lu'bei
挤作一团 ji'zuo'yi'tuan
窃玉偷香 qie'yu'tou'xiang
补偏救弊 bu'pian'jiu'bi
罚不当罪 fa'bu'dang'zui
意气消沉 yi'qi'xiao'chen
不胜感激 bu'sheng'gan'ji
严加惩处 yan'jia'cheng'chu
好手如云 hao'shou'ru'yun
金钱万能 jin'qian'wan'neng
哑巴吃黄莲 ya'ba'chi'huang'lian
挈妇将雏 qie'fu'jiang'chu
仙山楼阁 xian'shan'lou'ge
一抔黄土 yi'pou'huang'tu
东飘西荡 dong'piao'xi'dang
安定因素 an'ding'yin'su
同心合意 tong'xin'he'yi
富强康乐 fu'qiang'kang'le
杀人不用刀 sha'ren'bu'yong'dao
涸辙之鲋 he'zhe'zhi'fu
冒大不韪 mao'da'bu'wei
烈火燎原 lie'huo'liao'yuan
求名求利 qiu'ming'qiu'li
志满意得 zhi'man'yi'de
缚鸡之力 fu'ji'zhi'li
余波荡漾 yu'bo'dang'yang
街谈巷语 jie'tan'xiang'yu
随波漂流 sui'bo'piao'liu
不打不成相识 bu'da'bu'cheng'xiang'shi
脸不红心不跳 lian'bu'hong'xin'bu'tiao
相应不理 xiang'ying'bu'li
冠盖如云 guan'gai'ru'yun
目不交睫 mu'bu'jiao'jie
开启民智 kai'qi'min'zhi
致君尧舜 zhi'jun'yao'shun
昂然挺立 ang'ran'ting'li
蔚为奇观 wei'wei'qi'guan
令人起敬 ling'ren'qi'jing
好梦难圆 hao'meng'nan'yuan
打如意算盘 da'ru'yi'suan'pan
法不阿贵 fa'bu'a'gui
踌躇未决 chou'chu'wei'jue
白手兴家 bai'shou'xing'jia
成事不足败事有余 cheng'shi'bu'zu'bai'shi'you'yu
游必有方 you'bi'you'fang
群而不党 qun'er'bu'dang
风雨飘零 feng'yu'piao'ling
欢呼鼓舞 huan'hu'gu'wu
高门大户 gao'men'da'hu
地旷人稀 di'kuang'ren'xi
瓦解冰消 wa'jie'bing'xiao
虎豹豺狼 hu'bao'chai'lang
昏昏暗暗 hun'hun'an'an
半死半活 ban'si'ban'huo
诗无达诂 shi'wu'da'gu
欢声如雷 huan'sheng'ru'lei
文章巨公 wen'zhang'ju'gong
若存若亡 ruo'cun'ruo'wang
饿鬼投胎 e'gui'tou'tai
择主而事 ze'zhu'er'shi
酒楼茶肆 jiu'lou'cha'si
言简意深 yan'jian'yi'shen
声如裂帛 sheng'ru'lie'bo
疙里疙瘩 ge'li'ge'da
变生不测 bian'sheng'bu'ce
当垫脚石 dang'dian'jiao'shi
凭白无故 ping'bai'wu'gu
步态蹒跚 bu'tai'pan'shan
不分主次 bu'fen'zhu'ci
不忧不惧 bu'you'bu'ju
素昧生平 su'mei'sheng'ping
开物成务 kai'wu'cheng'wu
狐朋狗党 hu'peng'gou'dang
雪肤花貌 xue'fu'hua'mao

颜筋柳骨 yan'jin'liu'gu
朝不虑夕 chao'bu'lv'xi
弃如敝屣 qi'ru'bi'xi
鲜廉寡耻 xian'lian'gua'chi
踵事增华 zhong'shi'zeng'hua
百里不同俗 bai'li'bu'tong'su
秋色平分 qiu'se'ping'fen
八字还没有一撇 ba'zi'hai'mei'you'yi'pie
花香四季 hua'xiang'si'ji
朱唇皓齿 zhu'chun'hao'chi
立业成家 li'ye'cheng'jia
徒托空言 tu'tuo'kong'yan

光说不练假把式 guang'shuo'bu'lian'jia'ba'shi
藏之名山 cang'zhi'ming'shan

效果叠加 xiao'guo'die'jia
无父无君 wu'fu'wu'jun
千岩万壑 qian'yan'wan'he
高官显爵 gao'guan'xian'jue

见素抱朴 jian'su'bao'pu
铭记不忘 ming'ji'bu'wang
蛟龙得水 jiao'long'de'shui
于今为烈 yu'jin'wei'lie
伴君如伴虎 ban'jun'ru'ban'hu
圣之时者 sheng'zhi'shi'zhe
刻骨仇恨 ke'gu'chou'hen
色字头上一把刀 se'zi'tou'shang'yi'ba'dao
茶余酒后 cha'yu'jiu'hou
余勇可贾 yu'yong'ke'gu
勇而无谋 yong'er'wu'mou
不鸣则已一鸣惊人 bu'ming'ze'yi'yi'ming'jing'ren
一世之雄 yi'shi'zhi'xiong
风雨凄凄 feng'yu'qi'qi
万目睽睽 wan'mu'kui'kui
复仇雪耻 fu'chou'xue'chi
五男二女 wu'nan'er'nv
挨打受气 ai'da'shou'qi
仰之弥高 yang'zhi'mi'gao
不如意事常八九 bu'ru'yi'shi'chang'ba'jiu
意马心猿 yi'ma'xin'yuan
蜃楼海市 shen'lou'hai'shi
夷夏之防 yi'xia'zhi'fang
千里之堤毁于蚁穴 qian'li'zhi'di'hui'yu'yi'xue
不欺暗室 bu'qi'an'shi
毫厘不爽 hao'li'bu'shuang
尽付东流 jin'fu'dong'liu
守正不阿 shou'zheng'bu'a
不识泰山 bu'shi'tai'shan
静不露机 jing'bu'lu'ji
食洋不化 shi'yang'bu'hua
儒雅风流 ru'ya'feng'liu
穷寇勿追 qiong'kou'wu'zhui
富有天下 fu'you'tian'xia
关山飞渡 guan'shan'fei'du
年方弱冠 nian'fang'ruo'guan
蒋干盗书 jiang'gan'dao'shu
死而无悔 si'er'wu'hui
爱不忍释 ai'bu'ren'shi
不值一笑 bu'zhi'yi'xiao
囊括四海 nang'kuo'si'hai
春困秋乏 chun'kun'qiu'fa
月黑杀人 yue'hei'sha'ren
瞻仰遗容 zhan'yang'yi'rong
持久之计 chi'jiu'zhi'ji
管窥蠡测 guan'kui'li'ce
七窍冒烟 qi'qiao'mao'yan
惜香怜玉 xi'xiang'lian'yu
光彩耀目 guang'cai'yao'mu
付诸一笑 fu'zhu'yi'xiao
进攻姿态 jin'gong'zi'tai
别具慧眼 bie'ju'hui'yan
顽石点头 wan'shi'dian'tou

熊心豹胆 xiong'xin'bao'dan
宽猛相济 kuan'meng'xiang'ji
片纸只字 pian'zhi'zhi'zi

狮子搏兔 shi'zi'bo'tu
人鬼殊途 ren'gui'shu'tu
漠不相关 mo'bu'xiang'guan
喜眉笑眼 xi'mei'xiao'yan
满口应允 man'kou'ying'yun
出谋画策 chu'mou'hua'ce

有女怀春 you'nv'huai'chun

舍己从人 she'ji'cong'ren

一至于斯 yi'zhi'yu'si

冠绝一时 guan'jue'yi'shi

一丈五尺 yi'zhang'wu'chi

长空万里 zhang'kong'wan'li
百般折磨 bai'ban'zhe'mo
军容风纪 jun'rong'feng'ji
不当人子 bu'dang'ren'zi
一蟹不如一蟹 yi'xie'bu'ru'yi'xie
慨然允诺 kai'ran'yun'nuo
确非易事 que'fei'yi'shi
举止失措 ju'zhi'shi'cuo
吸风饮露 xi'feng'yin'lu
秋毫不犯 qiu'hao'bu'fan
一时权宜 yi'shi'quan'yi
贪婪无厌 tan'lan'wu'yan
正颜厉色 zheng'yan'li'se
声威大震 sheng'wei'da'zhen
戴玄履黄 dai'xuan'lv'huang
哀哀欲绝 ai'ai'yu'jue
神魂飘荡 shen'hun'piao'dang
离题太远 li'ti'tai'yuan
刚毅果断 gang'yi'guo'duan
人比黄花瘦 ren'bi'huang'hua'shou
夙夜匪懈 su'ye'fei'xie
连日连夜 lian'ri'lian'ye
一日三秋 yi'ri'san'qiu
世上无双 shi'shang'wu'shuang
一字值千金 yi'zi'zhi'qian'jin
走为上着 zou'wei'shang'zhe
乱扣帽子 luan'kou'mao'zi
达则兼善天下 da'ze'jian'shan'tian'xia
贪多务得 tan'duo'wu'de
富国强民 fu'guo'qiang'min
革职留任 ge'zhi'liu'ren
利出一孔 li'chu'yi'kong
在所不免 zai'suo'bu'mian
乳臭未乾 ru'chou'wei'gan
以虚带实 yi'xu'dai'shi
悦目赏心 yue'mu'shang'xin
眼光短浅 yan'guang'duan'qian
非学无以广才 fei'xue'wu'yi'guang'cai
袖里玄机 xiu'li'xuan'ji
明火执杖 ming'huo'zhi'zhang
民无信不立 min'wu'xin'bu'li
六根清静 liu'gen'qing'jing
人五人六 ren'wu'ren'liu
旌旗蔽日 jing'qi'bi'ri
天道好还 tian'dao'hao'hai
化民成俗 hua'min'cheng'su
应运而起 ying'yun'er'qi
敬鬼神而远之 jing'gui'shen'er'yuan'zhi
不谋私利 bu'mou'si'li
神奇莫测 shen'qi'mo'ce
妻贤夫祸少 qi'xian'fu'huo'shao
桃李遍天下 tao'li'bian'tian'xia
见色起意 jian'se'qi'yi
完美境界 wan'mei'jing'jie
善善恶恶 shan'shan'e'e
公私两利 gong'si'liang'li
流连光景 liu'lian'guang'jing
手脑并用 shou'nao'bing'yong
一死一生 yi'si'yi'sheng
盘肠大战 pan'chang'da'zhan
矜矜业业 guan'guan'ye'ye
祸福与共 huo'fu'yu'gong
聊以自娱 liao'yi'zi'yu
龙血玄黄 long'xue'xuan'huang
三言两句 san'yan'liang'ju
求全之毁 qiu'quan'zhi'hui
信而见疑 xin'er'jian'yi
余悸犹存 yu'ji'you'cun
千金之体 qian'jin'zhi'ti
平生之志 ping'sheng'zhi'zhi
得鱼忘筌 de'yu'wang'quan
亡国之臣 wang'guo'zhi'chen

取其精华去其糟粕 qu'qi'jing'hua'qu'qi'zao'po
沁人心肺 qin'ren'xin'fei
卓识远见 zhuo'shi'yuan'jian
真伪莫辨 zhen'wei'mo'bian

苦其心志 ku'qi'xin'zhi
谈玄说妙 tan'xuan'shuo'miao
抱有成见 bao'you'cheng'jian

高高下下 gao'gao'xia'xia

名从主人 ming'cong'zhu'ren
渲染烘托 xuan'ran'hong'tuo
东家长西家短 dong'jia'zhang'xi'jia'duan
安安逸逸 an'an'yi'yi
尧天舜日 yao'tian'shun'ri
多行不义 duo'xing'bu'yi
管窥之见 guan'kui'zhi'jian
有名有利 you'ming'you'li
耍笔杆子 shua'bi'gan'zi
忙忙乱乱 mang'mang'luan'luan
旁徵博引 pang'zheng'bo'yin
房谋杜断 fang'mou'du'duan
怒气填胸 nu'qi'tian'xiong
独运匠心 du'yun'jiang'xin
千秋万古 qian'qiu'wan'gu
高手林立 gao'shou'lin'li
糜烂不堪 mei'lan'bu'kan
高山景行 gao'shan'jing'xing
本小利薄 ben'xiao'li'bao
时乖命蹇 shi'guai'ming'jian
中通外直 zhong'tong'wai'zhi
主辱臣死 zhu'ru'chen'si
情如兄弟 qing'ru'xiong'di
驾鹤西游 jia'he'xi'you
疾风迅雷 ji'feng'xun'lei
富贵双全 fu'gui'shuang'
狂风怒吼 kuang'feng'nu'hou
不虞之誉 bu'yu'zhi'yu
相继而至 xiang'ji'er'zhi
免冠徒跣 mian'guan'tu'xian
急不择言 ji'bu'ze'yan
今是昨非 jin'shi'zuo'fei
千不该万不该 qian'bu'gai'wan'bu'gai

行空天马 xing'kong'tian'ma

勇不可当 yong'bu'ke'dang

高枕而卧 gao'zhen'er'wo

积小成大 ji'xiao'cheng'da
国色天姿 guo'se'tian'zi

捷足先得 jie'zu'xian'de
齐眉举案 qi'mei'ju'an

桃李无言 tao'li'wu'yan

有祸同当 you'huo'tong'dang
余香满口 yu'xiang'man'kou
不打无把握之仗 bu'da'wu'ba'wo'zhi'zhang
优孟衣冠 you'meng'yi'guan

刚毅果敢 gang'yi'guo'gan

孰敢不正 shu'gan'bu'zheng
有闲阶级 you'xian'jie'ji
魏武挥鞭 wei'wu'hui'bian
天策上将 tian'ce'shang'jiang
神志昏迷 shen'zhi'hun'mi
远近兼顾 yuan'jin'jian'gu
一代佳人 yi'dai'jia'ren
三分像人 san'fen'xiang'ren
杂花生树 za'hua'sheng'shu
笼盖四野 long'gai'si'ye
能人所不能 neng'ren'suo'bu'neng
南柯太守 nan'ke'tai'shou
皇天上帝 huang'tian'shang'di
神仙眷属 shen'xian'juan'shu
北朝民歌 bei'chao'min'ge
宵小之徒 xiao'xiao'zhi'tu
谦恭有礼 qian'gong'you'li
恬淡寡欲 tian'dan'gua'yu
站有站相 zhan'you'zhan'xiang
独行其是 du'xing'qi'shi
目空四海 mu'kong'si'hai
隐忍不言 yin'ren'bu'yan
龙子龙孙 long'zi'long'sun
桃李年华 tao'li'nian'hua
肘腋之患 zhou'ye'zhi'huan
厚彼薄此 hou'bi'bao'ci
儿大不由娘 r'da'bu'you'niang
囿于成见 you'yu'cheng'jian
追昔抚今 zhui'xi'fu'jin
高飞远走 gao'fei'yuan'zou
不期然而然 bu'qi'ran'er'ran
七死八活 qi'si'ba'huo
群情鼎沸 qun'qing'ding'fei
桃花人面 tao'hua'ren'mian
心劳日拙 xin'lao'ri'zhuo
骑驴看唱本 qi'lv'kan'chang'ben
擅作威福 shan'zuo'wei'fu
千虑一失 qian'lv'yi'shi
奋不顾生 fen'bu'gu'sheng
拓土开疆 ta'tu'kai'jiang
天然浑成 tian'ran'hun'cheng
察纳雅言 cha'na'ya'yan
独立寒秋 du'li'han'qiu
圣人不仁 sheng'ren'bu'ren
山舞银蛇 shan'wu'yin'she
荷花盛开 he'hua'sheng'kai
脱不了身 tuo'bu'le'shen
下笔如有神 xia'bi'ru'you'shen
上下为难 shang'xia'wei'nan
一德一心 yi'de'yi'xin
大哉孔子 da'zai'kong'zi
劈天盖地 pi'tian'gai'di
绘影绘声 hui'ying'hui'sheng
哀鸿遍地 ai'hong'bian'di
观望徘徊 guan'wang'pai'huai
居停主人 ju'ting'zhu'ren
鬼神不测 gui'shen'bu'ce
全须全尾 quan'xu'quan'wei
箫韶九成 xiao'shao'jiu'cheng
十目所视 shi'mu'suo'shi
昏庸无道 hun'yong'wu'dao
亡魂丧胆 wang'hun'sang'dan
安分守已 an'fen'shou'yi
舍命救人 she'ming'jiu'ren
粉装玉琢 fen'zhuang''zuo
如痴如迷 ru'chi'ru'mi
境由心造 jing'you'xin'zao
有物有则 you'wu'you'ze
恩威并济 en'wei'bing'ji
有头没尾 you'tou'mei'wei
裂石穿云 lie'shi'chuan'yun
摩顶放踵 mo'ding'fang'zhong
伤心惨目 shang'xin'can'mu
封侯拜将 feng'hou'bai'jiang
再见天日 zai'jian'tian'ri
化性起伪 hua'xing'qi'wei
变化不测 bian'hua'bu'ce
聪明正直 cong'ming'zheng'zhi
盛衰荣辱 sheng'shuai'rong'ru
熹平石经 xi'ping'shi'jing
十手所指 shi'shou'suo'zhi
拂衣而去 fu'yi'er'qu
势倾朝野 shi'qing'chao'ye
赤壁鏖兵 chi'bi'ao'bing
惨遭不幸 can'zao'bu'xing
久经风霜 jiu'jing'feng'shuang
自我作古 zi'wo'zuo'gu
一代楷模 yi'dai'jie'mo
比肩继踵 bi'jian'ji'zhong
高攀不上 gao'pan'bu'shang
行所无事 xing'suo'wu'shi
扇枕温衾 shan'zhen'wen'qin
琪花瑶草 qi'hua'yao'cao
履霜坚冰 lv'shuang''bing
蜗行牛步 wo'xing'niu'bu
跑马观花 pao'ma'guan'hua
人满之患 ren'man'zhi'huan
不甘雌伏 bu'gan'ci'fu
从此往后 cong'ci'wang'hou
乱世之音 luan'shi'zhi'yin
破颜一笑 po'yan'yi'xiao
贪生畏死 tan'sheng'wei'si
瘦骨嶙嶙 shou'gu'lin'lin
备战备荒 bei'zhan'bei'huang
破釜沈舟 po'fu'shen'zhou
敲榨勒索 qiao'zha'lei'suo
称心快意 cheng'xin'kuai'yi
百不失一 bai'bu'shi'yi
钻头觅缝 zuan'tou'mi'feng
寂然无声 ji'ran'wu'sheng
蟒袍玉带 mang'pao'yu'dai
柔情密意 rou'qing'mi'yi
成人不自在 cheng'ren'bu'zi'zai
食前方丈 shi'qian'fang'zhang
弃本逐末 qi'ben'zhu'mo
苗条淑女 miao'tiao'shu'nv
任所欲为 ren'suo'yu'wei
丹青妙笔 dan'qing'miao'bi
报怨以德 bao'yuan'yi'de
公私两便 gong'si'liang'bian
交淡若水 jiao'dan'ruo'shui
睹物伤情 du'wu'shang'qing
地崩山摧 di'beng'shan'cui
单丝不成线 dan'si'bu'cheng'xian
首尾两端 shou'wei'liang'duan
坐而待毙 zuo'er'dai'bi
瞎子点灯白费蜡 xia'zi'dian'deng'bai'fei'la
请将不如激将 qing'jiang'bu'ru'ji'jiang
探马赤军 tan'ma'chi'jun
假凤虚凰 jia'feng'xu'huang
高人逸士 gao'ren'yi'shi
功盖天下 gong'gai'tian'xia
人生在勤 ren'sheng'zai'qin
渺无踪影 miao'wu'zong'ying
木强则折 mu'qiang'ze'zhe
存心养性 cun'xin'yang'xing
小惩大戒 xiao'cheng'da'jie
打狗看主人 da'gou'kan'zhu'ren
玉润珠圆 yu'run'zhu'yuan
长生不灭 zhang'sheng'bu'mie
知我罪我 zhi'wo'zui'wo
趋之如鹜 qu'zhi'ru'wu
无所用之 wu'suo'yong'zhi
调和鼎鼐 diao'he'ding'nai
无足重轻 wu'zu'zhong'qing
计将安出 ji'jiang'an'chu
略窥一斑 e'kui'yi'ban
东奔西窜 dong'ben'xi'cuan
文笔流畅 wen'bi'liu'chang
患难相扶 huan'nan'xiang'fu
匹马单枪 pi'ma'dan'qiang
主忧臣辱 zhu'you'chen'ru
刀山剑林 dao'shan'jian'lin

中轴对称 zhong'zhou'dui'cheng
前言往行 qian'yan'wang'xing
五日京兆 wu'ri'jing'zhao
吴带当风 wu'dai'dang'feng
更弦易辙 geng'xian'yi'zhe
誓不甘休 shi'bu'gan'xiu
目见耳闻 mu'jian'er'wen
胸中丘壑 xiong'zhong'qiu'he
通天本领 tong'tian'ben'ling
规矩准绳 gui'ju'zhun'sheng
大勇若怯 da'yong'ruo'qie

增收减支 zeng'shou'jian'zhi
不轨之徒 bu'gui'zhi'tu

蓝田种玉 lan'tian'zhong'yu

禄在其中 lu'zai'qi'zhong
浑身发软 hun'shen'fa'ruan
品目繁多 pin'mu'fan'duo
头脑发胀 tou'nao'fa'zhang

白日青天 bai'ri'qing'tian

盘根究底 pan'gen'jiu'di

见微知着 jian'wei'zhi'zhe
方枘圆凿 fang'rui'yuan'zao
掷果盈车 zhi'guo'ying'che
二姓之好 er'xing'zhi'hao
慷慨仗义 kang'kai'zhang'yi

以管窥豹 yi'guan'kui'bao
捧到天上 peng'dao'tian'shang
扁舟一叶 bian'zhou'yi'ye

瓜分豆剖 gua'fen'dou'pou
莺啼燕语 ying'ti'yan'yu

察颜观色 cha'yan'guan'se

率尔操觚 lv'er'cao'gu
举国哗然 ju'guo'hua'ran
招权纳贿 zhao'quan'na'hui
钩深致远 gou'shen'zhi'yuan
遮天盖日 zhe'tian'gai'ri
听风是雨 ting'feng'shi'yu
人生如朝露 ren'sheng'ru'chao'lu
野无遗贤 ye'wu'yi'xian
拉人下水 la'ren'xia'shui
不孚众望 bu'fu'zhong'wang
粉面朱唇 fen'mian'zhu'chun
遮人眼目 zhe'ren'yan'mu
散散落落 san'san'luo'luo
你推我让 ni'tui'wo'rang
黄卷青灯 huang'juan'qing'deng
死气白赖 si'qi'bai'lai
法不传六耳 fa'bu'chuan'liu'er
一浪更比一浪高 yi'lang'geng'bi'yi'lang'gao
不听老人言 bu'ting'lao'ren'yan
一板三眼 yi'ban'san'yan
郁郁青青 yu'yu'qing'qing
好狗不挡道 hao'gou'bu'dang'dao
天崩地坼 tian'beng'di'che
玲珑八面 ling'long'ba'mian
蔼然可亲 ai'ran'ke'qin
无稽之言 wu'ji'zhi'yan
老蚌生珠 lao'bang'sheng'zhu
传之无穷 chuan'zhi'wu'qiong
谋事在人成事在天 mou'shi'zai'ren'cheng'shi'zai'tian
皓月千里 hao'yue'qian'li
以恶报恶 yi'e'bao'e
日暮穷途 ri'mu'qiong'tu
彩云易散 cai'yun'yi'san
跋扈将军 ba'hu'jiang'jun
浑然无知 hun'ran'wu'zhi
随物赋形 sui'wu'fu'xing
猜三划五 cai'san'hua'wu
心动神驰 xin'dong'shen'chi
嗒然若丧 da'ran'ruo'sang
七长八短 qi'zhang'ba'duan
胆大如斗 dan'da'ru'dou
炎凉世态 yan'liang'shi'tai
百身莫赎 bai'shen'mo'shu
锦瑟华年 jin'se'hua'nian
进退为难 jin'tui'wei'nan
乌飞兔走 wu'fei'tu'zou
空手夺白刃 kong'shou'duo'bai'ren
滚瓜溜圆 gun'gua'liu'yuan
无可不可 wu'ke'bu'ke
内应外合 nei'ying'wai'he
满而不溢 man'er'bu'yi
钻心刺骨 zuan'xin'ci'gu
深谷为陵 shen'gu'wei'ling
一吹一唱 yi'chui'yi'chang
因人而施 yin'ren'er'shi
参天两地 can'tian'liang'di
卑辞厚礼 bei'ci'hou'li
意义深长 yi'yi'shen'zhang
富贵寿考 fu'gui'shou'kao
名公巨卿 ming'gong'ju'qing
夸夸而谈 kua'kua'er'tan
方生方死 fang'sheng'fang'si
扫除天下 sao'chu'tian'xia
恺悌君子 kai'ti'jun'zi
扫地以尽 sao'di'yi'jin
理有固然 li'you'gu'ran
山岳崩颓 shan'yue'beng'tui
死者相枕 si'zhe'xiang'zhen
以类相从 yi'lei'xiang'cong
不幸而言中 bu'xing'er'yan'zhong
脱裤子放屁 tuo'ku'zi'fang'pi
神头鬼脸 shen'tou'gui'lian
神荼郁垒 shen'tu'yu'lei
重义轻生 zhong'yi'qing'sheng
安营下寨 an'ying'xia'zhai
文风不动 wen'feng'bu'dong
贻人口实 yi'ren'kou'shi
悔之何及 hui'zhi'he'ji
模山范水 mo'shan'fan'shui
群起攻击 qun'qi'gong'ji
生死以之 sheng'si'yi'zhi
风中残烛 feng'zhong'can'zhu
未经人道 wei'jing'ren'dao
冠盖相望 guan'gai'xiang'wang
三灾八难 san'zai'ba'nan
待嫁闺中 dai'jia'gui'zhong
无缚鸡之力 wu'fu'ji'zhi'li
鹤鸣九皋 he'ming'jiu'gao
理过其辞 li'guo'qi'ci
声色狗马 sheng'se'gou'ma
无咎无誉 wu'jiu'wu'yu
迁善改过 qian'shan'gai'guo
一代儒宗 yi'dai'ru'zong
独步一时 du'bu'yi'shi
来日大难 lai'ri'da'nan
拳拳服膺 quan'quan'fu'ying
我醉欲眠 wo'zui'yu'mian
青胜于蓝 qing'sheng'yu'lan

原始反终 yuan'shi'fan'zhong
皮里春秋 pi'li'chun'qiu
王粲登楼 wang'can'deng'lou
罪恶昭著 zui'e'zhao'zhe

各司其事 ge'si'qi'shi
年未弱冠 nian'wei'ruo'guan
兼资文武 jian'zi'wen'wu

江南塞北 jiang'nan'sai'bei
盗贼四起 dao'zei'si'qi
追悔不及 zhui'hui'bu'ji
隔靴挠痒 ge'xue'nao'yang

改恶向善 gai'e'xiang'shan
烈火见真金 lie'huo'jian'zhen'jin
只知其一不知其二 zhi'zhi'qi'yi'bu'zhi'qi'er

刚毅木讷 gang'yi'mu'ne

成双作对 cheng'shuang''dui

转怒为喜 zhuan'nu'wei'xi

一干人犯 yi'gan'ren'fan

落落难合 luo'luo'nan'he
百弊丛生 bai'bi'cong'sheng
云集响应 yun'ji'xiang'ying

要害之处 yao'hai'zhi'chu
与草木同腐 yu'cao'mu'tong'fu
平静无事 ping'jing'wu'shi
缺月重圆 que'yue'zhong'yuan
人妖殊途 ren'yao'shu'tu
难以逆料 nan'yi'ni'liao
