鱼传尺素 yu'chuan'chi'su
露才扬己 lu'cai'yang'ji
落花时节 luo'hua'shi'jie
穷神知化 qiong'shen'zhi'hua
峻宇雕墙 jun'yu'diao'qiang
眉高眼低 mei'gao'yan'di
云兴霞蔚 yun'xing'xia'wei
知情不举 zhi'qing'bu'ju
独行其道 du'xing'qi'dao
紫绶金章 zi'shou'jin'zhang
年高望重 nian'gao'wang'zhong
因势而动 yin'shi'er'dong
过甚其辞 guo'shen'qi'ci
清歌妙舞 qing'ge'miao'wu
按捺不下 an'na'bu'xia
仁智各见 ren'zhi'ge'jian
夕惕朝乾 xi'ti'chao'gan
头足倒置 tou'zu'dao'zhi
木直中绳 mu'zhi'zhong'sheng
黄巾力士 huang'jin'li'shi
精赤条条 jing'chi'tiao'tiao
梨园弟子 li'yuan'di'zi
偷懒耍滑 tou'lan'shua'hua
雁过长空 yan'guo'zhang'kong
旦旦而伐 dan'dan'er'fa
要言妙道 yao'yan'miao'dao
死不旋踵 si'bu'xuan'zhong
人取我与 ren'qu'wo'yu
高名上姓 gao'ming'shang'xing
资深望重 zi'shen'wang'zhong
剪烛西窗 jian'zhu'xi'chuang
黑更半夜 hei'geng'ban'ye
何足介意 he'zu'jie'yi
滔滔不尽 tao'tao'bu'jin
云龙风虎 yun'long'feng'hu
形于颜色 xing'yu'yan'se
蔚然可观 wei'ran'ke'guan
以强欺弱 yi'qiang'qi'ruo
扬清抑浊 yang'qing'yi'zhuo
蹑足潜踪 nie'zu'qian'zong
文章宿老 wen'zhang'su'lao
置之高阁 zhi'zhi'gao'ge
阒无一人 qu'wu'yi'ren
千年修得共枕眠 qian'nian'xiu'de'gong'zhen'mian
银河倒泻 yin'he'dao'xie
追魂夺魄 zhui'hun'duo'po
以夷攻夷 yi'yi'gong'yi
啜菽饮水 chuai'shu'yin'shui
七歪八倒 qi'wai'ba'dao
游戏三昧 you'xi'san'mei
舐犊之爱 shi'du'zhi'ai
不辨菽麦 bu'bian'shu'mai
沉疴难起 chen'ke'nan'qi
殊路同归 shu'lu'tong'gui
成竹于胸 cheng'zhu'yu'xiong
仇人见面分外眼红 chou'ren'jian'mian'fen'wai'yan'hong
彻上彻下 che'shang'che'xia
火耕水耨 huo'geng'shui'nou
溢美之言 yi'mei'zhi'yan
开成石经 kai'cheng'shi'jing
绸缪牖户 chou'miao'you'hu
重山峻岭 zhong'shan'jun'ling
十围五攻 shi'wei'wu'gong
秉要执本 bing'yao'zhi'ben
若合符契 ruo'he'fu'qi
光阴如箭 guang'yin'ru'jian
凛凛威风 lin'lin'wei'feng
张王李赵 zhang'wang'li'zhao
挨三顶五 ai'san'ding'wu
下马看花 xia'ma'kan'hua
笑骂由人 xiao'ma'you'ren
于我何有 yu'wo'he'you
抛头露脸 pao'tou'lu'lian
去天尺五 qu'tian'chi'wu
百年之约 bai'nian'zhi'yue
飞阁流丹 fei'ge'liu'dan
日中则移 ri'zhong'ze'yi
不能越雷池一步 bu'neng'yue'lei'chi'yi'bu
笔酣墨饱 bi'han'mo'bao
飘风暴雨 piao'feng'bao'yu
如有所失 ru'you'suo'shi
六韬三略 liu'tao'san'e
知过必改 zhi'guo'bi'gai
泽被后世 ze'bei'hou'shi
随侯之珠 sui'hou'zhi'zhu
矫矫不群 jiao'jiao'bu'qun
父母之命媒妁之言 fu'mu'zhi'ming'mei'shuo'zhi'yan
羲皇上人 xi'huang'shang'ren
飞鸿踏雪 fei'hong'ta'xue
经文纬武 jing'wen'wei'wu
容或有之 rong'huo'you'zhi
马中关五 ma'zhong'guan'wu
入乡问俗 ru'xiang'wen'su
漫天叫价 man'tian'jiao'jia
指东说西 zhi'dong'shuo'xi
万象森罗 wan'xiang'sen'luo
挟山超海 xie'shan'chao'hai
浅斟低酌 qian'zhen'di'zhuo
粉墨登台 fen'mo'deng'tai
卑以自牧 bei'yi'zi'mu
一举手之劳 yi'ju'shou'zhi'lao
废然而返 fei'ran'er'fan
一国三公 yi'guo'san'gong
暴躁如雷 bao'zao'ru'lei
不可究诘 bu'ke'jiu'ji
无耻下流 wu'chi'xia'liu
生擒活拿 sheng'qin'huo'na
梦寐不忘 meng'mei'bu'wang
爱才若渴 ai'cai'ruo'ke
环堵萧然 huan'du'xiao'ran
羊羔跪乳 yang'gao'gui'ru
运筹帏幄 yun'chou'wei'wo
天崩地塌 tian'beng'di'ta
皮里膜外 pi'li'mo'wai
老而不死是为贼 lao'er'bu'si'shi'wei'zei
鸢飞戾天 yuan'fei'li'tian
曲终奏雅 qu'zhong'zou'ya
无空不入 wu'kong'bu'ru
国步艰难 guo'bu'jian'nan
心如古井 xin'ru'gu'jing
居心险恶 ju'xin'xian'e
张敞画眉 zhang'chang'hua'mei
争强斗狠 zheng'qiang'dou'hen
条理井然 tiao'li'jing'ran
存乎其人 cun'hu'qi'ren
科甲出身 ke'jia'chu'shen
纵横开阖 zong'heng'kai'he
花信年华 hua'xin'nian'hua
慎始慎终 shen'shi'shen'zhong
粉雕玉琢 fen'diao'yu'zuo
五雷正法 wu'lei'zheng'fa
求亲告友 qiu'qin'gao'you
劝善规过 quan'shan'gui'guo
整顿乾坤 zheng'dun'gan'kun
昆山之玉 kun'shan'zhi'yu
十风五雨 shi'feng'wu'yu
缠绵缱绻 chan'mian'qian'quan
万里河山 wan'li'he'shan
望帝啼鹃 wang'di'ti'juan
作困兽斗 zuo'kun'shou'dou
路断人稀 lu'duan'ren'xi
经纶满腹 jing'lun'man'fu
逐句逐字 zhu'ju'zhu'zi
引领而望 yin'ling'er'wang
曲意奉迎 qu'yi'feng'ying
怀才抱德 huai'cai'bao'de
苍颜白发 cang'yan'bai'fa
宝相庄严 bao'xiang'zhuang'
穿连裆裤 chuan'lian'dang'ku
戴月披星 dai'yue'pi'xing
命世之才 ming'shi'zhi'cai
岿然独存 kui'ran'du'cun
不主故常 bu'zhu'gu'chang
立身扬名 li'shen'yang'ming
关心民瘼 guan'xin'min'mo
拜手稽首 bai'shou'ji'shou
东园秘器 dong'yuan'mi'qi
凿凿有据 zao'zao'you'ju
马无夜草不肥 ma'wu'ye'cao'bu'fei
经一事长一智 jing'yi'shi'zhang'yi'zhi
爪牙之士 zhao'ya'zhi'shi
恬淡无欲 tian'dan'wu'yu
龙姿凤采 long'zi'feng'cai
戒奢以俭 jie'she'yi'jian
目不知书 mu'bu'zhi'shu
劳而少功 lao'er'shao'gong
彼一时此一时 bi'yi'shi'ci'yi'shi
膏粱子弟 gao'liang'zi'di
地角天涯 di'jiao'tian'ya
万世之利 wan'shi'zhi'li
孤高自许 gu'gao'zi'xu
别裁伪体 bie'cai'wei'ti
即席赋诗 ji'xi'fu'shi
固守成规 gu'shou'cheng'gui
深藏若虚 shen'cang'ruo'xu
见钱眼红 jian'qian'yan'hong
华发苍颜 hua'fa'cang'yan
天老地荒 tian'lao'di'huang
湛湛青天 zhan'zhan'qing'tian
百花生日 bai'hua'sheng'ri
七言八语 qi'yan'ba'yu
城北徐公 cheng'bei'xu'gong
全力一击 quan'li'yi'ji
放辟邪侈 fang'pi'xie'chi
忘怀得失 wang'huai'de'shi
十光五色 shi'guang'wu'se
步履矫健 bu'lv'jiao'jian
寻幽访胜 xun'you'fang'sheng
天不绝人 tian'bu'jue'ren
闻风响应 wen'feng'xiang'ying
当面锣对面鼓 dang'mian'luo'dui'mian'gu
吃粮当兵 chi'liang'dang'bing
举国一致 ju'guo'yi'zhi
战无不胜攻无不克 zhan'wu'bu'sheng'gong'wu'bu'ke
片甲不回 pian'jia'bu'hui
寸丝不挂 cun'si'bu'gua
贵游子弟 gui'you'zi'di
专权误国 zhuan'quan'wu'guo
万死一生 wan'si'yi'sheng
至矣尽矣 zhi'yi'jin'yi
搽脂抹粉 cha'zhi'mo'fen
万绿从中一点红 wan'lv'cong'zhong'yi'dian'hong

直言切谏 zhi'yan'qie'jian

民生在勤 min'sheng'zai'qin
以迂为直 yi'yu'wei'zhi

通今博古 tong'jin'bo'gu

安闲自得 an'xian'zi'de
气炸了肺 qi'zha'le'fei
大天白日 da'tian'bai'ri

人莫予毒 ren'mo'yu'du

致知格物 zhi'zhi'ge'wu
奇峰突起 qi'feng'tu'qi

一笑嫣然 yi'xiao'yan'ran
生聚教训 sheng'ju'jiao'xun
伸手不打笑脸人 shen'shou'bu'da'xiao'lian'ren
称功颂德 cheng'gong'song'de
玉环飞燕 yu'huan'fei'yan
朋党比周 peng'dang'bi'zhou
列鼎而食 lie'ding'er'shi
千万买邻 qian'wan'mai'lin
命好不怕运来磨 ming'hao'bu'pa'yun'lai'mo
续夷坚志 xu'yi'jian'zhi
殷天蔽日 yan'tian'bi'ri
一命归阴 yi'ming'gui'yin
脱帽露顶 tuo'mao'lu'ding
天夺其魄 tian'duo'qi'po
笑颜逐开 xiao'yan'zhu'kai
景星庆云 jing'xing'qing'yun
犬马之力 quan'ma'zhi'li
知足知止 zhi'zu'zhi'zhi
月落参横 yue'luo'can'heng
羊头狗肉 yang'tou'gou'rou
青云之上 qing'yun'zhi'shang
披发入山 pi'fa'ru'shan
囊括无遗 nang'kuo'wu'yi
扞格不入 gan'ge'bu'ru
中外合璧 zhong'wai'he'bi
无路请缨 wu'lu'qing'ying
拔起萝卜带出泥 ba'qi'luo'bo'dai'chu'ni
无妄之福 wu'wang'zhi'fu
拔地参天 ba'di'can'tian
不避强御 bu'bi'qiang'yu
音信杳然 yin'xin'yao'ran
洞悉其奸 dong'xi'qi'jian
返本还源 fan'ben'hai'yuan
一惊非小 yi'jing'fei'xiao
管见所及 guan'jian'suo'ji
三五蟾光 san'wu'chan'guang
愁眉锁眼 chou'mei'suo'yan
齐驱并驾 qi'qu'bing'jia
离经辨志 li'jing'bian'zhi
经明行修 jing'ming'xing'xiu
双瞳剪水 shuangtong'tong'jian'shui
帷薄不修 wei'bao'bu'xiu
旧恨新愁 jiu'hen'xin'chou
求签问卜 qiu'qian'wen'bo
名实不副 ming'shi'bu'fu
焚尸扬灰 fen'shi'yang'hui
块儿八毛 kuai'r'ba'mao
乾净利落 gan'jing'li'luo
悲愤交集 bei'fen'jiao'ji
家人父子 jia'ren'fu'zi
钝兵挫锐 dun'bing'cuo'rui
拔十得五 ba'shi'de'wu
釜中之鱼 fu'zhong'zhi'yu
死样活气 si'yang'huo'qi
独裁专断 du'cai'zhuan'duan
死有余责 si'you'yu'ze
咎有应得 jiu'you'ying'de
声势煊赫 sheng'shi'xuan'he
龙藏寺碑 long'cang'si'bei
近交远攻 jin'jiao'yuan'gong
天造草昧 tian'zao'cao'mei
目眩头晕 mu'xuan'tou'yun
安于一隅 an'yu'yi'yu
独竖一帜 du'shu'yi'zhi
收拾局面 shou'shi'ju'mian
深根固本 shen'gen'gu'ben
沿波讨源 yan'bo'tao'yuan
流离转徙 liu'li'zhuan'xi
杀鸡警猴 sha'ji'jing'hou
棋逢对手将遇良才 qi'feng'dui'shou'jiang'yu'liang'cai
流风回雪 liu'feng'hui'xue

文人墨士 wen'ren'mo'shi

采菊东篱 cai'ju'dong'li
文君新寡 wen'jun'xin'gua
惊恐失色 jing'kong'shi'se

不衫不履 bu'shan'bu'lv

惊悸不安 jing'ji'bu'an
杨花水性 yang'hua'shui'xing
尖嘴缩腮 jian'zui'suo'sai
不知春秋 bu'zhi'chun'qiu
大发谬论 da'fa'miu'lun
叩马而谏 kou'ma'er'jian
金谷酒数 jin'gu'jiu'shu
门庭如市 men'ting'ru'shi
兵来将敌水来土堰 bing'lai'jiang'di'shui'lai'tu'yan
困而不学 kun'er'bu'xue
悦人耳目 yue'ren'er'mu
堤溃蚁穴 di'kui'yi'xue
狗苟蝇营 gou'gou'ying'ying
销声敛迹 xiao'sheng'lian'ji
采椽不斫 cai'chuan'bu'zhuo
年谷不登 nian'gu'bu'deng
伴食宰相 ban'shi'zai'xiang
清静寡欲 qing'jing'gua'yu

金匮石室 jin'kui'shi'shi

五短三粗 wu'duan'san'cu
谨身节用 jin'shen'jie'yong

千古奇谈 qian'gu'qi'tan

猫鼠同眠 mao'shu'tong'mian
驷马高车 si'ma'gao'che
识二五而不知十 shi'er'wu'er'bu'zhi'shi

修短随化 xiu'duan'sui'hua
可耻下场 ke'chi'xia'chang

谋臣如雨 mou'chen'ru'yu

一瞑不视 yi'ming'bu'shi

民可使由之 min'ke'shi'you'zhi
洞察其奸 dong'cha'qi'jian

朝生夕死 chao'sheng'xi'si

存亡未卜 cun'wang'wei'bo

一表堂堂 yi'biao'tang'tang
冥然兀坐 ming'ran'wu'zuo
不知大体 bu'zhi'da'ti
出乎意表 chu'hu'yi'biao
十病九痛 shi'bing'jiu'tong
明于治乱 ming'yu'zhi'luan
忧能伤人 you'neng'shang'ren
寸阴是竞 cun'yin'shi'jing
绝不轻饶 jue'bu'qing'rao
日昃之离 ri'ze'zhi'li
好男不跟女斗 hao'nan'bu'gen'nv'dou
妄下雌黄 wang'xia'ci'huang
耳闻不如目睹 er'wen'bu'ru'mu'du
从风而靡 cong'feng'er'mi
渺无边际 miao'wu'bian'ji
枉费唇舌 wang'fei'chun'she
一鳞一爪 yi'lin'yi'zhao
情同一家 qing'tong'yi'jia
闯南走北 chuang''zou'bei
一匡九合 yi'kuang'jiu'he
玉成其事 yu'cheng'qi'shi
天行有常 tian'xing'you'chang
零丁孤苦 ling'ding'gu'ku
月夕花朝 yue'xi'hua'chao
丑人多作怪 chou'ren'duo'zuo'guai
八十四调 ba'shi'si'diao
万里鹏程 wan'li'peng'cheng
有征无战 you'zheng'wu'zhan
天遥地远 tian'yao'di'yuan
大旱之望云霓 da'han'zhi'wang'yun'ni
一隅之见 yi'yu'zhi'jian
便把令来行 bian'ba'ling'lai'xing
迁于乔木 qian'yu'qiao'mu
一钱太守 yi'qian'tai'shou
各言其志 ge'yan'qi'zhi
割席分坐 ge'xi'fen'zuo
源清流洁 yuan'qing'liu'jie
刺刺不休 ci'ci'bu'xiu
惟命是听 wei'ming'shi'ting
如坠五里云雾 ru'zhui'wu'li'yun'wu
贪财好利 tan'cai'hao'li
粉白黛绿 fen'bai'dai'lv
随口乱说 sui'kou'luan'shuo
重生父母 zhong'sheng'fu'mu
文丝不动 wen'si'bu'dong
运筹决胜 yun'chou'jue'sheng
变化无方 bian'hua'wu'fang
席丰履厚 xi'feng'lv'hou
神魂飞越 shen'hun'fei'yue
女貌郎才 nv'mao'lang'cai
钗横鬓乱 chai'heng'bin'luan
遥呼相应 yao'hu'xiang'ying
高文典册 gao'wen'dian'ce
沿门托钵 yan'men'tuo'bo
山肴野蔌 shan'yao'ye'su
一日万机 yi'ri'wan'ji
声气相投 sheng'qi'xiang'tou
翩其反矣 pian'qi'fan'yi
口体之奉 kou'ti'zhi'feng
包括万象 bao'kuo'wan'xiang
异途同归 yi'tu'tong'gui
如梦如醉 ru'meng'ru'zui
倒持泰阿 dao'chi'tai'a
物离乡贵 wu'li'xiang'gui
白黑分明 bai'hei'fen'ming
钧天广乐 jun'tian'guang'le
南船北马 nan'chuan'bei'ma
巧诈不如拙诚 qiao'zha'bu'ru'zhuo'cheng
大醇小疵 da'chun'xiao'ci
手到拈来 shou'dao'nian'lai
观今宜鉴古 guan'jin'yi'jian'gu
珍禽奇兽 zhen'qin'qi'shou
名垂千秋 ming'chui'qian'qiu
惹祸招灾 re'huo'zhao'zai
桀犬吠尧 jie'quan'fei'yao
奉命惟谨 feng'ming'wei'jin
地狭人稠 di'xia'ren'chou
过屠门而大嚼 guo'tu'men'er'da'jue
疾风扫落叶 ji'feng'sao'luo'ye
法轮常转 fa'lun'chang'zhuan
苛政猛于虎 ke'zheng'meng'yu'hu
买官鬻爵 mai'guan'yu'jue
浸润之谮 jin'run'zhi'zen
虎视耽耽 hu'shi'dan'dan
不见舆薪 bu'jian'yu'xin
怪怪奇奇 guai'guai'qi'qi
居之不疑 ju'zhi'bu'yi
吊死问疾 diao'si'wen'ji
敢不听命 gan'bu'ting'ming
鲁阳挥戈 lu'yang'hui'ge
迷离扑朔 mi'li'pu'shuo
柳庄相法 liu'zhuangxiang'xiang'fa
云天雾地 yun'tian'wu'di
始末缘由 shi'mo'yuan'you
车前马后 che'qian'ma'hou
牛衣对泣 niu'yi'dui'qi
本支百世 ben'zhi'bai'shi
破玩意儿 po'wan'yi'r
流风遗韵 liu'feng'yi'yun
魏紫姚黄 wei'zi'yao'huang
蓬头跣足 peng'tou'xian'zu
各展其长 ge'zhan'qi'zhang
高爵厚禄 gao'jue'hou'lu
短衣匹马 duan'yi'pi'ma
风气为之一变 feng'qi'wei'zhi'yi'bian
置锥之地 zhi'zhui'zhi'di
屏气敛息 ping'qi'lian'xi
一叶落知天下秋 yi'ye'luo'zhi'tian'xia'qiu
扪虱而谈 men'shi'er'tan
风云月露 feng'yun'yue'lu
各执所见 ge'zhi'suo'jian
并为一谈 bing'wei'yi'tan
目眦尽裂 mu'zi'jin'lie
系而不食 xi'er'bu'shi
交杯换盏 jiao'bei'huan'zhan
西子捧心 xi'zi'peng'xin
庙堂之器 miao'tang'zhi'qi
愤不欲生 fen'bu'yu'sheng
兔走乌飞 tu'zou'wu'fei
本固枝荣 ben'gu'zhi'rong
雨迹云踪 yu'ji'yun'zong
岁时伏腊 sui'shi'fu'la
熊经鸟申 xiong'jing'niao'shen
多钱善贾 duo'qian'shan'gu
扫榻以待 sao'ta'yi'dai
外宽内忌 wai'kuan'nei'ji
嗜痂成癖 shi'jia'cheng'pi
一斑窥豹 yi'ban'kui'bao
九品莲台 jiu'pin'lian'tai
雕文刻镂 diao'wen'ke'lou
傲骨嶙嶙 ao'gu'lin'lin
大发议论 da'fa'yi'lun
弩箭离弦 nu'jian'li'xian
傍若无人 bang'ruo'wu'ren
佳肴美馔 jia'yao'mei'zhuan
金屋贮娇 jin'wu'zhu'jiao
尊主泽民 zun'zhu'ze'min
八拜为交 ba'bai'wei'jiao
九年面壁 jiu'nian'mian'bi
不在其位不谋其政 bu'zai'qi'wei'bu'mou'qi'zheng
虎瘦雄心在 hu'shou'xiong'xin'zai
宠柳娇花 chong'liu'jiao'hua
泣血涟如 qi'xue'lian'ru
七倒八歪 qi'dao'ba'wai
厚貌深情 hou'mao'shen'qing
鸣鼓而攻 ming'gu'er'gong
执锐披坚 zhi'rui'pi'jian
画地自限 hua'di'zi'xian
希世之珍 xi'shi'zhi'zhen
槁项黄馘 gao'xiang'huang'guo
见笑大方 jian'xiao'da'fang
政由己出 zheng'you'ji'chu
三年不蜚 san'nian'bu'fei
寝苫枕块 qin'shan'zhen'kuai
金马玉堂 jin'ma'yu'tang
说曹操曹操就到 shuo'cao'cao'cao'cao'jiu'dao
吹吹拍拍 chui'chui'pai'pai
登车揽辔 deng'che'lan'pei
誓死不二 shi'si'bu'er
蚀本生意 shi'ben'sheng'yi
元轻白俗 yuan'qing'bai'su
韬光晦迹 tao'guang'hui'ji
瑰意琦行 gui'yi'qi'xing
溘然而逝 ke'ran'er'shi
不以一眚掩大德 bu'yi'yi'sheng'yan'da'de
何足为奇 he'zu'wei'qi
送往事居 song'wang'shi'ju
望风而遁 wang'feng'er'dun
鱼龙曼延 yu'long'man'yan
人百其身 ren'bai'qi'shen
悬心吊胆 xuan'xin'diao'dan
常年不懈 chang'nian'bu'xie
百无一二 bai'wu'yi'er
穿花蛱蝶 chuan'hua'jia'die
折节读书 zhe'jie'du'shu
不分畛域 bu'fen'zhen'yu
若不胜衣 ruo'bu'sheng'yi
庆父不死鲁难未已 qing'fu'bu'si'lu'nan'wei'yi
描鸾刺凤 miao'luan'ci'feng
雕阑玉砌 diao'lan'yu'qi
明白易晓 ming'bai'yi'xiao
逞凶肆虐 cheng'xiong'si'nve
才华盖世 cai'hua'gai'shi
切切此布 qie'qie'ci'bu
手到擒拿 shou'dao'qin'na
鼓腹而游 gu'fu'er'you
自坏长城 zi'huai'zhang'cheng
隆情厚谊 long'qing'hou'yi
和风丽日 he'feng'li'ri
水中捉月 shui'zhong'zhuo'yue
忍辱求全 ren'ru'qiu'quan
如坠五里雾中 ru'zhui'wu'li'wu'zhong
残杯冷炙 can'bei'leng'zhi
不露圭角 bu'lu'gui'jiao
蓬牖茅椽 peng'you'mao'chuan
穷山恶水出刁民 qiong'shan'e'shui'chu'diao'min
实获我心 shi'huo'wo'xin
微言精义 wei'yan'jing'yi
走肉行尸 zou'rou'xing'shi
乘兴而来败兴而归 cheng'xing'er'lai'bai'xing'er'gui
回肠九转 hui'chang'jiu'zhuan
面色如生 mian'se'ru'sheng
若有所亡 ruo'you'suo'wang
星移物换 xing'yi'wu'huan
神清骨秀 shen'qing'gu'xiu
千愁万恨 qian'chou'wan'hen
爱人利物 ai'ren'li'wu
无疆之休 wu'jiang'zhi'xiu
名同实异 ming'tong'shi'yi
游谈无根 you'tan'wu'gen
立地顶天 li'di'ding'tian
兵闻拙速 bing'wen'zhuo'su
五鬼闹判 wu'gui'nao'pan
露宿风餐 lu'su'feng'can
不如薄技在身 bu'ru'bao'ji'zai'shen
末如之何 mo'ru'zhi'he
燕南赵北 yan'nan'zhao'bei
前歌后舞 qian'ge'hou'wu
层见迭出 ceng'jian'die'chu
水秀山明 shui'xiu'shan'ming
桴鼓相应 fu'gu'xiang'ying
置之不论 zhi'zhi'bu'lun
畅行无碍 chang'xing'wu'ai
假痴假呆 jia'chi'jia'dai
迎春纳福 ying'chun'na'fu
有翅难飞 you'chi'nan'fei
封豕长蛇 feng'shi'zhang'she
鬼怕恶人 gui'pa'e'ren
金戈铁骑 jin'ge'tie'qi
澡身浴德 zao'shen'yu'de
落人笑柄 luo'ren'xiao'bing
凤鸟不至 feng'niao'bu'zhi
生公说法 sheng'gong'shuo'fa
玉堂金马 yu'tang'jin'ma
岁寒松柏 sui'han'song'bai
不宁唯是 bu'ning'wei'shi
北郭十友 bei'guo'shi'you
老成凋谢 lao'cheng'diao'xie
白首穷经 bai'shou'qiong'jing
荡荡悠悠 dang'dang'you'you
贵古贱今 gui'gu'jian'jin
罪上加罪 zui'shang'jia'zui
正名定分 zheng'ming'ding'fen
白圭之玷 bai'gui'zhi'dian
螟蛉之子 ming'ling'zhi'zi
紫盖黄旗 zi'gai'huang'qi
不知肉味 bu'zhi'rou'wei
盛衰兴废 sheng'shuai'xing'fei
鼻子气歪了 bi'zi'qi'wai'le
身后萧条 shen'hou'xiao'tiao
死后自会长眠 si'hou'zi'hui'zhang'mian

耳食之言 er'shi'zhi'yan
大地震击 da'di'zhen'ji
别有风趣 bie'you'feng'qu
铺锦列绣 pu'jin'lie'xiu
一面之雅 yi'mian'zhi'ya
大败而逃 da'bai'er'tao
血海尸山 xue'hai'shi'shan

下笔如神 xia'bi'ru'shen
九战九胜 jiu'zhan'jiu'sheng

星驰电掣 xing'chi'dian'che
求生不得求死不能 qiu'sheng'bu'de'qiu'si'bu'neng

自郐以下 zi'kuai'yi'xia

海内无双 hai'nei'wu'shuang

好问则裕 hao'wen'ze'yu

掌上观纹 zhang'shang'guan'wen

瞒心昧己 man'xin'mei'ji

日薄崦嵫 ri'bao'yan'zi
后会难期 hou'hui'nan'qi
香火因缘 xiang'huo'yin'yuan

东床坦腹 dong'chuang''fu
齿如编贝 chi'ru'bian'bei
航海梯山 hang'hai'ti'shan
有一无二 you'yi'wu'er
情定今生 qing'ding'jin'sheng
犹生之年 you'sheng'zhi'nian
如堕烟海 ru'duo'yan'hai
千虑一得 qian'lv'yi'de
冬日可爱 dong'ri'ke'ai
不为牛后 bu'wei'niu'hou
居重驭轻 ju'zhong'yu'qing

彼此一样 bi'ci'yi'yang
旧愁新恨 jiu'chou'xin'hen
东食西宿 dong'shi'xi'su

男女老小 nan'nv'lao'xiao
茫茫苦海 mang'mang'ku'hai
万岁千秋 wan'sui'qian'qiu
叽哩哇啦 ji'li'wa'la
如火燎原 ru'huo'liao'yuan
临难不苟 lin'nan'bu'gou
岁序更新 sui'xu'geng'xin
满腹珠玑 man'fu'zhu'ji
拳拳盛意 quan'quan'sheng'yi
卖官鬻狱 mai'guan'yu'yu
履舄交错 lv'xi'jiao'cuo

以水济水 yi'shui'ji'shui

誓天断发 shi'tian'duan'fa
弃文就武 qi'wen'jiu'wu
意在笔前 yi'zai'bi'qian
汗牛塞屋 han'niu'sai'wu
绊手绊脚 ban'shou'ban'jiao
蝇头细字 ying'tou'xi'zi
铁券丹书 tie'quan'dan'shu
据事直书 ju'shi'zhi'shu
补阙拾遗 bu'que'shi'yi

伤时感事 shang'shi'gan'shi
元元之民 yuan'yuan'zhi'min
依违两可 yi'wei'liang'ke
自新之路 zi'xin'zhi'lu
善刀而藏 shan'dao'er'cang
无为而成 wu'wei'er'cheng
比权量力 bi'quan'liang'li
云程万里 yun'cheng'wan'li
着三不着两 zhe'san'bu'zhe'liang
晚节不终 wan'jie'bu'zhong
乍雨乍晴 zha'yu'zha'qing
千里之驹 qian'li'zhi'ju
遁迹空门 dun'ji'kong'men
兴会淋漓 xing'hui'lin'li
贫贱骄人 pin'jian'jiao'ren
死生荣辱 si'sheng'rong'ru
磐石之安 pan'shi'zhi'an
尽美尽善 jin'mei'jin'shan
鱼龙漫衍 yu'long'man'yan
白沙在涅 bai'sha'zai'nie
一家之作 yi'jia'zhi'zuo
黄中通理 huang'zhong'tong'li
追魂摄魄 zhui'hun'she'po
安车蒲轮 an'che'pu'lun
观望风色 guan'wang'feng'se
帮理不帮亲 bang'li'bu'bang'qin
丰功伟烈 feng'gong'wei'lie
笨口拙舌 ben'kou'zhuo'she
无所不作 wu'suo'bu'zuo
主一无适 zhu'yi'wu'shi
红情绿意 hong'qing'lv'yi
铜琶铁板 tong'pa'tie'ban
苌弘化碧 chang'hong'hua'bi
三日入厨 san'ri'ru'chu
汉官威仪 han'guan'wei'yi
凛若冰霜 lin'ruo'bing'shuang
自树一帜 zi'shu'yi'zhi
苦不聊生 ku'bu'liao'sheng
救困扶危 jiu'kun'fu'wei
伶牙利嘴 ling'ya'li'zui
明鉴万里 ming'jian'wan'li
出纳之吝 chu'na'zhi'lin
俾昼作夜 bi'zhou'zuo'ye
一字褒贬 yi'zi'bao'bian
揆情度理 kui'qing'du'li
恩威并行 en'wei'bing'xing
衣不曳地 yi'bu'ye'di
短叹长吁 duan'tan'zhang'xu
怡然自若 yi'ran'zi'ruo
别具只眼 bie'ju'zhi'yan
赏罚不信 shang'fa'bu'xin
敝帚千金 bi'zhou'qian'jin
若离若即 ruo'li'ruo'ji
开山老祖 kai'shan'lao'zu
风烛之年 feng'zhu'zhi'nian
相鼠有皮 xiang'shu'you'pi
家徒壁立 jia'tu'bi'li
罄其所有 qing'qi'suo'you
四马攒蹄 si'ma'zan'ti
保境息民 bao'jing'xi'min
下陵上替 xia'ling'shang'ti
平治天下 ping'zhi'tian'xia
濠濮间想 hao'pu'jian'xiang
改行自新 gai'xing'zi'xin
竹马之交 zhu'ma'zhi'jiao
失惊打怪 shi'jing'da'guai
天与人归 tian'yu'ren'gui
心如木石 xin'ru'mu'shi
云起龙骧 yun'qi'long'xiang
大智如愚 da'zhi'ru'yu
燕子依然 yan'zi'yi'ran
众人一条心 zhong'ren'yi'tiao'xin
吃人的嘴软 chi'ren'de'zui'ruan
大块吃肉 da'kuai'chi'rou
六艺经传 liu'yi'jing'chuan
以奇用兵 yi'qi'yong'bing
颜渊问仁 yan'yuan'wen'ren
五家七宗 wu'jia'qi'zong
火候不到 huo'hou'bu'dao
思则有备 si'ze'you'bei
五世而斩 wu'shi'er'zhan
凤箫声动 feng'xiao'sheng'dong
花花哨哨 hua'hua'shao'shao
义然后取 yi'ran'hou'qu
德之不修 de'zhi'bu'xiu
先天地生 xian'tian'di'sheng
无法可想 wu'fa'ke'xiang
人争一口气 ren'zheng'yi'kou'qi
坚守不渝 jian'shou'bu'yu
云鬟雾鬓 yun'huan'wu'bin
死而复苏 si'er'fu'su
朱门绣户 zhu'men'xiu'hu
能人巧匠 neng'ren'qiao'jiang
带牛佩犊 dai'niu'pei'du
衣冠礼乐 yi'guan'li'le
滴水石穿 di'shui'shi'chuan
呼幺喝六 hu'yao'he'liu
眼尖手快 yan'jian'shou'kuai
言不顾行 yan'bu'gu'xing
儿女成行 r'nv'cheng'xing
临文不讳 lin'wen'bu'hui
机事不密 ji'shi'bu'mi
蜂腰鹤膝 feng'yao'he'xi
援古证今 yuan'gu'zheng'jin
各有所能 ge'you'suo'neng
愁肠寸断 chou'chang'cun'duan
骂人不揭短 ma'ren'bu'jie'duan
报本反始 bao'ben'fan'shi
牛角挂书 niu'jiao'gua'shu
拆白道字 chai'bai'dao'zi
白云亲舍 bai'yun'qin'she
血海冤仇 xue'hai'yuan'chou
形如槁木 xing'ru'gao'mu

蠢动含灵 chun'dong'han'ling
被山带河 bei'shan'dai'he
退步抽身 tui'bu'chou'shen
官卑职小 guan'bei'zhi'xiao
寅支卯粮 yin'zhi'mao'liang
彩凤随鸦 cai'feng'sui'ya
天保九如 tian'bao'jiu'ru
眼空四海 yan'kong'si'hai
东转西转 dong'zhuan'xi'zhuan
诗酒风流 shi'jiu'feng'liu
髀肉复生 bi'rou'fu'sheng
久假不归 jiu'jia'bu'gui
不测之罪 bu'ce'zhi'zui
开基创业 kai'ji'chuang'

阳九百六 yang'jiu'bai'liu
当今之务 dang'jin'zhi'wu
枕戈待命 zhen'ge'dai'ming
江山不老 jiang'shan'bu'lao
墓木已拱 mu'mu'yi'gong

矮小精悍 ai'xiao'jing'han
八街九陌 ba'jie'jiu'mo
戒禁取见 jie'jin'qu'jian
倾心吐胆 qing'xin'tu'dan
莺吟燕舞 ying'yin'yan'wu
事已如此 shi'yi'ru'ci
绿林起义 lv'lin'qi'yi
口出秽言 kou'chu'hui'yan
天尊地卑 tian'zun'di'bei
举手加额 ju'shou'jia'e
运筹千里 yun'chou'qian'li
冶容诲淫 ye'rong'hui'yin
仁者安仁 ren'zhe'an'ren
知者不惑 zhi'zhe'bu'huo
指通豫南 zhi'tong'yu'nan
有名有实 you'ming'you'shi
南甜北咸 nan'tian'bei'xian
和分水岭 he'fen'shui'ling
作育英才 zuo'yu'ying'cai
相逢不语 xiang'feng'bu'yu
空穴来凤 kong'xue'lai'feng
胳膊肘子 ge'bo'zhou'zi
修己安人 xiu'ji'an'ren
千里逢迎 qian'li'feng'ying
无从措手 wu'cong'cuo'shou
直而不肆 zhi'er'bu'si
匹夫不可夺志也 pi'fu'bu'ke'duo'zhi'ye
形散神不散 xing'san'shen'bu'san
千古江山 qian'gu'jiang'shan
好男不当兵 hao'nan'bu'dang'bing
其中有精 qi'zhong'you'jing

知己难求 zhi'ji'nan'qiu
庶民子来 shu'min'zi'lai

上推下卸 shang'tui'xia'xie
高人一着 gao'ren'yi'zhe

绿鬓朱颜 lv'bin'zhu'yan

质而不野 zhi'er'bu'ye
变化有时 bian'hua'you'shi
蔽日遮天 bi'ri'zhe'tian
拍掌称快 pai'zhang'cheng'kuai
马不解鞍 ma'bu'jie'an
没可奈何 mei'ke'nai'he
一蹴而成 yi'cu'er'cheng
心惊胆裂 xin'jing'dan'lie
百废俱举 bai'fei'ju'ju
好生恶杀 hao'sheng'e'sha
鬼瞰其室 gui'kan'qi'shi
未敢苟同 wei'gan'gou'tong
倾巢来犯 qing'chao'lai'fan
博物洽闻 bo'wu'qia'wen
云阶月地 yun'jie'yue'di
扯旗放炮 che'qi'fang'pao
繁文缛礼 fan'wen'ru'li
时和年丰 shi'he'nian'feng
你东我西 ni'dong'wo'xi
半疑半信 ban'yi'ban'xin
俯首低眉 fu'shou'di'mei
以一儆百 yi'yi'jing'bai
博文约礼 bo'wen'yue'li
龙生九种 long'sheng'jiu'zhong
闳大不经 hong'da'bu'jing
口如悬河 kou'ru'xuan'he
倒悬之急 dao'xuan'zhi'ji
深耕易耨 shen'geng'yi'nou
什一之利 shen'yi'zhi'li
蜗角之争 wo'jiao'zhi'zheng
抱关击柝 bao'guan'ji'tuo
绳其祖武 sheng'qi'zu'wu
断齑画粥 duan'ji'hua'zhou
合盘托出 he'pan'tuo'chu
转斗千里 zhuan'dou'qian'li
传神阿堵 chuan'shen'a'du
拔宅飞升 ba'zhai'fei'sheng
并蒂芙蓉 bing'di'fu'rong
过来过去 guo'lai'guo'qu
凤翥龙蟠 feng'zhu'long'pan
断发纹身 duan'fa'wen'shen
五行俱下 wu'xing'ju'xia
疾风甚雨 ji'feng'shen'yu

语短情长 yu'duan'qing'zhang
投袂而起 tou'mei'er'qi
言行相符 yan'xing'xiang'fu
杜渐防萌 du'jian'fang'meng

口吐珠玑 kou'tu'zhu'ji

广大神通 guang'da'shen'tong
人生若寄 ren'sheng'ruo'ji
十室九匮 shi'shi'jiu'kui
厚重少文 hou'zhong'shao'wen
绣口锦心 xiu'kou'jin'xin
工力悉敌 gong'li'xi'di
大嚷大叫 da'rang'da'jiao
丰神绰约 feng'shen'chao'yue
兴高彩烈 xing'gao'cai'lie
口呆目瞪 kou'dai'mu'deng
出师无名 chu'shi'wu'ming
贸迁有无 mao'qian'you'wu
鸾交凤友 luan'jiao'feng'you
稳操左券 wen'cao'zuo'quan
良金美玉 liang'jin'mei'yu
青女素娥 qing'nv'su'e
眼急手快 yan'ji'shou'kuai
凤舞鸾歌 feng'wu'luan'ge
黄河水清 huang'he'shui'qing
潘江陆海 pan'jiang'lu'hai
车驰马骤 che'chi'ma'zhou
世衰道微 shi'shuai'dao'wei
幽期密约 you'qi'mi'yue
一画开天 yi'hua'kai'tian
笔力遒劲 bi'li'qiu'jin
琵琶旧语 pi'pa'jiu'yu
有天没日 you'tian'mei'ri
满坐风生 man'zuo'feng'sheng
敬小慎微 jing'xiao'shen'wei
见风是雨 jian'feng'shi'yu
叠影危情 die'ying'wei'qing
主客颠倒 zhu'ke'dian'dao
被发缨冠 bei'fa'ying'guan
千里莼羹 qian'li'chun'geng
别是一番滋味 bie'shi'yi'fan'zi'wei
手挥目送 shou'hui'mu'song
穰穰满家 rang'rang'man'jia
十人九慕 shi'ren'jiu'mu
败俗伤化 bai'su'shang'hua
骑驴觅驴 qi'lv'mi'lv
应天顺民 ying'tian'shun'min
松柏后凋 song'bai'hou'diao
摧陷廓清 cui'xian'kuo'qing
庶竭驽钝 shu'jie'nu'dun
确切不移 que'qie'bu'yi
一帆顺风 yi'fan'shun'feng
白石道人诗说 bai'shi'dao'ren'shi'shuo
超然独处 chao'ran'du'chu
长江后浪催前浪 zhang'jiang'hou'lang'cui'qian'lang
货赂公行 huo'lu'gong'xing
认贼为子 ren'zei'wei'zi
鲜车怒马 xian'che'nu'ma
江山好改 jiang'shan'hao'gai
殒身不恤 yun'shen'bu'xu
矮子看戏 ai'zi'kan'xi
一生九死 yi'sheng'jiu'si
麻痹不仁 ma'bi'bu'ren
沉著痛快 chen'zhe'tong'kuai
呵佛骂祖 he'fu'ma'zu
斫轮老手 zhuo'lun'lao'shou
鸠形鹄面 jiu'xing'gu'mian
亚圣孟子 ya'sheng'meng'zi
如梦如痴 ru'meng'ru'chi
刻画入微 ke'hua'ru'wei
气吞河山 qi'tun'he'shan
白云孤飞 bai'yun'gu'fei
豁达先生 huo'da'xian'sheng
靡日不思 mi'ri'bu'si
更阑人静 geng'lan'ren'jing
蒲柳之质 pu'liu'zhi'zhi
甜言美语 tian'yan'mei'yu
花营锦阵 hua'ying'jin'zhen
奥援有灵 ao'yuan'you'ling
一言以蔽 yi'yan'yi'bi
眼泪洗面 yan'lei'xi'mian
沉静寡言 chen'jing'gua'yan
为虎傅翼 wei'hu'fu'yi
桂馥兰馨 gui'fu'lan'xin
三街六巷 san'jie'liu'xiang
周情孔思 zhou'qing'kong'si
素餐尸位 su'can'shi'wei
九流十家 jiu'liu'shi'jia
贝阙珠宫 bei'que'zhu'gong
朱衣点头 zhu'yi'dian'tou
济世之才 ji'shi'zhi'cai
柱石之臣 zhu'shi'zhi'chen
大人君子 da'ren'jun'zi
玉阶彤庭 yu'jie'tong'ting
块然独处 kuai'ran'du'chu
气壮河山 qi'zhuanghe'he'shan
修真养性 xiu'zhen'yang'xing
不通世务 bu'tong'shi'wu
一寒如此 yi'han'ru'ci
春耕夏耘 chun'geng'xia'yun
贫穷潦倒 pin'qiong'lao'dao
向若而叹 xiang'ruo'er'tan
川泽纳污 chuan'ze'na'wu
浪迹萍踪 lang'ji'ping'zong
意气轩昂 yi'qi'xuan'ang
樵苏后爨 qiao'su'hou'cuan
稽首再拜 ji'shou'zai'bai
怀壁其罪 huai'bi'qi'zui
民安国泰 min'an'guo'tai
故宫禾黍 gu'gong'he'shu
孀妻弱子 shuang''ruo'zi
戎马之地 rong'ma'zhi'di
白日上升 bai'ri'shang'sheng
普天率土 pu'tian'lv'tu
笙磬同音 sheng'qing'tong'yin
焚骨扬灰 fen'gu'yang'hui
缙绅之士 jin'shen'zhi'shi
就汤下面 jiu'tang'xia'mian
乘人之急 cheng'ren'zhi'ji
杀鸡为黍 sha'ji'wei'shu
五行四柱 wu'xing'si'zhu
棨戟遥临 qi'ji'yao'lin
马上得天下 ma'shang'de'tian'xia
背水为阵 bei'shui'wei'zhen
其乐无涯 qi'le'wu'ya
出入起居 chu'ru'qi'ju
静若处子动若脱兔 jing'ruo'chu'zi'dong'ruo'tuo'tu
肩摩踵接 jian'mo'zhong'jie
刮骨去毒 gua'gu'qu'du
满山满谷 man'shan'man'gu
红日三竿 hong'ri'san'gan
溺爱不明 ni'ai'bu'ming
麟角凤毛 lin'jiao'feng'mao
地阔天长 di'kuo'tian'zhang
室如县罄 shi'ru'xian'qing
滔滔不竭 tao'tao'bu'jie
日角龙颜 ri'jiao'long'yan
负薪救火 fu'xin'jiu'huo
百般抚慰 bai'ban'fu'wei
伯道无儿 bo'dao'wu'r
狂奴故态 kuang'nu'gu'tai
偶语弃市 ou'yu'qi'shi
滥官污吏 lan'guan'wu'li
摧兰折玉 cui'lan'zhe'yu
龟年鹤寿 gui'nian'he'shou
震古铄今 zhen'gu'shuo'jin
闻名丧胆 wen'ming'sang'dan
铺眉苫眼 pu'mei'shan'yan
守正不移 shou'zheng'bu'yi
欲取姑与 yu'qu'gu'yu
转日回天 zhuan'ri'hui'tian
恼羞变怒 nao'xiu'bian'nu
珍馐美馔 zhen'xiu'mei'zhuan
铺采摛文 pu'cai'chi'wen
不识高低 bu'shi'gao'di
从头彻尾 cong'tou'che'wei
有例可援 you'li'ke'yuan
凤彩鸾章 feng'cai'luan'zhang
长幼有叙 zhang'you'you'xu
卑宫菲食 bei'gong'fei'shi
骇目惊心 hai'mu'jing'xin
楚楚可爱 chu'chu'ke'ai
众口相传 zhong'kou'xiang'chuan
毁不灭性 hui'bu'mie'xing
得步进步 de'bu'jin'bu
石投大海 shi'tou'da'hai
月是故乡圆 yue'shi'gu'xiang'yuan
弄月嘲风 nong'yue'chao'feng
不可奈何 bu'ke'nai'he
付之度外 fu'zhi'du'wai
暗室不欺 an'shi'bu'qi
草木同腐 cao'mu'tong'fu
季布一诺 ji'bu'yi'nuo
恬不为意 tian'bu'wei'yi
易放难收 yi'fang'nan'shou
重楼叠阁 zhong'lou'die'ge
百端交集 bai'duan'jiao'ji
世济其美 shi'ji'qi'mei
满坐寂然 man'zuo'ji'ran
贪欲无艺 tan'yu'wu'yi
白首相知 bai'shou'xiang'zhi
一家之学 yi'jia'zhi'xue
量能授官 liang'neng'shou'guan
栋折榱崩 dong'zhe'cui'beng
鸡蛋里找骨头 ji'dan'li'zhao'gu'tou
浓装艳抹 nong'zhuang''mo
不绝如线 bu'jue'ru'xian
七拱八翘 qi'gong'ba'qiao
心凝形释 xin'ning'xing'shi
茫无涯际 mang'wu'ya'ji
流血漂杵 liu'xue'piao'chu
朱颜绿发 zhu'yan'lv'fa
丧胆亡魂 sang'dan'wang'hun
如幻如梦 ru'huan'ru'meng
呱呱堕地 gu'gu'duo'di
家亡国破 jia'wang'guo'po
舍近图远 she'jin'tu'yuan
短褐穿结 duan'he'chuan'jie
以法为教 yi'fa'wei'jiao
芙蓉并蒂 fu'rong'bing'di
会少离多 hui'shao'li'duo
南去北来 nan'qu'bei'lai
车马如龙 che'ma'ru'long
一挥九制 yi'hui'jiu'zhi
正正之旗 zheng'zheng'zhi'qi
分情破爱 fen'qing'po'ai
动静有常 dong'jing'you'chang
慈故能勇 ci'gu'neng'yong
铸鼎象物 zhu'ding'xiang'wu
牛头旃檀 niu'tou'zhan'tan
优游岁月 you'you'sui'yue
山高海深 shan'gao'hai'shen
东风入律 dong'feng'ru'lv
鼻塞声重 bi'sai'sheng'zhong
连哄带劝 lian'hong'dai'quan
米已成炊 mi'yi'cheng'chui
上德不德 shang'de'bu'de
词严义正 ci'yan'yi'zheng
吾日三省 wu'ri'san'sheng

言外之味 yan'wai'zhi'wei
绸缪束薪 chou'miao'shu'xin

将机就计 jiang'ji'jiu'ji

面面俱圆 mian'mian'ju'yuan

信及豚鱼 xin'ji'tun'yu

言听计用 yan'ting'ji'yong

须髯如戟 xu'ran'ru'ji
相知恨晚 xiang'zhi'hen'wan
翻箱倒笼 fan'xiang'dao'long
淡而不厌 dan'er'bu'yan
十年读书 shi'nian'du'shu
光明洞彻 guang'ming'dong'che
桃李不言下自成蹊 tao'li'bu'yan'xia'zi'cheng'qi

罕有其匹 han'you'qi'pi

投畀豺虎 tou'bi'chai'hu

秤砣虽小压千斤 cheng'tuo'sui'xiao'ya'qian'jin
婀娜妩媚 e'na'wu'mei
轻骑简从 qing'qi'jian'cong
有天无日 you'tian'wu'ri
绝伦逸群 jue'lun'yi'qun
登高能赋 deng'gao'neng'fu
君子之泽 jun'zi'zhi'ze
大男大女 da'nan'da'nv
首如飞蓬 shou'ru'fei'peng
蚂蚁搬泰山 ma'yi'ban'tai'shan
各门各户 ge'men'ge'hu
大义微言 da'yi'wei'yan
蛇欲吞象 she'yu'tun'xiang
利诱威胁 li'you'wei'xie
葭莩之亲 jia'fu'zhi'qin
淮南八公 huai'nan'ba'gong
祖逖北伐 zu'ti'bei'fa
痛苦万状 tong'ku'wan'zhuang
利而诱之 li'er'you'zhi
辞尊居卑 ci'zun'ju'bei
慢手慢脚 man'shou'man'jiao
欧风东渐 ou'feng'dong'jian
百子千孙 bai'zi'qian'sun
圯上老人 yi'shang'lao'ren
他乡异县 ta'xiang'yi'xian
王八羔子 wang'ba'gao'zi
士志于道 shi'zhi'yu'dao
金钗之年 jin'chai'zhi'nian
连环图画 lian'huan'tu'hua
法语之言 fa'yu'zhi'yan
烟不离手 yan'bu'li'shou
眼大肚小 yan'da'du'xiao
群牧判官 qun'mu'pan'guan
冰心玉壶 bing'xin'yu'hu
养而不教 yang'er'bu'jiao
言行如一 yan'xing'ru'yi
为人谋而不忠乎 wei'ren'mou'er'bu'zhong'hu
打狗还得看主人 da'gou'hai'de'kan'zhu'ren
不见人下 bu'jian'ren'xia
山高人为峰 shan'gao'ren'wei'feng
少年侠气 shao'nian'xia'qi
无上菩提 wu'shang'pu'ti
五花官诰 wu'hua'guan'gao
十款天条 shi'kuan'tian'tiao
救场如救火 jiu'chang'ru'jiu'huo
大觉金仙 da'jue'jin'xian
嘁哩喀喳 qi'li'ka'cha
朋友有信 peng'you'you'xin
大肚便便 da'du'bian'bian
心会跟爱一起走 xin'hui'gen'ai'yi'qi'zou
醉眼惺忪 zui'yan'xing'song
水火相济 shui'huo'xiang'ji
五位百法 wu'wei'bai'fa
知非之年 zhi'fei'zhi'nian
七零八散 qi'ling'ba'san
后世之师 hou'shi'zhi'shi
三招两式 san'zhao'liang'shi
达不离道 da'bu'li'dao
呜呼噫嘻 wu'hu'yi'xi
月似当时 yue'shi'dang'shi
以望复关 yi'wang'fu'guan
忠臣不事二君 zhong'chen'bu'shi'er'jun
舍命不渝 she'ming'bu'yu
一人向隅 yi'ren'xiang'yu
欢饮达旦 huan'yin'da'dan
彻彼桑土 che'bi'sang'tu
眼捷手快 yan'jie'shou'kuai
小材大用 xiao'cai'da'yong
浅而易见 qian'er'yi'jian
披枷戴锁 pi'jia'dai'suo
打铁先得自身硬 da'tie'xian'de'zi'shen'ying
亮节高风 liang'jie'gao'feng
孜孜不息 zi'zi'bu'xi
附赘悬疣 fu'zhui'xuan'you
几声凄厉 ji'sheng'qi'li
春风依旧 chun'feng'yi'jiu
饥火中烧 ji'huo'zhong'shao
口燥唇干 kou'zao'chun'gan
章句之徒 zhang'ju'zhi'tu
顺口开河 shun'kou'kai'he
梦里蝴蝶 meng'li'hu'die
钩深索隐 gou'shen'suo'yin
缄口无言 jian'kou'wu'yan
勿枉勿纵 wu'wang'wu'zong
虎步龙行 hu'bu'long'xing
反裘负刍 fan'qiu'fu'chu
土瘠民贫 tu'ji'min'pin
说嘴打嘴 shuo'zui'da'zui
暗室屋漏 an'shi'wu'lou
饿死事大 e'si'shi'da
云蒸龙变 yun'zheng'long'bian
梧桐夜雨 wu'tong'ye'yu
坚明约束 jian'ming'yue'shu
断瓦残垣 duan'wa'can'yuan
千里不绝 qian'li'bu'jue
理所不容 li'suo'bu'rong
暗箭明枪 an'jian'ming'qiang
摧枯折腐 cui'ku'zhe'fu
达官要人 da'guan'yao'ren
省方观民 sheng'fang'guan'min
村夫俗子 cun'fu'su'zi
公道在人心 gong'dao'zai'ren'xin
秘而不言 mi'er'bu'yan
洗髓伐毛 xi'sui'fa'mao
庙小妖风大 miao'xiao'yao'feng'da
兰摧玉折 lan'cui'yu'zhe
气吞斗牛 qi'tun'dou'niu
锥刀之末 zhui'dao'zhi'mo
爆竹声中辞旧岁 bao'zhu'sheng'zhong'ci'jiu'sui
仙风道气 xian'feng'dao'qi
好女不愁嫁 hao'nv'bu'chou'jia
不遑宁处 bu'huang'ning'chu
首尾贯通 shou'wei'guan'tong
让枣推梨 rang'zao'tui'li
贪求无厌 tan'qiu'wu'yan
饫甘餍肥 yu'gan'yan'fei
浮家泛宅 fu'jia'fan'zhai
大兴问罪之师 da'xing'wen'zui'zhi'shi
本末源流 ben'mo'yuan'liu
干戈扰攘 gan'ge'rao'rang
花残月缺 hua'can'yue'que
辱门败户 ru'men'bai'hu
波波汲汲 bo'bo'ji'ji
疑团莫释 yi'tuan'mo'shi
五陵豪气 wu'ling'hao'qi
一世龙门 yi'shi'long'men
贾宪三角 gu'xian'san'jiao
众犬吠声 zhong'quan'fei'sheng
切齿咬牙 qie'chi'yao'ya
一别如雨 yi'bie'ru'yu
开云见日 kai'yun'jian'ri
宴安鸩毒 yan'an'zhen'du
佩紫怀黄 pei'zi'huai'huang
晚节黄花 wan'jie'huang'hua
无酒不成宴 wu'jiu'bu'cheng'yan
车在马前 che'zai'ma'qian
浮云富贵 fu'yun'fu'gui
通风报讯 tong'feng'bao'xun
一泻汪洋 yi'xie'wang'yang
好天良夜 hao'tian'liang'ye
群雌粥粥 qun'ci'zhou'zhou
断简残编 duan'jian'can'bian
青山依旧 qing'shan'yi'jiu
心悦神怡 xin'yue'shen'yi
委委佗佗 wei'wei'tuo'tuo
乳波臀浪 ru'bo'tun'lang
日新月盛 ri'xin'yue'sheng
火伞高张 huo'san'gao'zhang
衮衣绣裳 gun'yi'xiu'shang
宿世冤家 su'shi'yuan'jia
裂土分茅 lie'tu'fen'mao
得君行道 de'jun'xing'dao
立国安邦 li'guo'an'bang
作金石声 zuo'jin'shi'sheng
称帝称王 cheng'di'cheng'wang
昼夜不舍 zhou'ye'bu'she
欲笑还颦 yu'xiao'hai'pin
俎上之肉 zu'shang'zhi'rou
池浅王八多 chi'qian'wang'ba'duo
惠子相梁 hui'zi'xiang'liang
两处闲愁 liang'chu'xian'chou
可堪回首 ke'kan'hui'shou
耿耿不寐 geng'geng'bu'mei
贺兰山缺 he'lan'shan'que
为国以礼 wei'guo'yi'li
湘春夜月 xiang'chun'ye'yue
有物混成 you'wu'hun'cheng
含德之厚 han'de'zhi'hou
江东三虎 jiang'dong'san'hu
冻馁之患 dong'nei'zhi'huan
爱上层楼 ai'shang'ceng'lou
谗言三及 chan'yan'san'ji
二十八星 er'shi'ba'xing
千种风情 qian'zhong'feng'qing
欺下瞒上 qi'xia'man'shang
三餐不继 san'can'bu'ji
姑孰十咏 gu'shu'shi'yong
神清气和 shen'qing'qi'he
劳工神圣 lao'gong'shen'sheng
宰予昼寝 zai'yu'zhou'qin
往日繁华 wang'ri'fan'hua
雾失楼台 wu'shi'lou'tai
则修文德以来之 ze'xiu'wen'de'yi'lai'zhi
居仁由义 ju'ren'you'yi
疾病相扶 ji'bing'xiang'fu
累牍连篇 lei'du'lian'pian
醉舞狂歌 zui'wu'kuang'ge
国利民福 guo'li'min'fu
吃水不忘打井人 chi'shui'bu'wang'da'jing'ren
三门四户 san'men'si'hu
探本穷源 tan'ben'qiong'yuan
病病殃殃 bing'bing'yang'yang
高位厚禄 gao'wei'hou'lu
流水不腐户枢不蠹 liu'shui'bu'fu'hu'shu'bu'du
严气正性 yan'qi'zheng'xing
寸阴若岁 cun'yin'ruo'sui
寇不可玩 kou'bu'ke'wan
都鄙有章 dou'bi'you'zhang
发荣滋长 fa'rong'zi'zhang
一游一豫 yi'you'yi'yu
隔雾看花 ge'wu'kan'hua
犯颜极谏 fan'yan'ji'jian
忍心害理 ren'xin'hai'li
旁行斜上 pang'xing'xie'shang
天诱其衷 tian'you'qi'zhong
大匠运斤 da'jiang'yun'jin
罪业深重 zui'ye'shen'zhong
分别部居 fen'bie'bu'ju
口诵心惟 kou'song'xin'wei
逞心如意 cheng'xin'ru'yi
专欲难成 zhuan'yu'nan'cheng
涕泪交下 ti'lei'jiao'xia
锣鼓听声 luo'gu'ting'sheng
厚味腊毒 hou'wei'la'du
挂肚牵肠 gua'du'qian'chang
是非人我 shi'fei'ren'wo
精疲力倦 jing'pi'li'juan
蹈汤赴火 dao'tang'fu'huo
大有其人 da'you'qi'ren
仰首伸眉 yang'shou'shen'mei
困而学之 kun'er'xue'zhi
本同末异 ben'tong'mo'yi
立身行己 li'shen'xing'ji
傲骨嶙峋 ao'gu'lin'xun
五斗折腰 wu'dou'zhe'yao
欺天罔人 qi'tian'wang'ren
修文偃武 xiu'wen'yan'wu
望风捕影 wang'feng'bu'ying
有职无权 you'zhi'wu'quan
颐养精神 yi'yang'jing'shen
耕三余一 geng'san'yu'yi
朝斯夕斯 chao'si'xi'si
大车以载 da'che'yi'zai
事出不意 shi'chu'bu'yi
八两半斤 ba'liang'ban'jin
钱到公事办 qian'dao'gong'shi'ban
囚首丧面 qiu'shou'sang'mian
肉跳心惊 rou'tiao'xin'jing
胸无成竹 xiong'wu'cheng'zhu
身无完肤 shen'wu'wan'fu
闭门觅句 bi'men'mi'ju
春生夏长秋收冬藏 chun'sheng'xia'zhang'qiu'shou'dong'cang
胆大心粗 dan'da'xin'cu
花晨月夕 hua'chen'yue'xi
惊世绝俗 jing'shi'jue'su
金碧辉映 jin'bi'hui'ying
莺飞燕舞 ying'fei'yan'wu
抽筋剥皮 chou'jin'bo'pi
不厌求详 bu'yan'qiu'xiang
元元本本 yuan'yuan'ben'ben
济人利物 ji'ren'li'wu
如箭离弦 ru'jian'li'xian
左宜右有 zuo'yi'you'you
暗室欺心 an'shi'qi'xin
日旰忘食 ri'gan'wang'shi
一塌括子 yi'ta'kuo'zi
按甲休兵 an'jia'xiu'bing
见善若惊 jian'shan'ruo'jing
德音莫违 de'yin'mo'wei
无坚不陷 wu'jian'bu'xian
家无担石 jia'wu'dan'shi
胁不沾席 xie'bu'zhan'xi
欺以其方 qi'yi'qi'fang
稂莠不齐 lang'you'bu'qi
去故就新 qu'gu'jiu'xin
对客挥毫 dui'ke'hui'hao
意意思思 yi'yi'si'si
镂骨铭心 lou'gu'ming'xin
云飞泥沉 yun'fei'ni'chen
一卧不起 yi'wo'bu'qi
腊尽春回 la'jin'chun'hui
地丑德齐 di'chou'de'qi
握拳透爪 wo'quan'tou'zhao
百举百全 bai'ju'bai'quan
不安其位 bu'an'qi'wei
不敢后人 bu'gan'hou'ren

气吞牛斗 qi'tun'niu'dou
略不世出 e'bu'shi'chu

同声共气 tong'sheng'gong'qi
凤舞龙蟠 feng'wu'long'pan
皮相之见 pi'xiang'zhi'jian

傲睨一世 ao'ni'yi'shi

三旬九食 san'xun'jiu'shi

安然如故 an'ran'ru'gu

重厚少文 zhong'hou'shao'wen
云情雨意 yun'qing'yu'yi
珠沉玉碎 zhu'chen'yu'sui

气盛言宜 qi'sheng'yan'yi

存亡安危 cun'wang'an'wei
随地随时 sui'di'sui'shi

傥来之物 tang'lai'zhi'wu

判然不同 pan'ran'bu'tong

贪吃懒做 tan'chi'lan'zuo

吠非其主 fei'fei'qi'zhu

撒娇使性 sa'jiao'shi'xing
大风有隧 da'feng'you'sui
九鼎大吕 jiu'ding'da'lv
杜门却扫 du'men'que'sao

人心世道 ren'xin'shi'dao

前尘影事 qian'chen'ying'shi
形散神聚 xing'san'shen'ju
高文宏议 gao'wen'hong'yi

危言高论 wei'yan'gao'lun

以夜继昼 yi'ye'ji'zhou
千里之足 qian'li'zhi'zu
甘酒嗜音 gan'jiu'shi'yin
存亡生死 cun'wang'sheng'si
豆棚瓜架 dou'peng'gua'jia
感慨激昂 gan'kai'ji'ang
酒酸不售 jiu'suan'bu'shou
云舒霞卷 yun'shu'xia'juan

贫而乐道 pin'er'le'dao
画梁雕栋 hua'liang'diao'dong
兵无斗志 bing'wu'dou'zhi

貌比潘安 mao'bi'pan'an

枯木生花 ku'mu'sheng'hua
人亡家破 ren'wang'jia'po
牵牛织女 qian'niu'zhi'nv
吊胆提心 diao'dan'ti'xin
铁鞋踏破 tie'xie'ta'po
抛珠滚玉 pao'zhu'gun'yu
清丽俊逸 qing'li'jun'yi
陈力就列 chen'li'jiu'lie
人皆掩鼻 ren'jie'yan'bi
竭智尽忠 jie'zhi'jin'zhong
阿娇金屋 a'jiao'jin'wu
明若观火 ming'ruo'guan'huo
异口同音 yi'kou'tong'yin
快刀斩麻 kuai'dao'zhan'ma
磨砺以须 mo'li'yi'xu
匿影藏形 ni'ying'cang'xing
挤挤攘攘 ji'ji'rang'rang
猿啼鹤唳 yuan'ti'he'li
临时施宜 lin'shi'shi'yi
一之为甚 yi'zhi'wei'shen
吃辛吃苦 chi'xin'chi'ku
令月吉日 ling'yue'ji'ri
长斋礼佛 zhang'zhai'li'fu
绳愆纠缪 sheng'qian'jiu'miao
三分鼎足 san'fen'ding'zu
登台拜将 deng'tai'bai'jiang
鼠肝虫臂 shu'gan'chong'bi
拾人涕唾 shi'ren'ti'tuo
火灭烟消 huo'mie'yan'xiao
飘风骤雨 piao'feng'zhou'yu
星落云散 xing'luo'yun'san
秤平斗满 cheng'ping'dou'man
矮子观场 ai'zi'guan'chang
三生杜牧 san'sheng'du'mu
名花无主 ming'hua'wu'zhu
通观全局 tong'guan'quan'ju
傍人门户 bang'ren'men'hu
雁杳鱼沉 yan'yao'yu'chen
团花簇锦 tuan'hua'cu'jin
贤母良妻 xian'mu'liang'qi
贵人多忘 gui'ren'duo'wang
义不反顾 yi'bu'fan'gu
残膏剩馥 can'gao'sheng'fu
快步流星 kuai'bu'liu'xing
积玉堆金 ji'yu'dui'jin
乃心王室 nai'xin'wang'shi
金榜提名 jin'bang'ti'ming
夙夜匪解 su'ye'fei'jie
恰逢其会 qia'feng'qi'hui
一挥而成 yi'hui'er'cheng
力敌万夫 li'di'wan'fu
所答非所问 suo'da'fei'suo'wen
恭行天罚 gong'xing'tian'fa
深根固蒂 shen'gen'gu'di
西窗剪烛 xi'chuang''zhu
草间偷活 cao'jian'tou'huo
贫病交攻 pin'bing'jiao'gong
犹解倒悬 you'jie'dao'xuan
患难相恤 huan'nan'xiang'xu
雨淋日晒 yu'lin'ri'shai
高爵显位 gao'jue'xian'wei
弥缝其阙 mi'feng'qi'que
孚尹旁达 fu'yin'pang'da
朝过夕改 chao'guo'xi'gai
半筹莫展 ban'chou'mo'zhan
遇水叠桥 yu'shui'die'qiao
把臂入林 ba'bi'ru'lin
触目伤心 chu'mu'shang'xin
千里一曲 qian'li'yi'qu
洞烛先机 dong'zhu'xian'ji
无病一身轻 wu'bing'yi'shen'qing
食不充饥 shi'bu'chong'ji
惹草拈花 re'cao'nian'hua
借剑杀人 jie'jian'sha'ren
重足屏气 zhong'zu'ping'qi
乌集之交 wu'ji'zhi'jiao
尽心而已 jin'xin'er'yi
迷而不返 mi'er'bu'fan
有口难分 you'kou'nan'fen
击节称叹 ji'jie'cheng'tan
见神见鬼 jian'shen'jian'gui
完美无疵 wan'mei'wu'ci
怀宝迷邦 huai'bao'mi'bang
婢学夫人 bi'xue'fu'ren
消磨岁月 xiao'mo'sui'yue
出群拔萃 chu'qun'ba'cui
墨子悲丝 mo'zi'bei'si
良时吉日 liang'shi'ji'ri
国色无双 guo'se'wu'shuang
问一答十 wen'yi'da'shi
花攒锦簇 hua'zan'jin'cu
之死靡它 zhi'si'mi'ta
不世之业 bu'shi'zhi'ye
百犬吠声 bai'quan'fei'sheng
利口捷给 li'kou'jie'gei
乘龙佳婿 cheng'long'jia'xu
象耕鸟耘 xiang'geng'niao'yun
侯门如海 hou'men'ru'hai
雨后送伞 yu'hou'song'san
终焉之志 zhong'yan'zhi'zhi
响彻云际 xiang'che'yun'ji
南能北秀 nan'neng'bei'xiu
劈头劈脸 pi'tou'pi'lian
哓哓不休 xiao'xiao'bu'xiu
惊师动众 jing'shi'dong'zhong
三尸暴跳 san'shi'bao'tiao
阴山背后 yin'shan'bei'hou
有子存焉 you'zi'cun'yan
尊古卑今 zun'gu'bei'jin
济河焚舟 ji'he'fen'zhou
椿萱并茂 chun'xuan'bing'mao
旌旗蔽天 jing'qi'bi'tian
松柏长青 song'bai'zhang'qing
弩张剑拔 nu'zhang'jian'ba
渐不可长 jian'bu'ke'zhang
国耳忘家 guo'er'wang'jia
类是而非 lei'shi'er'fei
弃旧换新 qi'jiu'huan'xin
低头丧气 di'tou'sang'qi
喜则气缓 xi'ze'qi'huan
难越雷池 nan'yue'lei'chi
云消雨散 yun'xiao'yu'san
乐山爱水 le'shan'ai'shui
三千威仪 san'qian'wei'yi
志之所向 zhi'zhi'suo'xiang
天下缟素 tian'xia'gao'su
纷乱如麻 fen'luan'ru'ma
尔雅温文 er'ya'wen'wen
祸至无日 huo'zhi'wu'ri
十亲九眷 shi'qin'jiu'juan
风流宰相 feng'liu'zai'xiang
雕肝琢肾 diao'gan'zuo'shen
狗猪不食其余 gou'zhu'bu'shi'qi'yu
群威群胆 qun'wei'qun'dan
雕栏画栋 diao'lan'hua'dong
令闻广誉 ling'wen'guang'yu
其应若响 qi'ying'ruo'xiang
言三语四 yan'san'yu'si
慈航普度 ci'hang'pu'du
善为说辞 shan'wei'shuo'ci
繁弦急管 fan'xian'ji'guan
七纵七擒 qi'zong'qi'qin
戏鸿堂帖 xi'hong'tang'tie
说白道黑 shuo'bai'dao'hei
空心汤团 kong'xin'tang'tuan
随缘乐助 sui'yuan'le'zhu
太一余粮 tai'yi'yu'liang
枕山栖谷 zhen'shan'qi'gu
原璧归赵 yuan'bi'gui'zhao
如胶投漆 ru'jiao'tou'qi
白鹿皮币 bai'lu'pi'bi
鸡犬不闻 ji'quan'bu'wen
居官守法 ju'guan'shou'fa
春秋之义 chun'qiu'zhi'yi
割地称臣 ge'di'cheng'chen
惟日不足 wei'ri'bu'zu
浪静风平 lang'jing'feng'ping
五步成诗 wu'bu'cheng'shi
见貌辨色 jian'mao'bian'se
研精覃思 yan'jing'qin'si
湖海之士 hu'hai'zhi'shi
恭而敬之 gong'er'jing'zhi
能写能算 neng'xie'neng'suan
宏才大略 hong'cai'da'e
分香卖履 fen'xiang'mai'lv
得失参半 de'shi'can'ban
执鞭随镫 zhi'bian'sui'deng
上不着天下不着地 shang'bu'zhe'tian'xia'bu'zhe'di
如埙如篪 ru'xun'ru'chi
焕然如新 huan'ran'ru'xin
伐罪吊民 fa'zui'diao'min
一饭三吐哺 yi'fan'san'tu'bu
易俗移风 yi'su'yi'feng
抱残守阙 bao'can'shou'que
一身都是胆 yi'shen'dou'shi'dan
烟云过眼 yan'yun'guo'yan
半间不界 ban'jian'bu'jie
乾坤再造 gan'kun'zai'zao
础润而雨 chu'run'er'yu
巢倾卵覆 chao'qing'luan'fu
神鬼难测 shen'gui'nan'ce
尺幅千里 chi'fu'qian'li
甘心首疾 gan'xin'shou'ji
有枝有叶 you'zhi'you'ye
惜老怜贫 xi'lao'lian'pin
正色立朝 zheng'se'li'chao
穷日之力 qiong'ri'zhi'li
惹事招非 re'shi'zhao'fei
日坐愁城 ri'zuo'chou'cheng
文章盖世 wen'zhang'gai'shi
同条共贯 tong'tiao'gong'guan
层台累榭 ceng'tai'lei'xie
屋乌推爱 wu'wu'tui'ai
尖嘴薄舌 jian'zui'bao'she
敬老怜贫 jing'lao'lian'pin
旁搜远绍 pang'sou'yuan'shao
三纸无驴 san'zhi'wu'lv
善与人同 shan'yu'ren'tong
近山识鸟音 jin'shan'shi'niao'yin
遮地漫天 zhe'di'man'tian
头破血出 tou'po'xue'chu
尤而效之 you'er'xiao'zhi
学书不成 xue'shu'bu'cheng
入国问禁 ru'guo'wen'jin
顽梗不化 wan'geng'bu'hua
誓死不渝 shi'si'bu'yu
帮闲钻懒 bang'xian'zuan'lan
剑气箫心 jian'qi'xiao'xin
言必信行必果 yan'bi'xin'xing'bi'guo
大限临头 da'xian'lin'tou
覆军杀将 fu'jun'sha'jiang
恶居下流 e'ju'xia'liu
勤俭朴实 qin'jian'pu'shi
一雨成秋 yi'yu'cheng'qiu
随风逐浪 sui'feng'zhu'lang
沁人心腑 qin'ren'xin'fu
应对如响 ying'dui'ru'xiang
下气怡色 xia'qi'yi'se
知恩报德 zhi'en'bao'de
飞鹰走犬 fei'ying'zou'quan
诈谋奇计 zha'mou'qi'ji
一行作吏 yi'xing'zuo'li
枵腹从公 xiao'fu'cong'gong
封侯万里 feng'hou'wan'li
言行相悖 yan'xing'xiang'bei
苍蝇见血 cang'ying'jian'xue
鞠为茂草 ju'wei'mao'cao
倍道而进 bei'dao'er'jin
纷红骇绿 fen'hong'hai'lv
冰寒于水 bing'han'yu'shui
省身克己 sheng'shen'ke'ji
坦腹东床 tan'fu'dong'chuang

擎天架海 qing'tian'jia'hai
七行俱下 qi'xing'ju'xia
鱼水和谐 yu'shui'he'xie

分我杯羹 fen'wo'bei'geng
有脚阳春 you'jiao'yang'chun

瘴雨蛮烟 zhang'yu'man'yan
听人穿鼻 ting'ren'chuan'bi
目秀眉清 mu'xiu'mei'qing
日月交食 ri'yue'jiao'shi
永矢弗谖 yong'shi'fu'xuan
灰身灭智 hui'shen'mie'zhi
刻木为吏 ke'mu'wei'li

择人而事 ze'ren'er'shi
狗颠屁股 gou'dian'pi'gu
汉奸势力 han'jian'shi'li
去太去甚 qu'tai'qu'shen

翠绕珠围 cui'rao'zhu'wei
脸红耳热 lian'hong'er're

负笈从师 fu'ji'cong'shi
安其所习 an'qi'suo'xi

孤雏腐鼠 gu'chu'fu'shu
兴废继绝 xing'fei'ji'jue

安分随时 an'fen'sui'shi

矫时慢物 jiao'shi'man'wu
车马喧阗 che'ma'xuan'tian
万载千秋 wan'zai'qian'qiu
蝎蝎螫螫 xie'xie'shi'shi
心花怒发 xin'hua'nu'fa
同心一德 tong'xin'yi'de
牝鸡无晨 pin'ji'wu'chen
金汤之固 jin'tang'zhi'gu
人心齐泰山移 ren'xin'qi'tai'shan'yi
勤则不匮 qin'ze'bu'kui
三茶六礼 san'cha'liu'li
不识之无 bu'shi'zhi'wu
鱼雁往返 yu'yan'wang'fan
知名当世 zhi'ming'dang'shi
花花轿子人抬人 hua'hua'jiao'zi'ren'tai'ren
闻斯行诸 wen'si'xing'zhu
兴波作浪 xing'bo'zuo'lang
道君皇帝 dao'jun'huang'di
物无美恶 wu'wu'mei'e
吃菜事魔 chi'cai'shi'mo
人无横财不富 ren'wu'heng'cai'bu'fu
五行并下 wu'xing'bing'xia
在外靠朋友 zai'wai'kao'peng'you
东土九祖 dong'tu'jiu'zu
白足和尚 bai'zu'he'shang
奇离古怪 qi'li'gu'guai
风尘之警 feng'chen'zhi'jing
千里不同风 qian'li'bu'tong'feng
裙屐少年 qun'ji'shao'nian
山高水深 shan'gao'shui'shen
忍痛牺牲 ren'tong'xi'sheng
穷凶恶极 qiong'xiong'e'ji
加盐加醋 jia'yan'jia'cu
攻无不胜 gong'wu'bu'sheng
快手快脚 kuai'shou'kuai'jiao
落日楼头 luo'ri'lou'tou
杖朝之年 zhang'chao'zhi'nian
无情风雨 wu'qing'feng'yu
长啸一声 zhang'xiao'yi'sheng
死伤枕藉 si'shang'zhen'ji
乍暖乍寒 zha'nuan'zha'han
温其如玉 wen'qi'ru'yu
才气纵横 cai'qi'zong'heng
江神子慢 jiang'shen'zi'man
有钱用在刀刃上 you'qian'yong'zai'dao'ren'shang
天不变道亦不变 tian'bu'bian'dao'yi'bu'bian
威振天下 wei'zhen'tian'xia
春服既成 chun'fu'ji'cheng
釜底之鱼 fu'di'zhi'yu
胜似春光 sheng'shi'chun'guang
风鬟霜鬓 feng'huan'shuangbin'bin
若出其里 ruo'chu'qi'li
碌碌之辈 lu'lu'zhi'bei
千古一人 qian'gu'yi'ren
吓杀人香 xia'sha'ren'xiang
两好合一好 liang'hao'he'yi'hao
人恒敬之 ren'heng'jing'zhi
勤而行之 qin'er'xing'zhi
多见阙殆 duo'jian'que'dai
漫天烽火 man'tian'feng'huo
虎口拔须 hu'kou'ba'xu
九白之贡 jiu'bai'zhi'gong
有仇不报非君子 you'chou'bu'bao'fei'jun'zi
过则为灾 guo'ze'wei'zai
长太息以掩涕兮 zhang'tai'xi'yi'yan'ti'xi
阿耨达山 a'nou'da'shan
存亡之秋 cun'wang'zhi'qiu
好铁不打钉 hao'tie'bu'da'ding
为人不做亏心事 wei'ren'bu'zuo'kui'xin'shi
音声相和 yin'sheng'xiang'he
无物之象 wu'wu'zhi'xiang
士可杀而不可辱 shi'ke'sha'er'bu'ke'ru
有钱道真语 you'qian'dao'zhen'yu
贵客临门 gui'ke'lin'men
带经而锄 dai'jing'er'chu
知常曰明 zhi'chang'yue'ming
君子怀德 jun'zi'huai'de
两不相干 liang'bu'xiang'gan
实而备之 shi'er'bei'zhi
君臣有义 jun'chen'you'yi
有时似傻如狂 you'shi'shi'sha'ru'kuang
远之则怨 yuan'zhi'ze'yuan
雾海夜航 wu'hai'ye'hang
子贡问政 zi'gong'wen'zheng
善感多愁 shan'gan'duo'chou
竹林听雨 zhu'lin'ting'yu
行为偏僻性乖张 xing'wei'pian'pi'xing'guai'zhang
半糖夫妻 ban'tang'fu'qi
知恩必报 zhi'en'bi'bao
忧思难忘 you'si'nan'wang
没羽箭张清 mei'yu'jian'zhang'qing
举尔所知 ju'er'suo'zhi
人得而诛之 ren'de'er'zhu'zhi
五步一楼 wu'bu'yi'lou
寂兮寥兮 ji'xi'liao'xi
眼福不浅 yan'fu'bu'qian
物或恶之 wu'huo'e'zhi
可惜流年 ke'xi'liu'nian
有钱难买老来瘦 you'qian'nan'mai'lao'lai'shou
汗流如雨 han'liu'ru'yu
凄清如许 qi'qing'ru'xu
人饥己饥 ren'ji'ji'ji
超凡出世 chao'fan'chu'shi
连衽成帷 lian'ren'cheng'wei
费嘴皮子 fei'zui'pi'zi
雁字回时 yan'zi'hui'shi
金陵王气 jin'ling'wang'qi
人善人欺天不欺 ren'shan'ren'qi'tian'bu'qi
诞罔不经 dan'wang'bu'jing
闭月羞花般 bi'yue'xiu'hua'ban
人生实难 ren'sheng'shi'nan
相知有素 xiang'zhi'you'su
除臣洗马 chu'chen'xi'ma
知足者富 zhi'zu'zhe'fu
南朝民歌 nan'chao'min'ge
为天下溪 wei'tian'xia'xi
方正贤良 fang'zheng'xian'liang
金印如斗 jin'yin'ru'dou
依人篱下 yi'ren'li'xia
名实难副 ming'shi'nan'fu
趔趔趄趄 lie'lie'ju'ju
营火晚会 ying'huo'wan'hui
匠心独妙 jiang'xin'du'miao
同休等戚 tong'xiu'deng'qi
匪朝伊夕 fei'chao'yi'xi
独此一家别无分店 du'ci'yi'jia'bie'wu'fen'dian
洗垢求瘢 xi'gou'qiu'ban
黑地昏天 hei'di'hun'tian
护国佑民 hu'guo'you'min
标新领异 biao'xin'ling'yi
通盘计划 tong'pan'ji'hua
如履如临 ru'lv'ru'lin
改张易调 gai'zhang'yi'diao
闳言崇议 hong'yan'chong'yi
一秉至公 yi'bing'zhi'gong
格格不纳 ge'ge'bu'na
甲第连云 jia'di'lian'yun
野人献曝 ye'ren'xian'pu
物壮则老 wu'zhuang''lao
重九登高 zhong'jiu'deng'gao
泣血椎心 qi'xue'chui'xin
法不徇情 fa'bu'xun'qing
讪牙闲嗑 shan'ya'xian'ke
迁乔出谷 qian'qiao'chu'gu
笙歌彻夜 sheng'ge'che'ye
杀一利百 sha'yi'li'bai
寄雁传书 ji'yan'chuan'shu
画荻教子 hua'di'jiao'zi
一片散沙 yi'pian'san'sha
目所未睹 mu'suo'wei'du
剖心坼肝 pou'xin'che'gan
乌鹊南飞 wu'que'nan'fei
返魂无术 fan'hun'wu'shu
赫然有声 he'ran'you'sheng
夷然自若 yi'ran'zi'ruo
日出而作日入而息 ri'chu'er'zuo'ri'ru'er'xi
字字珠玉 zi'zi'zhu'yu
迁莺出谷 qian'ying'chu'gu
脚踢拳打 jiao'ti'quan'da
钳口结舌 qian'kou'jie'she
如鱼似水 ru'yu'shi'shui
矫情饰貌 jiao'qing'shi'mao
简捷了当 jian'jie'le'dang
贫不学俭 pin'bu'xue'jian
伐性之斧 fa'xing'zhi'fu
霞裙月帔 xia'qun'yue'pei
多事多患 duo'shi'duo'huan
三年化碧 san'nian'hua'bi
贪欲无厌 tan'yu'wu'yan
开台锣鼓 kai'tai'luo'gu
五方杂厝 wu'fang'za'cuo
真赃实犯 zhen'zang'shi'fan
忧公忘私 you'gong'wang'si
何其毒也 he'qi'du'ye
祸福倚伏 huo'fu'yi'fu
盘石之安 pan'shi'zhi'an
风尘之言 feng'chen'zhi'yan
噬脐无及 shi'qi'wu'ji
吃粮不管事 chi'liang'bu'guan'shi
里外夹攻 li'wai'jia'gong
侯王将相 hou'wang'jiang'xiang
闲情别致 xian'qing'bie'zhi
毁钟为铎 hui'zhong'wei'duo
废然而反 fei'ran'er'fan
肌理细腻 ji'li'xi'ni
则以学文 ze'yi'xue'wen
因缘为市 yin'yuan'wei'shi
金口木舌 jin'kou'mu'she
攻苦食啖 gong'ku'shi'dan
道亦乐得之 dao'yi'le'de'zhi
济世安邦 ji'shi'an'bang
初出茅芦 chu'chu'mao'lu
西山日迫 xi'shan'ri'po
坐运筹策 zuo'yun'chou'ce
平康正直 ping'kang'zheng'zhi
舞勺之年 wu'shao'zhi'nian
执鞭坠镫 zhi'bian'zhui'deng
香消玉碎 xiang'xiao'yu'sui
命俦啸侣 ming'chou'xiao'lv
贵极人臣 gui'ji'ren'chen
立雪程门 li'xue'cheng'men
同利相死 tong'li'xiang'si
切中时病 qie'zhong'shi'bing
回春之术 hui'chun'zhi'shu
止暴禁非 zhi'bao'jin'fei
根生土长 gen'sheng'tu'zhang
成精作怪 cheng'jing'zuo'guai
及锋而试 ji'feng'er'shi
非钱不行 fei'qian'bu'xing
平地青云 ping'di'qing'yun
挨肩叠背 ai'jian'die'bei
一时半霎 yi'shi'ban'sha
家长理短 jia'zhang'li'duan
神采焕然 shen'cai'huan'ran
匪躬之节 fei'gong'zhi'jie
遥相应和 yao'xiang'ying'he
不解衣带 bu'jie'yi'dai
就虚避实 jiu'xu'bi'shi
寸铁杀人 cun'tie'sha'ren
连类比物 lian'lei'bi'wu
不轻然诺 bu'qing'ran'nuo
剔抽秃刷 ti'chou'tu'shua
袁安高卧 yuan'an'gao'wo
应权通变 ying'quan'tong'bian
神气扬扬 shen'qi'yang'yang
酿成大患 niang'cheng'da'huan
老而益壮 lao'er'yi'zhuang
打着灯笼没处找 da'zhe'deng'long'mei'chu'zhao
和风拂面 he'feng'fu'mian
江东步兵 jiang'dong'bu'bing
求索无厌 qiu'suo'wu'yan
丰亨豫大 feng'heng'yu'da
按堵如故 an'du'ru'gu
左旋右抽 zuo'xuan'you'chou
英才盖世 ying'cai'gai'shi
无古不成今 wu'gu'bu'cheng'jin
善复为妖 shan'fu'wei'yao
喇叭声咽 la'ba'sheng'yan
油脂麻花 you'zhi'ma'hua
人皆仰之 ren'jie'yang'zhi
无钱语不真 wu'qian'yu'bu'zhen
骑虎之势 qi'hu'zhi'shi
图难于易 tu'nan'yu'yi
风传一时 feng'chuan'yi'shi
尘缘未断 chen'yuan'wei'duan
有过则改 you'guo'ze'gai
杳无信息 yao'wu'xin'xi
小小寰球 xiao'xiao'huan'qiu
百姓皆谓 bai'xing'jie'wei
百里杜氏 bai'li'du'shi
胜人者力 sheng'ren'zhe'li
见钱关子 jian'qian'guan'zi
事亲为大 shi'qin'wei'da

雷声大雨 lei'sheng'da'yu
莫之能守 mo'zhi'neng'shou
庄子送葬 zhuang''song'zang
亲而誉之 qin'er'yu'zhi
外无旷夫 wai'wu'kuang'fu

安魂定魄 an'hun'ding'po
明月之诗 ming'yue'zhi'shi

神头鬼面 shen'tou'gui'mian

无所可否 wu'suo'ke'fou

入主出奴 ru'zhu'chu'nu

屦贱踊贵 ju'jian'yong'gui
赏不当功 shang'bu'dang'gong
书不释手 shu'bu'shi'shou
左萦右拂 zuo'ying'you'fu
别易会难 bie'yi'hui'nan
饮血茹毛 yin'xue'ru'mao
巍巍荡荡 wei'wei'dang'dang

悲欢聚散 bei'huan'ju'san

退有后言 tui'you'hou'yan
一鞭一条痕 yi'bian'yi'tiao'hen
一还一报 yi'hai'yi'bao
心忙意乱 xin'mang'yi'luan
莫信直中直 mo'xin'zhi'zhong'zhi
天高地下 tian'gao'di'xia
燕巢于幕 yan'chao'yu'mu
一谷不升 yi'gu'bu'sheng
以半击倍 yi'ban'ji'bei
四方辐辏 si'fang'fu'cou
馔玉炊金 zhuan'yu'chui'jin
平步登天 ping'bu'deng'tian
公侯干城 gong'hou'gan'cheng
熟路轻车 shu'lu'qing'che
敝盖不弃 bi'gai'bu'qi
对证下药 dui'zheng'xia'yao
对症发药 dui'zheng'fa'yao
水流花落 shui'liu'hua'luo
积沙成滩 ji'sha'cheng'tan
眉欢眼笑 mei'huan'yan'xiao
士饱马腾 shi'bao'ma'teng
浪蝶狂蜂 lang'die'kuang'feng
黄泉之下 huang'quan'zhi'xia
宰相肚里好撑船 zai'xiang'du'li'hao'cheng'chuan
酒后无德 jiu'hou'wu'de
一寸丹心 yi'cun'dan'xin
独异于人 du'yi'yu'ren
无地自处 wu'di'zi'chu
桃李成蹊 tao'li'cheng'qi
拿刀动杖 na'dao'dong'zhang
闷海愁山 men'hai'chou'shan
更令明号 geng'ling'ming'hao
含垢忍耻 han'gou'ren'chi
出言有章 chu'yan'you'zhang
喻之以理 yu'zhi'yi'li
吴越同舟 wu'yue'tong'zhou
中心如噎 zhong'xin'ru'ye
煨干就湿 wei'gan'jiu'shi
扫穴犁庭 sao'xue'li'ting
金石至交 jin'shi'zhi'jiao
高下其手 gao'xia'qi'shou
穿房入户 chuan'fang'ru'hu
徙薪曲突 xi'xin'qu'tu
朽木粪土 xiu'mu'fen'tu
礼乐崩坏 li'le'beng'huai
助天为虐 zhu'tian'wei'nve
顺风扯旗 shun'feng'che'qi
人是衣裳马是鞍 ren'shi'yi'shang'ma'shi'an
无昼无夜 wu'zhou'wu'ye
殊涂同归 shu'tu'tong'gui
安危相易 an'wei'xiang'yi
哀戚之情 ai'qi'zhi'qing
一诺无辞 yi'nuo'wu'ci
开口见心 kai'kou'jian'xin
折腰升斗 zhe'yao'sheng'dou
屐齿之折 ji'chi'zhi'zhe
人贫志短 ren'pin'zhi'duan
一介之善 yi'jie'zhi'shan
明来暗去 ming'lai'an'qu
画地为狱 hua'di'wei'yu
朱干玉戚 zhu'gan'yu'qi

二满三平 er'man'san'ping
恶衣菲食 e'yi'fei'shi
诛求无厌 zhu'qiu'wu'yan
自身恐惧 zi'shen'kong'ju
进本退末 jin'ben'tui'mo
愁眉苦眼 chou'mei'ku'yan
公是公非 gong'shi'gong'fei
入孝出弟 ru'xiao'chu'di
长林丰草 zhang'lin'feng'cao
黄衣使者 huang'yi'shi'zhe
连二并三 lian'er'bing'san
三贤十圣 san'xian'shi'sheng
潜踪隐迹 qian'zong'yin'ji
鹤唳风声 he'li'feng'sheng
三生有缘 san'sheng'you'yuan
实心眼儿 shi'xin'yan'r
只字片纸 zhi'zi'pian'zhi
于飞之乐 yu'fei'zhi'le
翻陈出新 fan'chen'chu'xin
桀骜不恭 jie'ao'bu'gong
不足为意 bu'zu'wei'yi
乐昌分镜 le'chang'fen'jing
章句小儒 zhang'ju'xiao'ru
备位充数 bei'wei'chong'shu
疾如雷电 ji'ru'lei'dian
大为折服 da'wei'zhe'fu
能言巧辩 neng'yan'qiao'bian
矢石之间 shi'shi'zhi'jian
案剑瞋目 an'jian'chen'mu

大有径庭 da'you'jing'ting

以逸击劳 yi'yi'ji'lao
一心无二 yi'xin'wu'er
有嘴无心 you'zui'wu'xin
碍足碍手 ai'zu'ai'shou
有志难酬 you'zhi'nan'chou

箪食豆羹 dan'shi'dou'geng
一晦一明 yi'hui'yi'ming

容民畜众 rong'min'chu'zhong

悬车致仕 xuan'che'zhi'shi

东南之宝 dong'nan'zhi'bao
成帮结队 cheng'bang'jie'dui
贯通融会 guan'tong'rong'hui
轮扁斫轮 lun'bian'zhuo'lun
枯木逢春犹再发 ku'mu'feng'chun'you'zai'fa
夫人裙带 fu'ren'qun'dai
合两为一 he'liang'wei'yi
鲁卫之政 lu'wei'zhi'zheng
争功诿过 zheng'gong'wei'guo
持禄养交 chi'lu'yang'jiao
以功补过 yi'gong'bu'guo
虎踞鲸吞 hu'ju'jing'tun
通同一气 tong'tong'yi'qi
丰功茂德 feng'gong'mao'de
蕙心纨质 hui'xin'wan'zhi
薄赋轻徭 bao'fu'qing'yao
坐不窥堂 zuo'bu'kui'tang
拔地倚天 ba'di'yi'tian
奇葩异卉 qi'pa'yi'hui
月中折桂 yue'zhong'zhe'gui
靖言庸回 jing'yan'yong'hui
平地起雷 ping'di'qi'lei
研精致思 yan'jing'zhi'si
口角生风 kou'jiao'sheng'feng
丰年玉荒年谷 feng'nian'yu'huang'nian'gu
国家多故 guo'jia'duo'gu
传诵不绝 chuan'song'bu'jue
举世无比 ju'shi'wu'bi
玉洁松贞 yu'jie'song'zhen
八音迭奏 ba'yin'die'zou
金石之功 jin'shi'zhi'gong
以一警百 yi'yi'jing'bai
黄门驸马 huang'men'fu'ma
日省月试 ri'sheng'yue'shi
不解之仇 bu'jie'zhi'chou
摸棱两可 mo'leng'liang'ke
正冠李下 zheng'guan'li'xia
视如陌路 shi'ru'mo'lu
销魂荡魄 xiao'hun'dang'po
见经识经 jian'jing'shi'jing
禁网疏阔 jin'wang'shu'kuo
哀喜交并 ai'xi'jiao'bing
阑风长雨 lan'feng'zhang'yu
綦溪利跂 qi'xi'li'qi
从长商议 cong'zhang'shang'yi
倾盖之交 qing'gai'zhi'jiao
执其两端 zhi'qi'liang'duan
盲风怪雨 mang'feng'guai'yu
贞下起元 zhen'xia'qi'yuan
去本趋末 qu'ben'qu'mo
心腹之忧 xin'fu'zhi'you
人死如灯灭 ren'si'ru'deng'mie
以羊易牛 yi'yang'yi'niu
洪钟大吕 hong'zhong'da'lv
自诒伊戚 zi'yi'yi'qi
高堂大厦 gao'tang'da'sha
谋夫孔多 mou'fu'kong'duo
鼠牙雀角 shu'ya'que'jiao
袅袅余音 niao'niao'yu'yin
倾耳注目 qing'er'zhu'mu
堂皇冠冕 tang'huang'guan'mian
舞文巧诋 wu'wen'qiao'di
认贼为父 ren'zei'wei'fu
聱牙诘曲 ao'ya'ji'qu
救火扬沸 jiu'huo'yang'fei
有己无人 you'ji'wu'ren
出奇致胜 chu'qi'zhi'sheng
独得之秘 du'de'zhi'mi
从俗浮沉 cong'su'fu'chen
京兆画眉 jing'zhao'hua'mei
重门击柝 zhong'men'ji'tuo
半涂而废 ban'tu'er'fei
敢不唯命 gan'bu'wei'ming
对面不识 dui'mian'bu'shi
目瞪口结 mu'deng'kou'jie
肮肮脏脏 ang'ang'zang'zang
海中捞月 hai'zhong'lao'yue
股肱耳目 gu'gong'er'mu
与时俯仰 yu'shi'fu'yang
弃瑕取用 qi'xia'qu'yong
穷工极巧 qiong'gong'ji'qiao
阿谀苟合 a'yu'gou'he
抱才而困 bao'cai'er'kun
果熟蒂落 guo'shu'di'luo
白雪阳春 bai'xue'yang'chun
十死一生 shi'si'yi'sheng
道学先生 dao'xue'xian'sheng
桑榆之年 sang'yu'zhi'nian
好行小慧 hao'xing'xiao'hui
羁旅异乡 ji'lv'yi'xiang
春秋无义战 chun'qiu'wu'yi'zhan
贫无达士将金赠 pin'wu'da'shi'jiang'jin'zeng
苍蝇碰壁 cang'ying'peng'bi
今蝉蜕壳 jin'chan'tui'ke
闭门扫轨 bi'men'sao'gui
绳愆纠谬 sheng'qian'jiu'miu
买田阳羡 mai'tian'yang'xian
衔尾相随 xian'wei'xiang'sui
眉眼如画 mei'yan'ru'hua
责有攸归 ze'you'you'gui
攻其一点不及其余 gong'qi'yi'dian'bu'ji'qi'yu
愤世嫉邪 fen'shi'ji'xie
使之闻之 shi'zhi'wen'zhi
骈拇枝指 pian'mu'zhi'zhi
灌夫骂坐 guan'fu'ma'zuo
玉走金飞 yu'zou'jin'fei
人心所归 ren'xin'suo'gui
朝夕不保 chao'xi'bu'bao
遐迩一体 xia'er'yi'ti
龙楼凤阙 long'lou'feng'que
马上墙头 ma'shang'qiang'tou
贼人胆虚 zei'ren'dan'xu
三步两脚 san'bu'liang'jiao
三无坐处 san'wu'zuo'chu
凡胎浊骨 fan'tai'zhuo'gu
履丝曳缟 lv'si'ye'gao
入少出多 ru'shao'chu'duo
敖不可长 ao'bu'ke'zhang
逆旅主人 ni'lv'zhu'ren
挑三豁四 tiao'san'huo'si
抓破脸皮 zhua'po'lian'pi
直言正谏 zhi'yan'zheng'jian
祸生不测 huo'sheng'bu'ce
一馈十起 yi'kui'shi'qi
泣麟悲凤 qi'lin'bei'feng
一献三售 yi'xian'san'shou
铁棒磨成针 tie'bang'mo'cheng'zhen
遗风余俗 yi'feng'yu'su
睁眼瞎子 zheng'yan'xia'zi
燕安鸩毒 yan'an'zhen'du
词不悉心 ci'bu'xi'xin
蜩螗沸羹 tiao'tang'fei'geng
与时推移 yu'shi'tui'yi
紧行无好步 jin'xing'wu'hao'bu
贯朽粟陈 guan'xiu'su'chen
十步香草 shi'bu'xiang'cao
甘瓜苦蒂 gan'gua'ku'di
面额焦烂 mian'e'jiao'lan
远人无目 yuan'ren'wu'mu
枝附叶连 zhi'fu'ye'lian
国尔忘家 guo'er'wang'jia
狐裘尨茸 hu'qiu'mang'rong
承上接下 cheng'shang'jie'xia
锦衣还乡 jin'yi'hai'xiang
十发十中 shi'fa'shi'zhong
向风慕义 xiang'feng'mu'yi
灼见真知 zhuo'jian'zhen'zhi
衔冤负屈 xian'yuan'fu'qu
面是背非 mian'shi'bei'fei
春露秋霜 chun'lu'qiu'shuang
习以成俗 xi'yi'cheng'su
怡颜悦色 yi'yan'yue'se
头上安头 tou'shang'an'tou
闻一知二 wen'yi'zhi'er
巧言如流 qiao'yan'ru'liu
同心共胆 tong'xin'gong'dan
表里河山 biao'li'he'shan
累块积苏 lei'kuai'ji'su
搦管操觚 nuo'guan'cao'gu
只轮无反 zhi'lun'wu'fan
安室利处 an'shi'li'chu
耳闻目击 er'wen'mu'ji
短兵接战 duan'bing'jie'zhan
恩礼有加 en'li'you'jia
切齿拊心 qie'chi'fu'xin
买马招军 mai'ma'zhao'jun
螳螂黄雀 tang'lang'huang'que
赏不逾时 shang'bu'yu'shi
唇干口燥 chun'gan'kou'zao
东床佳婿 dong'chuang''xu
枝叶扶苏 zhi'ye'fu'su
燕颔虎颈 yan'han'hu'jing
明罚敕法 ming'fa'chi'fa
一仍旧贯 yi'reng'jiu'guan
臣心如水 chen'xin'ru'shui
泥古守旧 ni'gu'shou'jiu
狗盗鼠窃 gou'dao'shu'qie
弛声走誉 chi'sheng'zou'yu
矮人看场 ai'ren'kan'chang
回肠伤气 hui'chang'shang'qi
湖吃海喝 hu'chi'hai'he
公公道道 gong'gong'dao'dao
剥皮抽筋 bo'pi'chou'jin
蓬头赤脚 peng'tou'chi'jiao
三条九陌 san'tiao'jiu'mo
一命之荣 yi'ming'zhi'rong
宴尔新婚 yan'er'xin'hun
深沟壁垒 shen'gou'bi'lei
杀鸡抹脖 sha'ji'mo'bo
食毛践土 shi'mao'jian'tu
陈辞滥调 chen'ci'lan'diao
爱才如渴 ai'cai'ru'ke
水可载舟亦可覆舟 shui'ke'zai'zhou'yi'ke'fu'zhou
白眼相看 bai'yan'xiang'kan
风树之悲 feng'shu'zhi'bei
矜功不立 guan'gong'bu'li
人是衣装 ren'shi'yi'zhuang
舞词弄札 wu'ci'nong'zha
蘧瑗知非 qu'yuan'zhi'fei
举无遗策 ju'wu'yi'ce
冰肌雪肤 bing'ji'xue'fu
扇枕温被 shan'zhen'wen'bei

瘦羊博士 shou'yang'bo'shi
膏粱文绣 gao'liang'wen'xiu
面如凝脂 mian'ru'ning'zhi

分毫无爽 fen'hao'wu'shuang

踵武相接 zhong'wu'xiang'jie

人亡物在 ren'wang'wu'zai

一时之权 yi'shi'zhi'quan
独行踽踽 du'xing'ju'ju

秋风纨扇 qiu'feng'wan'shan
洗手奉职 xi'shou'feng'zhi

鸿篇巨着 hong'pian'ju'zhe

日增月盛 ri'zeng'yue'sheng

而不见舆薪 er'bu'jian'yu'xin

谣诼纷纭 yao'zhuo'fen'yun
腹心相照 fu'xin'xiang'zhao
记问之学 ji'wen'zhi'xue
舍命不舍财 she'ming'bu'she'cai
如花似朵 ru'hua'shi'duo
宦成名立 huan'cheng'ming'li
哑口无声 ya'kou'wu'sheng
前功尽灭 qian'gong'jin'mie
惟利是视 wei'li'shi'shi
竭力尽忠 jie'li'jin'zhong
云雾迷蒙 yun'wu'mi'meng
入国问俗 ru'guo'wen'su
奋不顾命 fen'bu'gu'ming
声势烜赫 sheng'shi'xuan'he
捶床拍枕 chui'chuangpai'pai'zhen
高名大姓 gao'ming'da'xing
秋风团扇 qiu'feng'tuan'shan

借故推辞 jie'gu'tui'ci
一老一实 yi'lao'yi'shi

贯朽粟腐 guan'xiu'su'fu

门不停宾 men'bu'ting'bin

据鞍读书 ju'an'du'shu
斗酒学士 dou'jiu'xue'shi

有犯无隐 you'fan'wu'yin

谄上欺下 chan'shang'qi'xia

来说是非者 lai'shuo'shi'fei'zhe
分文不受 fen'wen'bu'shou
分钗断带 fen'chai'duan'dai
翘足引领 qiao'zu'yin'ling

华严世界 hua'yan'shi'jie
鱼盐之利 yu'yan'zhi'li
断袖之好 duan'xiu'zhi'hao
约之以礼 yue'zhi'yi'li
路曼曼其修远兮 lu'man'man'qi'xiu'yuan'xi
莫可言状 mo'ke'yan'zhuang
坐山观虎 zuo'shan'guan'hu
葛伯仇饷 ge'bo'chou'xiang
富贵而骄 fu'gui'er'jiao
心地狭窄 xin'di'xia'zhai
大鹏展翅恨天低 da'peng'zhan'chi'hen'tian'di
话不说不明 hua'bu'shuo'bu'ming
希言自然 xi'yan'zi'ran
暴露文学 bao'lu'wen'xue
梦玉人引 meng'yu'ren'yin
青眼相待 qing'yan'xiang'dai
食不求饱 shi'bu'qiu'bao
旱地忽律朱贵 han'di'hu'lv'zhu'gui
口福不浅 kou'fu'bu'qian
同而不和 tong'er'bu'he
葆力之士 bao'li'zhi'shi
十步一阁 shi'bu'yi'ge
莫管他家瓦上霜 mo'guan'ta'jia'wa'shang'shuang
人尽其材 ren'jin'qi'cai
困倚危楼 kun'yi'wei'lou
扪心自省 men'xin'zi'sheng
同谓之玄 tong'wei'zhi'xuan
东东西西 dong'dong'xi'xi
片甲不归 pian'jia'bu'gui
归根曰静 gui'gen'yue'jing
拉弓不放箭 la'gong'bu'fang'jian
则忧其民 ze'you'qi'min
徒呼负负 tu'hu'fu'fu
及时努力 ji'shi'nu'li
损者三友 sun'zhe'san'you
文才武略 wen'cai'wu'e
孔德之容 kong'de'zhi'rong
飘然出尘 piao'ran'chu'chen
和而不流 he'er'bu'liu
其鬼不神 qi'gui'bu'shen
独上兰舟 du'shang'lan'zhou
道隐无名 dao'yin'wu'ming
以友辅仁 yi'you'fu'ren
拔地擎天 ba'di'qing'tian
执者失之 zhi'zhe'shi'zhi
如正人何 ru'zheng'ren'he
如此江山 ru'ci'jiang'shan
何以别乎 he'yi'bie'hu
过而不改 guo'er'bu'gai
君子无戏言 jun'zi'wu'xi'yan
扈江离与辟芷兮 hu'jiang'li'yu'pi'zhi'xi
黯然无神 an'ran'wu'shen
但为君故 dan'wei'jun'gu
竖眉瞪眼 shu'mei'deng'yan
地格方圆 di'ge'fang'yuan
露桥闻笛 lu'qiao'wen'di
西瓜偎大边 xi'gua'wei'da'bian
狐死兔悲 hu'si'tu'bei
事业不同 shi'ye'bu'tong
吹来吹去 chui'lai'chui'qu
今日不知明日事 jin'ri'bu'zhi'ming'ri'shi
大敌在前 da'di'zai'qian
月缺不改光 yue'que'bu'gai'guang
梦里依稀 meng'li'yi'xi
为口奔驰 wei'kou'ben'chi
戒之在色 jie'zhi'zai'se
无小无大 wu'xiao'wu'da
京华倦客 jing'hua'juan'ke
佳节如意 jia'jie'ru'yi
笃行不倦 du'xing'bu'juan
圣人无名 sheng'ren'wu'ming
藏藏躲躲 cang'cang'duo'duo
必以言下之 bi'yi'yan'xia'zhi
事之以礼 shi'zhi'yi'li
与众乐乐 yu'zhong'le'le
民之难治 min'zhi'nan'zhi
文似看山不喜平 wen'shi'kan'shan'bu'xi'ping
桃李芳菲 tao'li'fang'fei
家贫出孝子 jia'pin'chu'xiao'zi
则无不治 ze'wu'bu'zhi
以家观家 yi'jia'guan'jia
葬之以礼 zang'zhi'yi'li
小隐隐于山 xiao'yin'yin'yu'shan
判若霄壤 pan'ruo'xiao'rang
难调众口 nan'diao'zhong'kou
口有余香 kou'you'yu'xiang
自遗其咎 zi'yi'qi'jiu
志不可满 zhi'bu'ke'man
白水素女 bai'shui'su'nv
宽则得众 kuan'ze'de'zhong
平地起风波 ping'di'qi'feng'bo
井然不紊 jing'ran'bu'wen
百亩之田 bai'mu'zhi'tian
民利百倍 min'li'bai'bei
钻之弥坚 zuan'zhi'mi'jian
舞弄文墨 wu'nong'wen'mo
世异时移 shi'yi'shi'yi
人强胜天 ren'qiang'sheng'tian
返观内照 fan'guan'nei'zhao
狂犬吠日 kuang'quan'fei'ri
烟波无际 yan'bo'wu'ji
发人深醒 fa'ren'shen'xing
西门吹水 xi'men'chui'shui
内外相应 nei'wai'xiang'ying
四十不富 si'shi'bu'fu
皮毛之见 pi'mao'zhi'jian
惩一戒百 cheng'yi'jie'bai
去恶从善 qu'e'cong'shan
亲昵无间 qin'ni'wu'jian
德亦乐得之 de'yi'le'de'zhi
至小无内 zhi'xiao'wu'nei
刑措不用 xing'cuo'bu'yong
一言千金 yi'yan'qian'jin
老迈年高 lao'mai'nian'gao
其名为鹏 qi'ming'wei'peng
无道则隐 wu'dao'ze'yin
其政察察 qi'zheng'cha'cha
治人事天 zhi'ren'shi'tian
屁也不敢放 pi'ye'bu'gan'fang
至于犬马 zhi'yu'quan'ma
秀才人情纸半张 xiu'cai'ren'qing'zhi'ban'zhang
侯王若能守之 hou'wang'ruo'neng'shou'zhi
首尾相继 shou'wei'xiang'ji
穷在闹市无人问 qiong'zai'nao'shi'wu'ren'wen
行同狗彘 xing'tong'gou'zhi
刚肠嫉恶 gang'chang'ji'e
咬钉嚼铁 yao'ding'jue'tie
才学兼优 cai'xue'jian'you
不能赞一辞 bu'neng'zan'yi'ci
俭以养廉 jian'yi'yang'lian
一夫之用 yi'fu'zhi'yong
大大落落 da'da'luo'luo
事非得已 shi'fei'de'yi
楚天云雨 chu'tian'yun'yu
干戈戚扬 gan'ge'qi'yang
千磨百折 qian'mo'bai'zhe
七大八小 qi'da'ba'xiao
劳师远袭 lao'shi'yuan'xi
九十春光 jiu'shi'chun'guang
今来古往 jin'lai'gu'wang
无冬历夏 wu'dong'li'xia
不茶不饭 bu'cha'bu'fan
痛之入骨 tong'zhi'ru'gu
沉疴宿疾 chen'ke'su'ji
心如寒灰 xin'ru'han'hui
防不及防 fang'bu'ji'fang
奇树异草 qi'shu'yi'cao
凡人不可貌相 fan'ren'bu'ke'mao'xiang
吠影吠声 fei'ying'fei'sheng
舞凤飞龙 wu'feng'fei'long
礼轻人意重 li'qing'ren'yi'zhong
千孔百疮 qian'kong'bai'chuang
高门巨族 gao'men'ju'zu
恨相见晚 hen'xiang'jian'wan
朝钟暮鼓 chao'zhong'mu'gu
翻肠搅肚 fan'chang'jiao'du
人心皇皇 ren'xin'huang'huang
乐道安贫 le'dao'an'pin
假门假事 jia'men'jia'shi
燕啄皇孙 yan'zhuo'huang'sun
三日新妇 san'ri'xin'fu
淘尽黄沙始得金 tao'jin'huang'sha'shi'de'jin
泣血枕戈 qi'xue'zhen'ge
一钱不名 yi'qian'bu'ming
满面东风 man'mian'dong'feng
终始不渝 zhong'shi'bu'yu
漫无头绪 man'wu'tou'xu
非愚则诬 fei'yu'ze'wu
血气未定 xue'qi'wei'ding
得兔忘蹄 de'tu'wang'ti
河东狮子吼 he'dong'shi'zi'hou
恐后争先 kong'hou'zheng'xian
众人熙熙 zhong'ren'xi'xi
右传之八章 you'chuan'zhi'ba'zhang
迁延观望 qian'yan'guan'wang
一家眷属 yi'jia'juan'shu
兄弟急难 xiong'di'ji'nan
苞藏祸心 bao'cang'huo'xin
自觉形秽 zi'jue'xing'hui
浃髓沦肌 jia'sui'lun'ji
郁郁芊芊 yu'yu'qian'qian
乱七八遭 luan'qi'ba'zao
兢兢战战 jing'jing'zhan'zhan
我亦教之 wo'yi'jiao'zhi
诚心正意 cheng'xin'zheng'yi
鹰扬虎视 ying'yang'hu'shi
随时制宜 sui'shi'zhi'yi
千钧重负 qian'jun'zhong'fu
发昏章第十一 fa'hun'zhang'di'shi'yi
膏肓之病 gao'huang'zhi'bing
破鼓乱人捶 po'gu'luan'ren'chui
心织笔耕 xin'zhi'bi'geng
神灭形消 shen'mie'xing'xiao
逢人且说三分话 feng'ren'qie'shuo'san'fen'hua
多寿多富 duo'shou'duo'fu
如沸如羹 ru'fei'ru'geng
毛发直立 mao'fa'zhi'li
水陆毕陈 shui'lu'bi'chen
破家为国 po'jia'wei'guo
睚眦之嫌 ya'zi'zhi'xian
龟龙麟凤 gui'long'lin'feng
尽入彀中 jin'ru'gou'zhong
犬马之齿 quan'ma'zhi'chi
灾梨祸枣 zai'li'huo'zao
渴不择饮 ke'bu'ze'yin
席卷八荒 xi'juan'ba'huang
百战无前 bai'zhan'wu'qian
吃宽心丸 chi'kuan'xin'wan
小器易盈 xiao'qi'yi'ying
剿抚兼施 jiao'fu'jian'shi
分斤掰两 fen'jin'bai'liang
纸贵洛阳 zhi'gui'luo'yang
跛鳖千里 bo'bie'qian'li
刀下留情 dao'xia'liu'qing
红云台地 hong'yun'tai'di
半身入土 ban'shen'ru'tu
杀尽斩绝 sha'jin'zhan'jue
打诨插科 da'hun'cha'ke
遭遇际会 zao'yu'ji'hui
残月晓风 can'yue'xiao'feng
冠袍带履 guan'pao'dai'lv
南金东箭 nan'jin'dong'jian
揣测之词 chuai'ce'zhi'ci
造次颠沛 zao'ci'dian'pei
青黄未接 qing'huang'wei'jie
除恶务本 chu'e'wu'ben
人之将死其言也善 ren'zhi'jiang'si'qi'yan'ye'shan
山海之味 shan'hai'zhi'wei
锱珠必较 zi'zhu'bi'jiao
不刊之典 bu'kan'zhi'dian
投河觅井 tou'he'mi'jing
虐人害物 nve'ren'hai'wu
拿云捉月 na'yun'zhuo'yue
割肉饲虎 ge'rou'si'hu
舍近取远 she'jin'qu'yuan
风情月债 feng'qing'yue'zhai
一坐尽惊 yi'zuo'jin'jing
无所不尽其极 wu'suo'bu'jin'qi'ji
养晦韬光 yang'hui'tao'guang
出陈易新 chu'chen'yi'xin
去如黄鹤 qu'ru'huang'he
油壁香车 you'bi'xiang'che
抚掌击节 fu'zhang'ji'jie
亲不亲故乡人 qin'bu'qin'gu'xiang'ren
简截了当 jian'jie'le'dang
你贪我爱 ni'tan'wo'ai
散兵游卒 san'bing'you'cu
寻行数墨 xun'xing'shu'mo
门户人家 men'hu'ren'jia
好得蜜里调油 hao'de'mi'li'diao'you
闳中肆外 hong'zhong'si'wai
各有所职 ge'you'suo'zhi
心领神悟 xin'ling'shen'wu
口齿生香 kou'chi'sheng'xiang
银山铁壁 yin'shan'tie'bi
富贵显荣 fu'gui'xian'rong
高涨士气 gao'zhang'shi'qi
浪蕊浮花 lang'rui'fu'hua
出门合辙 chu'men'he'zhe
眩目惊心 xuan'mu'jing'xin
随意一瞥 sui'yi'yi'pie
雍容不迫 yong'rong'bu'po
望中犹记 wang'zhong'you'ji
小人穷斯滥矣 xiao'ren'qiong'si'lan'yi
博学多能 bo'xue'duo'neng
日见沉重 ri'jian'chen'zhong
响鼓不用重捶 xiang'gu'bu'yong'zhong'chui
夏日消融 xia'ri'xiao'rong
可谓仁乎 ke'wei'ren'hu
猫哭耗子假慈悲 mao'ku'hao'zi'jia'ci'bei
持而盈之 chi'er'ying'zhi
子路不说 zi'lu'bu'shuo
鹏程九万 peng'cheng'jiu'wan
举措动作 ju'cuo'dong'zuo
吾以观复 wu'yi'guan'fu
持而保之 chi'er'bao'zhi
国家昏乱 guo'jia'hun'luan
关山难越 guan'shan'nan'yue
风帘翠幕 feng'lian'cui'mu
拧眉立目 ning'mei'li'mu
以其不争 yi'qi'bu'zheng
年去岁来 nian'qu'sui'lai
曾见几番 ceng'jian'ji'fan
缝缝连连 feng'feng'lian'lian
无为之益 wu'wei'zhi'yi
其民淳淳 qi'min'chun'chun
当面是人 dang'mian'shi'ren
野火春风 ye'huo'chun'feng
勿夺其时 wu'duo'qi'shi
动惮不得 dong'dan'bu'de
万物群生 wan'wu'qun'sheng
必以身后之 bi'yi'shen'hou'zhi
盲拳打死老师傅 mang'quan'da'si'lao'shi'fu
孰知其极 shu'zhi'qi'ji
脸不改色心不跳 lian'bu'gai'se'xin'bu'tiao
阑干拍遍 lan'gan'pai'bian
搏之不得 bo'zhi'bu'de
神鬼不知 shen'gui'bu'zhi
作殊死战 zuo'shu'si'zhan
有理无情 you'li'wu'qing
导之以德 dao'zhi'yi'de
吾少也贱 wu'shao'ye'jian
斯不善已 si'bu'shan'yi
可怜焦土 ke'lian'jiao'tu
动刀甚微 dong'dao'shen'wei
躬身行礼 gong'shen'xing'li
倚门回首 yi'men'hui'shou
三日不食 san'ri'bu'shi
仪表出众 yi'biao'chu'zhong
其乐陶陶 qi'le'tao'tao
令人行妨 ling'ren'xing'fang
人为万物之灵 ren'wei'wan'wu'zhi'ling
美成在久 mei'cheng'zai'jiu
授之以政 shou'zhi'yi'zheng
血气既衰 xue'qi'ji'shuai
天缘巧合 tian'yuan'qiao'he
天资国色 tian'zi'guo'se
求不得苦 qiu'bu'de'ku
琴瑟友之 qin'se'you'zhi
学如逆水行舟 xue'ru'ni'shui'xing'zhou
几行陈迹 ji'xing'chen'ji
各尽其妙 ge'jin'qi'miao
技多不压人 ji'duo'bu'ya'ren
声威大振 sheng'wei'da'zhen
为者败之 wei'zhe'bai'zhi
民望所归 min'wang'suo'gui
民族至上 min'zu'zhi'shang
益生曰祥 yi'sheng'yue'xiang
挑弄是非 tiao'nong'shi'fei
虽有槁暴 sui'you'gao'bao
王子皇孙 wang'zi'huang'sun
其下不昧 qi'xia'bu'mei
鼓舌如簧 gu'she'ru'huang
决不宽贷 jue'bu'kuan'dai
杀人劫货 sha'ren'jie'huo
日久情深 ri'jiu'qing'shen
下情不能上达 xia'qing'bu'neng'shang'da
用力不多 yong'li'bu'duo
其日固久 qi'ri'gu'jiu
草木遂长 cao'mu'sui'zhang
将欲废之 jiang'yu'fei'zhi
旧时王谢 jiu'shi'wang'xie
博我以文 bo'wo'yi'wen
忘了临行 wang'le'lin'xing
揣而锐之 chuai'er'rui'zhi
士为知已者死 shi'wei'zhi'yi'zhe'si
杨柳堆烟 yang'liu'dui'yan
临渊履薄 lin'yuan'lv'bao
之于未乱 zhi'yu'wei'luan
夫物芸芸 fu'wu'yun'yun
如弃敝屣 ru'qi'bi'xi
抽薪止沸 chou'xin'zhi'fei
掳掠奸淫 lu'e'jian'yin
红叶传情 hong'ye'chuan'qing
言不及私 yan'bu'ji'si
和易近人 he'yi'jin'ren
博识多闻 bo'shi'duo'wen
逆耳良言 ni'er'liang'yan
眉头一皱计上心来 mei'tou'yi'zhou'ji'shang'xin'lai
孤行己意 gu'xing'ji'yi
疾世愤俗 ji'shi'fen'su
九转功成 jiu'zhuan'gong'cheng
邦家之光 bang'jia'zhi'guang
德言容功 de'yan'rong'gong
移孝为忠 yi'xiao'wei'zhong
一则以喜一则以惧 yi'ze'yi'xi'yi'ze'yi'ju
又弱一个 you'ruo'yi'ge
获罪于天 huo'zui'yu'tian
轻世肆志 qing'shi'si'zhi
齐纨鲁缟 qi'wan'lu'gao
望风承旨 wang'feng'cheng'zhi
出入生死 chu'ru'sheng'si
轻虑浅谋 qing'lv'qian'mou
风雨摇摆 feng'yu'yao'bai
损本逐末 sun'ben'zhu'mo
上慢下暴 shang'man'xia'bao
日计不足 ri'ji'bu'zu
未明求衣 wei'ming'qiu'yi
侧足而立 ce'zu'er'li
持筹握算 chi'chou'wo'suan
唇齿之邦 chun'chi'zhi'bang
明眉大眼 ming'mei'da'yan
不到乌江心不死 bu'dao'wu'jiang'xin'bu'si
神湛骨寒 shen'zhan'gu'han
才能兼备 cai'neng'jian'bei
嚼舌头根 jue'she'tou'gen
肤受之诉 fu'shou'zhi'su
刍荛之言 chu'rao'zhi'yan
老着脸皮 lao'zhe'lian'pi
深恶痛恨 shen'e'tong'hen
隐居求志 yin'ju'qiu'zhi
鸿蒙初辟 hong'meng'chu'pi
灭私奉公 mie'si'feng'gong
神怒人怨 shen'nu'ren'yuan
变色易容 bian'se'yi'rong
七窍冒火 qi'qiao'mao'huo
打狗欺主 da'gou'qi'zhu
贵耳贱目 gui'er'jian'mu
分心劳神 fen'xin'lao'shen
磬竹难书 qing'zhu'nan'shu
涓滴成河 juan'di'cheng'he
故我依然 gu'wo'yi'ran
雏凤清声 chu'feng'qing'sheng
以利累形 yi'li'lei'xing
享之千金 xiang'zhi'qian'jin
祥麟威凤 xiang'lin'wei'feng
藏锋敛锐 cang'feng'lian'rui
光前绝后 guang'qian'jue'hou
言之谆谆 yan'zhi'zhun'zhun
轻尘栖弱草 qing'chen'qi'ruo'cao
踢天弄井 ti'tian'nong'jing
孩子是自己的好 hai'zi'shi'zi'ji'de'hao
伯仁由我而死 bo'ren'you'wo'er'si
矫邪归正 jiao'xie'gui'zheng
偃武行文 yan'wu'xing'wen
咄嗟立办 duo'jie'li'ban
谋图不轨 mou'tu'bu'gui
天道宁论 tian'dao'ning'lun
万世无疆 wan'shi'wu'jiang
虎落平川 hu'luo'ping'chuan
弃武修文 qi'wu'xiu'wen
败子回头 bai'zi'hui'tou
风雨时若 feng'yu'shi'ruo
若远若近 ruo'yuan'ruo'jin
风闻言事 feng'wen'yan'shi
承平盛世 cheng'ping'sheng'shi
积小致巨 ji'xiao'zhi'ju
牵合附会 qian'he'fu'hui
能谋善断 neng'mou'shan'duan
契若金兰 qi'ruo'jin'lan
独开生面 du'kai'sheng'mian
如石投水 ru'shi'tou'shui
甘之如荠 gan'zhi'ru'ji
临危制变 lin'wei'zhi'bian
偎干就湿 wei'gan'jiu'shi
八字还没一撇儿 ba'zi'hai'mei'yi'pie'r
花颜月貌 hua'yan'yue'mao
七疮八孔 qi'chuang''kong
立眉瞪眼 li'mei'deng'yan
有天没日头 you'tian'mei'ri'tou
耕当问奴 geng'dang'wen'nu
戴盆望天 dai'pen'wang'tian
扬名显姓 yang'ming'xian'xing
寒蝉僵鸟 han'chan'jiang'niao
临机制变 lin'ji'zhi'bian
椎牛飨士 chui'niu'xiang'shi
进退惟谷 jin'tui'wei'gu
谄谀取容 chan'yu'qu'rong
近来学得乌龟法 jin'lai'xue'de'wu'gui'fa
钻穴逾墙 zuan'xue'yu'qiang
桑中之约 sang'zhong'zhi'yue
旁门小道 pang'men'xiao'dao

严霜烈日 yan'shuang''ri
金戈铁甲 jin'ge'tie'jia
含垢匿瑕 han'gou'ni'xia
胆大心小 dan'da'xin'xiao
家破人离 jia'po'ren'li
鼠目獐头 shu'mu'zhang'tou
旗靡辙乱 qi'mi'zhe'luan
日月入怀 ri'yue'ru'huai
三推六问 san'tui'liu'wen
家翻宅乱 jia'fan'zhai'luan
镌骨铭心 juan'gu'ming'xin
人怨天怒 ren'yuan'tian'nu
悔过自责 hui'guo'zi'ze
如拾地芥 ru'shi'di'gai
后来之秀 hou'lai'zhi'xiu
信守不渝 xin'shou'bu'yu
才疏识浅 cai'shu'shi'qian
兴兵动众 xing'bing'dong'zhong
有枣没枣打三竿 you'zao'mei'zao'da'san'gan
包羞忍辱 bao'xiu'ren'ru
追欢取乐 zhui'huan'qu'le
望风而走 wang'feng'er'zou
贞不绝俗 zhen'bu'jue'su
层楼叠榭 ceng'lou'die'xie
狗肺狼心 gou'fei'lang'xin
街谈巷说 jie'tan'xiang'shuo
风木之悲 feng'mu'zhi'bei
同仇敌慨 tong'chou'di'kai

忧国忘身 you'guo'wang'shen
两耳塞豆 liang'er'sai'dou
进退无措 jin'tui'wu'cuo
一棒一条痕 yi'bang'yi'tiao'hen
操之过切 cao'zhi'guo'qie
人言凿凿 ren'yan'zao'zao
人多手乱 ren'duo'shou'luan

茅庐三顾 mao'lu'san'gu

意合情投 yi'he'qing'tou

黄梁美梦 huang'liang'mei'meng
胆破心寒 dan'po'xin'han
慈父见背 ci'fu'jian'bei
身当其境 shen'dang'qi'jing
以一知万 yi'yi'zhi'wan
压倒群雄 ya'dao'qun'xiong
人生如白驹过隙 ren'sheng'ru'bai'ju'guo'xi
绿林大盗 lv'lin'da'dao
招亡纳叛 zhao'wang'na'pan
克俭克勤 ke'jian'ke'qin

来去分明 lai'qu'fen'ming
大旱望云霓 da'han'wang'yun'ni
峻法严刑 jun'fa'yan'xing
末学肤受 mo'xue'fu'shou
千载一逢 qian'zai'yi'feng
期期不可 qi'qi'bu'ke
人老心未老 ren'lao'xin'wei'lao
不易之典 bu'yi'zhi'dian
穷源溯流 qiong'yuan'su'liu
锦天绣地 jin'tian'xiu'di
街道巷陌 jie'dao'xiang'mo
观机而动 guan'ji'er'dong
昂然自得 ang'ran'zi'de
不拔之志 bu'ba'zhi'zhi
清源正本 qing'yuan'zheng'ben
新益求新 xin'yi'qiu'xin

人来客去 ren'lai'ke'qu
与狐谋皮 yu'hu'mou'pi
厚生利用 hou'sheng'li'yong
酒有别肠 jiu'you'bie'chang
夙夜不懈 su'ye'bu'xie

言提其耳 yan'ti'qi'er

高岸深谷 gao'an'shen'gu
捉风捕影 zhuo'feng'bu'ying

请功受赏 qing'gong'shou'shang
片刻之欢 pian'ke'zhi'huan
痴情女子负心汉 chi'qing'nv'zi'fu'xin'han

面折庭争 mian'zhe'ting'zheng

更弦改辙 geng'xian'gai'zhe

溘先朝露 ke'xian'chao'lu

赏信罚必 shang'xin'fa'bi
出入将相 chu'ru'jiang'xiang
丰草长林 feng'cao'zhang'lin
中馈乏人 zhong'kui'fa'ren
众少成多 zhong'shao'cheng'duo
鞭长不及马腹 bian'zhang'bu'ji'ma'fu
布被瓦器 bu'bei'wa'qi
焚香扫地 fen'xiang'sao'di
控名责实 kong'ming'ze'shi
耿耿寸心 geng'geng'cun'xin

焦熬投石 jiao'ao'tou'shi

胸中甲兵 xiong'zhong'jia'bing
抽黄对白 chou'huang'dui'bai
睚眦之隙 ya'zi'zhi'xi
龙御上宾 long'yu'shang'bin
人头畜鸣 ren'tou'chu'ming
玉食锦衣 yu'shi'jin'yi
绩学之士 ji'xue'zhi'shi
片羽吉光 pian'yu'ji'guang
口中雌黄 kou'zhong'ci'huang
打牙犯嘴 da'ya'fan'zui
掷地金声 zhi'di'jin'sheng
千古独步 qian'gu'du'bu
美女簪花 mei'nv'zan'hua
希旨承颜 xi'zhi'cheng'yan
实与有力 shi'yu'you'li
有文无行 you'wen'wu'xing
熔古铸今 rong'gu'zhu'jin
一栖两雄 yi'qi'liang'xiong
一偏之论 yi'pian'zhi'lun
狼号鬼哭 lang'hao'gui'ku
垂涕而道 chui'ti'er'dao
裘马清狂 qiu'ma'qing'kuang
有为有守 you'wei'you'shou
风驰雨骤 feng'chi'yu'zhou
践冰履炭 jian'bing'lv'tan
鹅鸭之争 e'ya'zhi'zheng
化日光天 hua'ri'guang'tian
东观西望 dong'guan'xi'wang
往而不害 wang'er'bu'hai
无非积德 wu'fei'ji'de
烈火识真金 lie'huo'shi'zhen'jin
回首经年 hui'shou'jing'nian
举手可得 ju'shou'ke'de
红口白舌 hong'kou'bai'she
导之以政 dao'zhi'yi'zheng
攻不可破 gong'bu'ke'po
灯月交辉 deng'yue'jiao'hui
虎死不倒威 hu'si'bu'dao'wei
琴瑟相谐 qin'se'xiang'xie
山岛竦峙 shan'dao'song'shi
桃李争辉 tao'li'zheng'hui
殚心竭力 dan'xin'jie'li
黄蜂尾上针 huang'feng'wei'shang'zhen
愿乞终养 yuan'qi'zhong'yang
三年有成 san'nian'you'cheng
寿则多辱 shou'ze'duo'ru
五行有救 wu'xing'you'jiu
艳溢香融 yan'yi'xiang'rong
何以报德 he'yi'bao'de
知者乐水 zhi'zhe'le'shui
江南游子 jiang'nan'you'zi
隔离天日 ge'li'tian'ri
及其有事 ji'qi'you'shi
能竭其力 neng'jie'qi'li
平平当当 ping'ping'dang'dang
阿剌吉酒 a'la'ji'jiu
始制有名 shi'zhi'you'ming
滚瓜流油 gun'gua'liu'you
三日而死 san'ri'er'si
二罪俱罚 er'zui'ju'fa
歌舞太平 ge'wu'tai'ping
心照神交 xin'zhao'shen'jiao
目光如鼠 mu'guang'ru'shu
有增无损 you'zeng'wu'sun
悬梁刺骨 xuan'liang'ci'gu

靡然成风 mi'ran'cheng'feng
贼子乱臣 zei'zi'luan'chen

粗衣粝食 cu'yi'li'shi

怜贫恤老 lian'pin'xu'lao
兰艾同焚 lan'ai'tong'fen

逸游自恣 yi'you'zi'zi
终温且惠 zhong'wen'qie'hui

满则招损 man'ze'zhao'sun
遮目如盲 zhe'mu'ru'mang
是非只因多开口 shi'fei'zhi'yin'duo'kai'kou
吠日之怪 fei'ri'zhi'guai
喉舌之任 hou'she'zhi'ren
束手受缚 shu'shou'shou'fu
蛮珍海错 man'zhen'hai'cuo
积弊如山 ji'bi'ru'shan
卖菜求益 mai'cai'qiu'yi
论斤估两 lun'jin'gu'liang
同心方胜 tong'xin'fang'sheng
末节细故 mo'jie'xi'gu
莫可企及 mo'ke'qi'ji
芳卿可人 fang'qing'ke'ren
春根酒畔 chun'gen'jiu'pan
回心向道 hui'xin'xiang'dao
相逢好似初相识 xiang'feng'hao'shi'chu'xiang'shi
强将帐下无弱兵 qiang'jiang'zhang'xia'wu'ruo'bing
夜雪初积 ye'xue'chu'ji
祸机不测 huo'ji'bu'ce
虎心豹子胆 hu'xin'bao'zi'dan
巧拙有素 qiao'zhuo'you'su
虎跃龙骧 hu'yue'long'xiang
穷人不攀富亲 qiong'ren'bu'pan'fu'qin
祸必重来 huo'bi'zhong'lai
祸不反踵 huo'bu'fan'zhong
飞上银霄 fei'shang'yin'xiao
至信辟金 zhi'xin'pi'jin
廉平公正 lian'ping'gong'zheng
莫名其故 mo'ming'qi'gu
争他一脚豚 zheng'ta'yi'jiao'tun
不变其文 bu'bian'qi'wen
赤子苍头 chi'zi'cang'tou
国家不幸英雄幸 guo'jia'bu'xing'ying'xiong'xing
朱阑共语 zhu'lan'gong'yu
信音辽邈 xin'yin'liao'miao
举头三尺有神灵 ju'tou'san'chi'you'shen'ling
遮垢藏污 zhe'gou'cang'wu
游遍芳丛 you'bian'fang'cong
知心能几人 zhi'xin'neng'ji'ren
伤离意绪 shang'li'yi'xu
连鬟并暖 lian'huan'bing'nuan
定数难逃 ding'shu'nan'tao
画檐蛛网 hua'yan'zhu'wang
虎体元斑 hu'ti'yuan'ban
二分尘土 er'fen'chen'tu
烟过斜阳 yan'guo'xie'yang
一折一磨 yi'zhe'yi'mo
楚梅香嫩 chu'mei'xiang'nen
人多则成势 ren'duo'ze'cheng'shi
没日没月 mei'ri'mei'yue
后人把滑 hou'ren'ba'hua
大宇中倾 da'yu'zhong'qing
狐掘狐埋 hu'jue'hu'mai
见事莫说 jian'shi'mo'shuo
上场当念下场时 shang'chang'dang'nian'xia'chang'shi
三尺之木 san'chi'zhi'mu
画屏天畔 hua'ping'tian'pan
奉为圭璧 feng'wei'gui'bi
知者减半 zhi'zhe'jian'ban
冰丝织练 bing'si'zhi'lian
被惜余熏 bei'xi'yu'xun
登科之喜 deng'ke'zhi'xi
徒多则成势 tu'duo'ze'cheng'shi
暗雨槐黄 an'yu'huai'huang
并竹寻泉 bing'zhu'xun'quan
凭持尊酒 ping'chi'zun'jiu
小脸一拉三尺二 xiao'lian'yi'la'san'chi'er
谁的舌头不磨牙 shui'de'she'tou'bu'mo'ya
莺穿柳带 ying'chuan'liu'dai
出手不落空 chu'shou'bu'luo'kong
鼠头鼠脑 shu'tou'shu'nao
青山常在柴不空 qing'shan'chang'zai'chai'bu'kong
风猛火更烈 feng'meng'huo'geng'lie
林大好抵风 lin'da'hao'di'feng
发挥光大 fa'hui'guang'da
浣纱游女 huan'sha'you'nv
青峰独秀 qing'feng'du'xiu
画眉未稳 hua'mei'wei'wen
双阙中天 shuangque'que'zhong'tian
乡城见月 xiang'cheng'jian'yue
燕语莺呼 yan'yu'ying'hu
诒厥之谋 yi'jue'zhi'mou
贻笑千秋 yi'xiao'qian'qiu
区脱纵横 qu'tuo'zong'heng
青山萧萧 qing'shan'xiao'xiao
时传音信 shi'chuan'yin'xin
孤灯相映 gu'deng'xiang'ying
腰肢渐小 yao'zhi'jian'xiao
断位飘移 duan'wei'piao'yi
悬羊击鼓 xuan'yang'ji'gu
风干物燥火易起 feng'gan'wu'zao'huo'yi'qi
声价如故 sheng'jia'ru'gu
毛举庶务 mao'ju'shu'wu
但有江花 dan'you'jiang'hua
应节为变 ying'jie'wei'bian
力破我执 li'po'wo'zhi
颜之厚矣 yan'zhi'hou'yi
有钱难买针 you'qian'nan'mai'zhen
扬眉奋髯 yang'mei'fen'ran
脚上没鞋穷半截 jiao'shang'mei'xie'qiong'ban'jie
万箭填弦待令发 wan'jian'tian'xian'dai'ling'fa
三更听雨 san'geng'ting'yu
归思难收 gui'si'nan'shou
戴玉披银 dai'yu'pi'yin
也被旁人说是非 ye'bei'pang'ren'shuo'shi'fei
饿狼饥虎 e'lang'ji'hu
可科之机 ke'ke'zhi'ji
香囊暗解 xiang'nang'an'jie

小窗深闭 xiao'chuang''bi
河鱼之患 he'yu'zhi'huan
叠嶂西驰 die'zhang'xi'chi
疑人莫用 yi'ren'mo'yong

曲岸持觞 qu'an'chi'shang

无从交代 wu'cong'jiao'dai

有水必有渡 you'shui'bi'you'du
前堵后绊 qian'du'hou'ban
诋尽流俗 di'jin'liu'su
马牛如襟裾 ma'niu'ru'jin'ju
地肥鼠穴多 di'fei'shu'xue'duo

恶必早亡 e'bi'zao'wang

是亦因彼 shi'yi'yin'bi
小槛欢聚 xiao'kan'huan'ju

螳臂当辕 tang'bi'dang'yuan
惨怆怛悼 can'chuangda'da'dao
亭亭清绝 ting'ting'qing'jue
迦旃邻提 jia'zhan'lin'ti
负暄献御 fu'xuan'xian'yu

留得五湖明月在 liu'de'wu'hu'ming'yue'zai

画沙成卦 hua'sha'cheng'gua

地势便利 di'shi'bian'li
查田定产 cha'tian'ding'chan
扇惑人心 shan'huo'ren'xin
扬州一觉 yang'zhou'yi'jue
帅旗一倒万兵溃 shuai'qi'yi'dao'wan'bing'kui
曲中人远 qu'zhong'ren'yuan
瓮间吏部 weng'jian'li'bu
朝天车马 chao'tian'che'ma
心病还得心药治 xin'bing'hai'de'xin'yao'zhi
若登高必自卑 ruo'deng'gao'bi'zi'bei
鬓摇烟碧 bin'yao'yan'bi
半空烟雨 ban'kong'yan'yu
溪横水远 xi'heng'shui'yuan
鸡大飞不过墙 ji'da'fei'bu'guo'qiang
有钱难买愿意 you'qian'nan'mai'yuan'yi
长安父老 zhang'an'fu'lao
梦轻难记 meng'qing'nan'ji
胜败及兵家常事 sheng'bai'ji'bing'jia'chang'shi
货卖一张皮 huo'mai'yi'zhang'pi
各白世人 ge'bai'shi'ren
连劝带哄 lian'quan'dai'hong

点兵排将 dian'bing'pai'jiang
两人一般心 liang'ren'yi'ban'xin
自家心里急 zi'jia'xin'li'ji
无事早归 wu'shi'zao'gui
敬老得老 jing'lao'de'lao
骅骝开道 hua'liu'kai'dao
有豆腐不吃渣 you'dou'fu'bu'chi'zha

殚诚竭虑 dan'cheng'jie'lv
持戒见性 chi'jie'jian'xing
出尘离染 chu'chen'li'ran
落叶都愁 luo'ye'dou'chou
物干风燥火易发 wu'gan'feng'zao'huo'yi'fa
殚智毕精 dan'zhi'bi'jing
胆力过人 dan'li'guo'ren
六街九陌 liu'jie'jiu'mo
秋风原上 qiu'feng'yuan'shang
丰肌腻理 feng'ji'ni'li
尊师如尊父 zun'shi'ru'zun'fu
爱叫的狗不咬人 ai'jiao'de'gou'bu'yao'ren
仁义值千金 ren'yi'zhi'qian'jin
杜郎俊赏 du'lang'jun'shang
东翻西阅 dong'fan'xi'yue
终须无烦恼 zhong'xu'wu'fan'nao
喜气鼠鼠 xi'qi'shu'shu
当世辞宗 dang'shi'ci'zong
东马严徐 dong'ma'yan'xu
岂知离绪 qi'zhi'li'xu
待阙鸳鸯 dai'que'yuan'yang
贷真价实 dai'zhen'jia'shi
绛河清浅 jiang'he'qing'qian
栋充牛汗 dong'chong'niu'han
东飘西散 dong'piao'xi'san
倚楼望极 yi'lou'wang'ji
素月分辉 su'yue'fen'hui
东摇西荡 dong'yao'xi'dang
东指西杀 dong'zhi'xi'sha
冬寒抱冰 dong'han'bao'bing
许多年月 xu'duo'nian'yue

振作有为 zhen'zuo'you'wei
独子得惜 du'zi'de'xi
右眼跳祸 you'yan'tiao'huo

丛至沓来 cong'zhi'da'lai

总付与啼 zong'fu'yu'ti
黛痕低压 dai'hen'di'ya
两可之说 liang'ke'zhi'shuo
蓼菜成行 liao'cai'cheng'xing
横折强敌 heng'zhe'qiang'di

春庭月午 chun'ting'yue'wu
有山必有路 you'shan'bi'you'lu
急难何曾见一人 ji'nan'he'ceng'jian'yi'ren
淮王鸡狗 huai'wang'ji'gou
惊心丧魄 jing'xin'sang'po

称觞举寿 cheng'shang'ju'shou

寸寸计较 cun'cun'ji'jiao
除残去乱 chu'can'qu'luan

以春相付 yi'chun'xiang'fu
虎变龙蒸 hu'bian'long'zheng

玉成其美 yu'cheng'qi'mei

百品千条 bai'pin'qian'tiao
亡不旋踵 wang'bu'xuan'zhong

东踅西倒 dong'xue'xi'dao
相得益章 xiang'de'yi'zhang
大德必寿 da'de'bi'shou
个中消息 ge'zhong'xiao'xi
毫末不札将寻斧柯 hao'mo'bu'zha'jiang'xun'fu'ke
千金一壸 qian'jin'yi'kun
德以报怨 de'yi'bao'yuan
暮翠朝红 mu'cui'chao'hong
龙骧蠖屈 long'xiang'huo'qu
残年暮景 can'nian'mu'jing
蹈刃不旋 dao'ren'bu'xuan
不才之事 bu'cai'zhi'shi
东道之谊 dong'dao'zhi'yi
爱之如宝 ai'zhi'ru'bao
礼奢宁俭 li'she'ning'jian
寸长片善 cun'zhang'pian'shan
益国利民 yi'guo'li'min
借镜观形 jie'jing'guan'xing
仰人眉睫 yang'ren'mei'jie
胡越一家 hu'yue'yi'jia

柳街花巷 liu'jie'hua'xiang
情孚意合 qing'fu'yi'he
较瘦量肥 jiao'shou'liang'fei

遭事制宜 zao'shi'zhi'yi
风飧露宿 feng'sun'lu'su
分钗劈凤 fen'chai'pi'feng
浇风薄俗 jiao'feng'bao'su
追根查源 zhui'gen'cha'yuan
兼收并录 jian'shou'bing'lu
岩栖谷隐 yan'qi'gu'yin
风行草从 feng'xing'cao'cong
百二金瓯 bai'er'jin'ou
秽言污语 hui'yan'wu'yu
雨沾云惹 yu'zhan'yun're

坌鸟先飞 ben'niao'xian'fei

好谀恶直 hao'yu'e'zhi
捐华务实 juan'hua'wu'shi
捐残去杀 juan'can'qu'sha
逞娇呈美 cheng'jiao'cheng'mei

捏捏扭扭 nie'nie'niu'niu
桀贪骜诈 jie'tan'ao'zha

遗音余韵 yi'yin'yu'yun

语长心重 yu'zhang'xin'zhong
庙算如神 miao'suan'ru'shen

头没杯案 tou'mei'bei'an
戴星而出 dai'xing'er'chu
满面含春 man'mian'han'chun
防心摄行 fang'xin'she'xing

大胆海口 da'dan'hai'kou
博者不知 bo'zhe'bu'zhi
看菜吃饭量体裁衣 kan'cai'chi'fan'liang'ti'cai'yi
硕望宿德 shuo'wang'su'de
毛发丝粟 mao'fa'si'su

区闻陬见 qu'wen'zou'jian
弋人何篡 yi'ren'he'cuan
枝源派本 zhi'yuan'pai'ben
恩不放债 en'bu'fang'zhai
八面见光 ba'mian'jian'guang
擘两分星 bai'liang'fen'xing
祸起飞语 huo'qi'fei'yu
誓日指天 shi'ri'zhi'tian
筋信骨强 jin'xin'gu'qiang
玉燕投怀 yu'yan'tou'huai
炫玉贾石 xuan'yu'gu'shi
动罔不吉 dong'wang'bu'ji
弃家荡产 qi'jia'dang'chan
朱楼绮户 zhu'lou'qi'hu
捉贼见赃 zhuo'zei'jian'zang
二缶锺惑 er'fou'zhong'huo
像心像意 xiang'xin'xiang'yi
触目经心 chu'mu'jing'xin
杯水之饯 bei'shui'zhi'jian
润屋润身 run'wu'run'shen
龙兴云属 long'xing'yun'shu
闻雷失箸 wen'lei'shi'zhu
远山芙蓉 yuan'shan'fu'rong
刻不容松 ke'bu'rong'song
比肩皆是 bi'jian'jie'shi
闻融敦厚 wen'rong'dui'hou
一呵而就 yi'he'er'jiu
毫发无遗 hao'fa'wu'yi
薄唇轻言 bao'chun'qing'yan
功名仕进 gong'ming'shi'jin
为天下谷 wei'tian'xia'gu
煮弩为粮 zhu'nu'wei'liang
弃公营私 qi'gong'ying'si
柔刚弱强 rou'gang'ruo'qiang
一掷乾坤 yi'zhi'gan'kun
汲汲忙忙 ji'ji'mang'mang
四海他人 si'hai'ta'ren
弄竹弹丝 nong'zhu'dan'si
榷酒征茶 que'jiu'zheng'cha
凤狂龙躁 feng'kuang'long'zao
河鱼腹疾 he'yu'fu'ji
呼马呼牛 hu'ma'hu'niu
话里有刺 hua'li'you'ci
极武穷兵 ji'wu'qiong'bing
如泉赴壑 ru'quan'fu'he
神工天巧 shen'gong'tian'qiao

待机再举 dai'ji'zai'ju

宁戚饭牛 ning'qi'fan'niu

俯仰随时 fu'yang'sui'shi
毛森骨立 mao'sen'gu'li
趋舍异路 qu'she'yi'lu

道寄人知 dao'ji'ren'zhi
救焚投薪 jiu'fen'tou'xin

行或使之 xing'huo'shi'zhi

潜通南浦 qian'tong'nan'pu
抚胸呼天 fu'xiong'hu'tian
前程暗似漆 qian'cheng'an'shi'qi
孤标峻节 gu'biao'jun'jie
临老始看经 lin'lao'shi'kan'jing
又还休务 you'hai'xiu'wu
嫩梢相触 nen'shao'xiang'chu
无知妄说 wu'zhi'wang'shuo
南贩北贾 nan'fan'bei'gu
难以枚举 nan'yi'mei'ju
去时终须去 qu'shi'zhong'xu'qu
孤鸾寡鹤 gu'luan'gua'he
损失殆尽 sun'shi'dai'jin
功堕垂成 gong'duo'chui'cheng
所学非所用 suo'xue'fei'suo'yong
乍窥门户 zha'kui'men'hu
若涉远必自迩 ruo'she'yuan'bi'zi'er
攻无不取 gong'wu'bu'qu
拱手无措 gong'shou'wu'cuo
篝灯呵冻 gou'deng'he'dong
好汉不怕出身低 hao'han'bu'pa'chu'shen'di
好物沉归底 hao'wu'chen'gui'di
那知自是 na'zhi'zi'shi
尸鸠之仁 shi'jiu'zhi'ren
其谁与归 qi'shui'yu'gui
竭泽不渔 jie'ze'bu'yu
飞盖妨花 fei'gai'fang'hua
举首加额 ju'shou'jia'e
举踵思慕 ju'zhong'si'mu
礼义生于富足 li'yi'sheng'yu'fu'zu
余尚童稚 yu'shang'tong'zhi
疏篱护竹 shu'li'hu'zhu
淮山春晚 huai'shan'chun'wan
带水带浆 dai'shui'dai'jiang
欲寻前迹 yu'xun'qian'ji
惟有轻别 wei'you'qing'bie

君子自重 jun'zi'zi'zhong

贯鱼成次 guan'yu'cheng'ci
骂名千古 ma'ming'qian'gu
紧行无善踪 jin'xing'wu'shan'zong
看事做事 kan'shi'zuo'shi
声华行实 sheng'hua'xing'shi
夜永对景 ye'yong'dui'jing

吹尽香绵 chui'jin'xiang'mian
禁乱除暴 jin'luan'chu'bao

远浦萦回 yuan'pu'ying'hui
残雪庭阴 can'xue'ting'yin

琴棋诗酒 qin'qi'shi'jiu

抱撼终身 bao'han'zhong'shen
大义来亲 da'yi'lai'qin
多梳发乱 duo'shu'fa'luan

得衷合度 de'zhong'he'du
事往花委 shi'wang'hua'wei
民无常心 min'wu'chang'xin
相逢依旧 xiang'feng'yi'jiu

疾语如风 ji'yu'ru'feng
寥如晨星 liao'ru'chen'xing

悲歌未彻 bei'ge'wei'che

傻傻忽忽 sha'sha'hu'hu

几声砧杵 ji'sheng'zhen'chu

岁晚田园 sui'wan'tian'yuan

画水无风空作浪 hua'shui'wu'feng'kong'zuo'lang
音尘别后 yin'chen'bie'hou
催促年光 cui'cu'nian'guang
笑拍洪崖 xiao'pai'hong'ya
历历在眼 li'li'zai'yan
兰情蕙盼 lan'qing'hui'pan
怨亲平等 yuan'qin'ping'deng
天阔云高 tian'kuo'yun'gao
击石原有火 ji'shi'yuan'you'huo
百端街举 bai'duan'jie'ju
兄弟离散 xiong'di'li'san
明媒正配 ming'mei'zheng'pei
父子一体 fu'zi'yi'ti
白露凝霜 bai'lu'ning'shuang
重阴未开 zhong'yin'wei'kai
万物一府 wan'wu'yi'fu
留仙裙折 liu'xian'qun'zhe
碧圆自洁 bi'yuan'zi'jie
事到临头懊悔迟 shi'dao'lin'tou'ao'hui'chi
老来风味 lao'lai'feng'wei
根壮树茂 gen'zhuangshu'shu'mao
时来铁似金 shi'lai'tie'shi'jin
江流之胜 jiang'liu'zhi'sheng
言之无文行之不远 yan'zhi'wu'wen'xing'zhi'bu'yuan
交游零落 jiao'you'ling'luo
残寒消尽 can'han'xiao'jin
语多言必失 yu'duo'yan'bi'shi
研深覃精 yan'shen'qin'jing
体面扫地 ti'mian'sao'di
琵琶谁拔 pi'pa'shui'ba
头晕眼昏 tou'yun'yan'hun
推杯把盏 tui'bei'ba'zhan
风干物燥火易生 feng'gan'wu'zao'huo'yi'sheng
玉箫金琯 yu'xiao'jin'guan
冠带家私 guan'dai'jia'si
因出此门 yin'chu'ci'men
醉人花气 zui'ren'hua'qi
行流散徙 xing'liu'san'xi
再思可矣 zai'si'ke'yi
勇男蠢妇 yong'nan'chun'fu
知出乎争 zhi'chu'hu'zheng
平生莫作皱眉事 ping'sheng'mo'zuo'zhou'mei'shi
鹬蚌持争 yu'bang'chi'zheng
夜深长见 ye'shen'zhang'jian
枣花虽小结实成 zao'hua'sui'xiao'jie'shi'cheng
冤亲平等 yuan'qin'ping'deng
用人勿疑 yong'ren'wu'yi
客樯南浦 ke'qiang'nan'pu
役不再籍 yi'bu'zai'ji
清游渐远 qing'you'jian'yuan
绣衣行客 xiu'yi'xing'ke
饭来口开 fan'lai'kou'kai
衰杨掩映 shuai'yang'yan'ying
殷勤劝织 yan'qin'quan'zhi
理趣不凡 li'qu'bu'fan
追风捕影 zhui'feng'bu'ying
轻松纤软 qing'song'xian'ruan
笛中哀曲 di'zhong'ai'qu
金沤浮钉 jin'ou'fu'ding
北村南郭 bei'cun'nan'guo
繁华竞逐 fan'hua'jing'zhu
斗转城荒 dou'zhuan'cheng'huang
四维八德 si'wei'ba'de
夜静更长 ye'jing'geng'zhang
夜以接日 ye'yi'jie'ri
和云种树 he'yun'zhong'shu
世态物情 shi'tai'wu'qing
吹干泪眼 chui'gan'lei'yan
飞盖归来 fei'gai'gui'lai
喧阗且止 xuan'tian'qie'zhi
天昏地惨 tian'hun'di'can
天然淘汰 tian'ran'tao'tai
粮草一空兵心乱 liang'cao'yi'kong'bing'xin'luan
继成衣钵 ji'cheng'yi'bo
红花吐艳 hong'hua'tu'yan
大多鼎鼎 da'duo'ding'ding
澄襟似水朗抱凝冰 cheng'jin'shi'shui'lang'bao'ning'bing
雁落平沙 yan'luo'ping'sha
草青无地 cao'qing'wu'di
空名告身 kong'ming'gao'shen
风摇翠竹 feng'yao'cui'zhu
熏天吓地 xun'tian'xia'di
逆天大罪 ni'tian'da'zui
免得百日之忧 mian'de'bai'ri'zhi'you
薰莸异器 xun'you'yi'qi
天长梦短 tian'zhang'meng'duan
穴处之徒 xue'chu'zhi'tu
孟母三移 meng'mu'san'yi
七岁八岁人见嫌 qi'sui'ba'sui'ren'jian'xian
分外明白 fen'wai'ming'bai
百川之主 bai'chuan'zhi'zhu
言多必有失 yan'duo'bi'you'shi
书中长恨 shu'zhong'zhang'hen
西湖春感 xi'hu'chun'gan
同君一席话 tong'jun'yi'xi'hua
红泪清歌 hong'lei'qing'ge
世上新人赶旧人 shi'shang'xin'ren'gan'jiu'ren
高手出招稳如山 gao'shou'chu'zhao'wen'ru'shan
舌卷齐城 she'juan'qi'cheng
败荷零落 bai'he'ling'luo
我觉其间 wo'jue'qi'jian

尽日阑干 jin'ri'lan'gan

丑女三日看惯 chou'nv'san'ri'kan'guan

力能所及 li'neng'suo'ji

礼所当然 li'suo'dang'ran
理劝不如利劝 li'quan'bu'ru'li'quan
剪梅烟驿 jian'mei'yan'yi
