路逢侠客须呈剑 lu'feng'xia'ke'xu'cheng'jian
下榻留宾 xia'ta'liu'bin
掀风播浪 xian'feng'bo'lang
自是休文 zi'shi'xiu'wen
音书无个 yin'shu'wu'ge
知事少时烦恼少 zhi'shi'shao'shi'fan'nao'shao
穷相骨头 qiong'xiang'gu'tou
时有终始 shi'you'zhong'shi
附骥彰名 fu'ji'zhang'ming
知必言言必尽 zhi'bi'yan'yan'bi'jin
先事后得 xian'shi'hou'de
至仁无亲 zhi'ren'wu'qin
伸手不打笑面人 shen'shou'bu'da'xiao'mian'ren
我觉山高 wo'jue'shan'gao
遂作数语 sui'zuo'shu'yu
再三留不住 zai'san'liu'bu'zhu
见恶如探汤 jian'e'ru'tan'tang
显显令德 xian'xian'ling'de
点石化金 dian'shi'hua'jin
疏烟淡月 shu'yan'dan'yue
人情似纸张张薄 ren'qing'shi'zhi'zhang'zhang'bao
人不为己天地诛 ren'bu'wei'ji'tian'di'zhu
荆衡杞梓 jing'heng'qi'zi
熊虎之士 xiong'hu'zhi'shi
红不棱登 hong'bu'leng'deng
皇皇后帝 huang'huang'hou'di
顺天得一 shun'tian'de'yi
滴翠流香 di'cui'liu'xiang
翠尊未竭 cui'zun'wei'jie
人不劝不善 ren'bu'quan'bu'shan
鸾分鉴影 luan'fen'jian'ying
逢危必弃 feng'wei'bi'qi
蓬壶阆苑 peng'hu'lang'yuan
云奔雨骤 yun'ben'yu'zhou
敲碎离愁 qiao'sui'li'chou
呼灯灌穴 hu'deng'guan'xue
恬颜叨宴 tian'yan'dao'yan
三尺枯桐 san'chi'ku'tong
汹涌淜湃 xiong'yong'ping'pai
事多必杂 shi'duo'bi'za
情钟意笃 qing'zhong'yi'du
年少业伟 nian'shao'ye'wei
孤城阑角 gu'cheng'lan'jiao
百年修来同船渡 bai'nian'xiu'lai'tong'chuan'du
管窥蛙见 guan'kui'wa'jian
孤光自照 gu'guang'zi'zhao
能几花前 neng'ji'hua'qian
到此因念 dao'ci'yin'nian
春长暮霭 chun'zhang'mu'ai
江河不引自向东 jiang'he'bu'yin'zi'xiang'dong
谈玄说理 tan'xuan'shuo'li
无情画舸 wu'qing'hua'ge
龟长于蛇 gui'zhang'yu'she
壁月初晴 bi'yue'chu'qing
鼠年运气 shu'nian'yun'qi
不塞下流 bu'sai'xia'liu
上元有怀 shang'yuan'you'huai
理多不饶人 li'duo'bu'rao'ren
道三不道两 dao'san'bu'dao'liang
笔困纸穷 bi'kun'zhi'qiong
笔误作牛 bi'wu'zuo'niu
必传之作 bi'chuan'zhi'zuo
新来还恶 xin'lai'hai'e
弊车赢马 bi'che'ying'ma
三周说法 san'zhou'shuo'fa
避劳就逸 bi'lao'jiu'yi
宿酒醒迟 su'jiu'xing'chi
非方之物 fei'fang'zhi'wu
斗草溪根 dou'cao'xi'gen
雁起青天 yan'qi'qing'tian
是官比民强 shi'guan'bi'min'qiang
重锁隋堤 zhong'suo'sui'di
双燕如客 shuangyan'yan'ru'ke
未晚先投宿 wei'wan'xian'tou'su
阿魏无真 a'wei'wu'zhen
不期而集 bu'qi'er'ji
梨花飘雪 li'hua'piao'xue
被发详狂 bei'fa'xiang'kuang
被发阳狂 bei'fa'yang'kuang
被绣之牺 bei'xiu'zhi'xi
邮亭深静 you'ting'shen'jing
竭思枯想 jie'si'ku'xiang
唠三叨四 lao'san'dao'si
管仲随马 guan'zhong'sui'ma
愤世疾恶 fen'shi'ji'e
车胤盛萤 che'yin'sheng'ying
余甲寅岁 yu'jia'yin'sui
乘高临下 cheng'gao'lin'xia
闯祸生非 chuang''sheng'fei
出门看天色 chu'men'kan'tian'se
称不绝口 cheng'bu'jue'kou
平生志气高 ping'sheng'zhi'qi'gao
鼓动风潮 gu'dong'feng'chao
蛇化为龙 she'hua'wei'long
猫眼道钉 mao'yan'dao'ding
当年堕地 dang'nian'duo'di
涓涓不壅 juan'juan'bu'yong
绝圣弃知 jue'sheng'qi'zhi
看看又是白头翁 kan'kan'you'shi'bai'tou'weng
积土为山 ji'tu'wei'shan
闹里有钱 nao'li'you'qian
交人交心 jiao'ren'jiao'xin
祸溢于世 huo'yi'yu'shi
聚精凝神 ju'jing'ning'shen
应恐是痴人 ying'kong'shi'chi'ren
连朝接夕 lian'chao'jie'xi
占得韶光 zhan'de'shao'guang
冥心危坐 ming'xin'wei'zuo
尚记当日 shang'ji'dang'ri
无钱休入众 wu'qian'xiu'ru'zhong
凭阑怀古 ping'lan'huai'gu
当年四老 dang'nian'si'lao
林大风自微 lin'da'feng'zi'wei
李廷珪墨 li'ting'gui'mo
新桐初引 xin'tong'chu'yin
荷担而立 he'dan'er'li
利令志惛 li'ling'zhi'hun
刻划入微 ke'hua'ru'wei
巧篆垂簪 qiao'zhuan'chui'zan
恩礼宠异 en'li'chong'yi
浑头浑脑 hun'tou'hun'nao
醋海生波 cu'hai'sheng'bo
重淹罗巾 zhong'yan'luo'jin
尘襟尽涤 chen'jin'jin'di
杀人如藨 sha'ren'ru'biao
千佛一面 qian'fu'yi'mian
三人一龙 san'ren'yi'long
上风官司 shang'feng'guan'si
世上难逢百岁人 shi'shang'nan'feng'bai'sui'ren
笔诛口伐 bi'zhu'kou'fa
画堂人静 hua'tang'ren'jing
新烟禁柳 xin'yan'jin'liu
哪个人前不说人 na'ge'ren'qian'bu'shuo'ren
人熟不堪亲 ren'shu'bu'kan'qin
老子今朝 lao'zi'jin'chao
暮云亲舍 mu'yun'qin'she
缺衣乏食 que'yi'fa'shi
莺迁之喜 ying'qian'zhi'xi
洗雨烘晴 xi'yu'hong'qing
少吃无穿 shao'chi'wu'chuan
绿阴春尽 lv'yin'chun'jin
夙夜梦寐 su'ye'meng'mei
咸鱼淡肉 xian'yu'dan'rou
倚山傍水 yi'shan'bang'shui
祸生纤纤 huo'sheng'xian'xian
寄将秦镜 ji'jiang'qin'jing
人如飞絮 ren'ru'fei'xu
号天而哭 hao'tian'er'ku
竹槛灯窗 zhu'kan'deng'chuang
谁与温存 shui'yu'wen'cun
野鸟飞来 ye'niao'fei'lai
不看僧而看佛面 bu'kan'seng'er'kan'fu'mian
会说说不过理 hui'shuo'shuo'bu'guo'li
参差双燕 can'cha'shuangyan'yan
持法有恒 chi'fa'you'heng
豪门多败子 hao'men'duo'bai'zi
可设雀罗 ke'she'que'luo
充栋折轴 chong'dong'zhe'zhou
情痴情种 qing'chi'qing'zhong
荡心悦目 dang'xin'yue'mu
刀刃之蜜 dao'ren'zhi'mi
惟有游丝 wei'you'you'si
刀头之蜜 dao'tou'zhi'mi
重到须惊 zhong'dao'xu'jing
倒履相迎 dao'lv'xiang'ying
素娥未识 su'e'wei'shi
情欲寡浅 qing'yu'gua'qian
芳草碧色 fang'cao'bi'se
怨抑难招 yuan'yi'nan'zhao
救人救到底 jiu'ren'jiu'dao'di
罢却虎狼之威 ba'que'hu'lang'zhi'wei
黄柑荐酒 huang'gan'jian'jiu
无毒不丈 wu'du'bu'zhang
跛驴之伍 bo'lv'zhi'wu
槐叶冷淘 huai'ye'leng'tao
几尽而去 ji'jin'er'qu
砌虫能说 qi'chong'neng'shuo
及第必争先 ji'di'bi'zheng'xian
树大风难撼 shu'da'feng'nan'han
客来主不顾 ke'lai'zhu'bu'gu
等闲孤负 deng'xian'gu'fu
相如庭户 xiang'ru'ting'hu
读书须用意 du'shu'xu'yong'yi
去程应转 qu'cheng'ying'zhuan
龙基特陶 long'ji'te'tao
随分杯盘 sui'fen'bei'pan
奸人当道贤人危 jian'ren'dang'dao'xian'ren'wei
带愁流处 dai'chou'liu'chu
韩嫣金丸 han'yan'jin'wan
失却半年粮 shi'que'ban'nian'liang
人处福中不知福 ren'chu'fu'zhong'bu'zhi'fu
长河饮马 zhang'he'yin'ma
艰食鲜食 jian'shi'xian'shi
言利不言情 yan'li'bu'yan'qing
半嗔半喜 ban'chen'ban'xi
尽日冥迷 jin'ri'ming'mi
夜月楼台 ye'yue'lou'tai
花甜蜜嘴 hua'tian'mi'zui
事过心清凉 shi'guo'xin'qing'liang
空尊夜泣 kong'zun'ye'qi
老死沟壑 lao'si'gou'he
衣裳淡雅 yi'shang'dan'ya
烟柳弄睛 yan'liu'nong'jing
金华仙伯 jin'hua'xian'bo
乜乜踅踅 mie'mie'xue'xue
四桥尽是 si'qiao'jin'shi
水炎不相容 shui'yan'bu'xiang'rong
白费唇舌 bai'fei'chun'she
乱波平楚 luan'bo'ping'chu
漫沾残泪 man'zhan'can'lei
奉如圭臬 feng'ru'gui'nie
蜂勤蜜多 feng'qin'mi'duo
昔时贤文 xi'shi'xian'wen
莺声门径 ying'sheng'men'jing
柳困桃慵 liu'kun'tao'yong
洞口桃花也笑人 dong'kou'tao'hua'ye'xiao'ren
帘垂四面 lian'chui'si'mian
绮罗香暖 qi'luo'xiang'nuan
欲见回肠 yu'jian'hui'chang
歌遏行云 ge'e'xing'yun
宝镜难寻 bao'jing'nan'xun
胳膊上走得马 ge'bo'shang'zou'de'ma
是非之地不久处 shi'fei'zhi'di'bu'jiu'chu
整鬟颦黛 zheng'huan'pin'dai
古帘空暮 gu'lian'kong'mu
伏膺函丈 fu'ying'han'zhang
扶危持倾 fu'wei'chi'qing
恩威兼济 en'wei'jian'ji
上慈下孝 shang'ci'xia'xiao
碧云将暮 bi'yun'jiang'mu
众怒不可犯 zhong'nu'bu'ke'fan
展翔高飞 zhan'xiang'gao'fei
池塘别后 chi'tang'bie'hou
淮王鸡犬 huai'wang'ji'quan
滑稽坐上 hua'ji'zuo'shang
明察秋毫之末 ming'cha'qiu'hao'zhi'mo
且共从容 qie'gong'cong'rong
永远醒目 yong'yuan'xing'mu
雾浓香鸭 wu'nong'xiang'ya
修竹凝妆 xiu'zhu'ning'zhuang
曲曲屏山 qu'qu'ping'shan
过眼年华 guo'yan'nian'hua
宫粉雕痕 gong'fen'diao'hen
凭栏却怕 ping'lan'que'pa
祸生不德 huo'sheng'bu'de
求之过急 qiu'zhi'guo'ji
淡彩穿花 dan'cai'chuan'hua
打蛇不死必被咬 da'she'bu'si'bi'bei'yao
风鬟三五 feng'huan'san'wu
堂深昼永 tang'shen'zhou'yong
黑沙地狱 hei'sha'di'yu
身居福中不知福 shen'ju'fu'zhong'bu'zhi'fu
旧曾题处 jiu'ceng'ti'chu
四野春风 si'ye'chun'feng
帅旗一倒万兵逃 shuai'qi'yi'dao'wan'bing'tao
暝鸦零乱 ming'ya'ling'luan
醉拥重衾 zui'yong'zhong'qin
两全之美 liang'quan'zhi'mei
世间深渊莫比心 shi'jian'shen'yuan'mo'bi'xin
奉笔兔园 feng'bi'tu'yuan
叶底清圆 ye'di'qing'yuan
名不虚行 ming'bu'xu'xing
刁风拐月 diao'feng'guai'yue
丁宁深意 ding'ning'shen'yi
黄梅未落青梅落 huang'mei'wei'luo'qing'mei'luo
十年九潦 shi'nian'jiu'lao
抱影无眠 bao'ying'wu'mian
去却寒暄 qu'que'han'xuan
畏强欺弱 wei'qiang'qi'ruo
劝人莫作 quan'ren'mo'zuo
豪门似海 hao'men'shi'hai
暗中作乐 an'zhong'zuo'le
昭穆伦序 zhao'mu'lun'xu
近邻比亲 jin'lin'bi'qin
出家不离俗 chu'jia'bu'li'su
花梢钿合 hua'shao'dian'he
琼林满眼 qiong'lin'man'yan
鼠年贺辞 shu'nian'he'ci
话浅理不浅 hua'qian'li'bu'qian
中人以上 zhong'ren'yi'shang
痴汉不会饶人 chi'han'bu'hui'rao'ren
能忍则安 neng'ren'ze'an
平原十日饭 ping'yuan'shi'ri'fan
千虑一行 qian'lv'yi'xing
歌尘凝扇 ge'chen'ning'shan
莫与为比 mo'yu'wei'bi
丈夫有泪不轻弹 zhang'fu'you'lei'bu'qing'dan
玲珑浮突 ling'long'fu'tu
越分妄为 yue'fen'wang'wei
肤浅末学 fu'qian'mo'xue
佛是金妆 fu'shi'jin'zhuang
否终而泰 fou'zhong'er'tai
福不重至祸必重来 fu'bu'zhong'zhi'huo'bi'zhong'lai
心意相投 xin'yi'xiang'tou
福过祸生 fu'guo'huo'sheng
三四调狙 san'si'diao'ju
服气吞露 fu'qi'tun'lu
几篙官渡 ji'gao'guan'du
三公山碑 san'gong'shan'bei
闲静少言 xian'jing'shao'yan
但能依本分 dan'neng'yi'ben'fen
无崩地裂 wu'beng'di'lie
人各有心 ren'ge'you'xin
夫妻无隔夜之仇 fu'qi'wu'ge'ye'zhi'chou
洞无城府 dong'wu'cheng'fu
罗绶分香 luo'shou'fen'xiang
睹几而作 du'ji'er'zuo
凤去秦楼 feng'qu'qin'lou
言多失实 yan'duo'shi'shi

风移俗改 feng'yi'su'gai
空车走阪 kong'che'zou'ban

绿惨红销 lv'can'hong'xiao

奋发淬厉 fen'fa'cui'li
多谋少断 duo'mou'shao'duan
气竭声嘶 qi'jie'sheng'si
神工意匠 shen'gong'yi'jiang
大肆厥辞 da'si'jue'ci
研京练都 yan'jing'lian'dou
分风劈流 fen'feng'pi'liu
掣襟露肘 che'jin'lu'zhou
福孙荫子 fu'sun'yin'zi
青紫拾芥 qing'zi'shi'gai
一饥两饱 yi'ji'liang'bao
操身行世 cao'shen'xing'shi
过时黄花 guo'shi'huang'hua
东挨西撞 dong'ai'xi'zhuang
饥火烧肠 ji'huo'shao'chang
经丘寻壑 jing'qiu'xun'he
丁子有尾 ding'zi'you'wei
绮纨之岁 qi'wan'zhi'sui
兔起乌沉 tu'qi'wu'chen
败群之马 bai'qun'zhi'ma
出言挺撞 chu'yan'ting'zhuang
露胆披肝 lu'dan'pi'gan
风流罪犯 feng'liu'zui'fan
肩摩袂接 jian'mo'mei'jie

至人无为 zhi'ren'wu'wei
解发佯狂 jie'fa'yang'kuang
腼颜事敌 mian'yan'shi'di
坏裳为裤 huai'shang'wei'ku
未可同日而语 wei'ke'tong'ri'er'yu
磨铅策蹇 mo'qian'ce'jian
揭揭巍巍 jie'jie'wei'wei
依心像意 yi'xin'xiang'yi
聊以塞命 liao'yi'sai'ming

行不从径 xing'bu'cong'jing

当头对面 dang'tou'dui'mian

妙龄驰誉 miao'ling'chi'yu
高位重禄 gao'wei'zhong'lu
埙篪相和 xun'chi'xiang'he
返来复去 fan'lai'fu'qu
词约指明 ci'yue'zhi'ming

党恶佑奸 dang'e'you'jian
阿党相为 a'dang'xiang'wei
极恶穷凶 ji'e'qiong'xiong
春袗轻筇 chun'zhen'qing'qiong
绵裹秤锤 mian'guo'cheng'chui
柔枝嫩条 rou'zhi'nen'tiao
里合外应 li'he'wai'ying
钩隐抉微 gou'yin'jue'wei

尺瑜寸瑕 chi'yu'cun'xia
占风望气 zhan'feng'wang'qi
理枉雪滞 li'wang'xue'zhi
牛骥同槽 niu'ji'tong'cao
东望西观 dong'wang'xi'guan
迄未成功 qi'wei'cheng'gong
凤吟鸾吹 feng'yin'luan'chui
剖肝泣血 pou'gan'qi'xue
掩鼻偷香 yan'bi'tou'xiang
敬姜犹绩 jing'jiang'you'ji
超世之功 chao'shi'zhi'gong
比肩迭踵 bi'jian'die'zhong
时异事殊 shi'yi'shi'shu
麇骇雉伏 jun'hai'zhi'fu
苌弘碧血 chang'hong'bi'xue
出谷迁乔 chu'gu'qian'qiao
登高去梯 deng'gao'qu'ti
角力中原 jiao'li'zhong'yuan
跌脚槌胸 die'jiao'chui'xiong
门不夜扃 men'bu'ye'jiong
君子三戒 jun'zi'san'jie
人谋不臧 ren'mou'bu'zang
秋毫勿犯 qiu'hao'wu'fan
斩竿揭木 zhan'gan'jie'mu
柳昏花螟 liu'hun'hua'ming
充天塞地 chong'tian'sai'di
歼一警百 jian'yi'jing'bai
拉捭摧藏 la'bai'cui'cang
胆破心惊 dan'po'xin'jing
凋零磨灭 diao'ling'mo'mie
爱民恤物 ai'min'xu'wu
捏怪排科 nie'guai'pai'ke
蚤寝晏起 zao'qin'yan'qi
打鸭惊鸳 da'ya'jing'yuan
人微言贱 ren'wei'yan'jian
见善必迁 jian'shan'bi'qian
聊以自况 liao'yi'zi'kuang
乾脆利落 gan'cui'li'luo
桑枢韦带 sang'shu'wei'dai
狮子搏兔亦用全力 shi'zi'bo'tu'yi'yong'quan'li
精心励志 jing'xin'li'zhi
画里真真 hua'li'zhen'zhen
极则必反 ji'ze'bi'fan
易口以食 yi'kou'yi'shi
避凉附炎 bi'liang'fu'yan
疾雨暴风 ji'yu'bao'feng
耳闻则诵 er'wen'ze'song
衣冠云集 yi'guan'yun'ji
梦劳魂想 meng'lao'hun'xiang
貊乡鼠壤 mo'xiang'shu'rang
兼览博照 jian'lan'bo'zhao
杜弊清源 du'bi'qing'yuan
赦不妄下 she'bu'wang'xia
去题万里 qu'ti'wan'li
牧竖之焚 mu'shu'zhi'fen
行号巷哭 xing'hao'xiang'ku

阒若无人 qu'ruo'wu'ren

盈篇累牍 ying'pian'lei'du
清渭浊泾 qing'wei'zhuo'jing
壶中之天 hu'zhong'zhi'tian
蜗舍荆扉 wo'she'jing'fei
乐祸幸灾 le'huo'xing'zai
广见洽闻 guang'jian'qia'wen
成妖作怪 cheng'yao'zuo'guai
互为标榜 hu'wei'biao'bang
晨参暮礼 chen'can'mu'li
高举远去 gao'ju'yuan'qu
狼顾鸱张 lang'gu'chi'zhang
花光柳影 hua'guang'liu'ying
正己守道 zheng'ji'shou'dao
道旁苦李 dao'pang'ku'li
断断继继 duan'duan'ji'ji
认影迷头 ren'ying'mi'tou
拂衣远去 fu'yi'yuan'qu
傍柳随花 bang'liu'sui'hua
抱屈衔冤 bao'qu'xian'yuan
遗闻逸事 yi'wen'yi'shi
方丈盈前 fang'zhang'ying'qian
文君司马 wen'jun'si'ma
风从响应 feng'cong'xiang'ying
舍近谋远 she'jin'mou'yuan
敦庞之朴 dui'pang'zhi'pu
栗烈觱发 li'lie'bi'fa
欺瞒夹帐 qi'man'jia'zhang
湿肉伴干柴 shi'rou'ban'gan'chai
毁风败俗 hui'feng'bai'su
骄侈淫佚 jiao'chi'yin'yi
擒龙缚虎 qin'long'fu'hu
匣里龙吟 xia'li'long'yin
纸落云烟 zhi'luo'yun'yan
按甲不出 an'jia'bu'chu
风马无关 feng'ma'wu'guan
极古穷今 ji'gu'qiong'jin
云开雾释 yun'kai'wu'shi
齐趋并驾 qi'qu'bing'jia
任达不拘 ren'da'bu'ju
弃子逐妻 qi'zi'zhu'qi
一辞同轨 yi'ci'tong'gui
赴汤跳火 fu'tang'tiao'huo
美言市尊 mei'yan'shi'zun
成风尽垩 cheng'feng'jin'e
敬布腹心 jing'bu'fu'xin
名纸生毛 ming'zhi'sheng'mao
无如奈何 wu'ru'nai'he
鱼网鸿离 yu'wang'hong'li
羞与哙伍 xiu'yu'kuai'wu
肌肉玉雪 ji'rou'yu'xue
支分族解 zhi'fen'zu'jie
一品白衫 yi'pin'bai'shan
加膝坠泉 jia'xi'zhui'quan
皎阳似火 jiao'yang'shi'huo
大纛高牙 da'dao'gao'ya
放心托胆 fang'xin'tuo'dan
括囊四海 kuo'nang'si'hai
确然不群 que'ran'bu'qun
澧兰沅芷 li'lan'yuan'zhi
油嘴油舌 you'zui'you'she
存亡有分 cun'wang'you'fen
东播西流 dong'bo'xi'liu
屈尊敬贤 qu'zun'jing'xian
瑶台银阙 yao'tai'yin'que
礼先壹饭 li'xian'yi'fan
半身不摄 ban'shen'bu'she
承天之佑 cheng'tian'zhi'you
闭阁自责 bi'ge'zi'ze
缪种流传 miao'zhong'liu'chuan
迈古超今 mai'gu'chao'jin
施施而行 shi'shi'er'xing
返我初服 fan'wo'chu'fu
枕山襟海 zhen'shan'jin'hai
望望然去之 wang'wang'ran'qu'zhi
比肩系踵 bi'jian'xi'zhong
花天锦地 hua'tian'jin'di
守正不桡 shou'zheng'bu'rao
切骨之仇 qie'gu'zhi'chou
雪鸿指爪 xue'hong'zhi'zhao
伯牛之疾 bo'niu'zhi'ji
斗美夸丽 dou'mei'kua'li
沈博绝丽 shen'bo'jue'li
天高日远 tian'gao'ri'yuan
弊衣疏食 bi'yi'shu'shi
式歌且舞 shi'ge'qie'wu
物殷俗阜 wu'yan'su'fu
油干灯草尽 you'gan'deng'cao'jin
驹光过隙 ju'guang'guo'xi
深惟重虑 shen'wei'zhong'lv
暮夜怀金 mu'ye'huai'jin
冠盖如市 guan'gai'ru'shi
槁项黧馘 gao'xiang'li'guo
交洽无嫌 jiao'qia'wu'xian
流杯曲水 liu'bei'qu'shui
同生死共存亡 tong'sheng'si'gong'cun'wang
鸷鸟将击卑飞敛翼 zhi'niao'jiang'ji'bei'fei'lian'yi
毛发不爽 mao'fa'bu'shuang
杀彘教子 sha'zhi'jiao'zi
偃甲息兵 yan'jia'xi'bing
同堂兄弟 tong'tang'xiong'di
辩说属辞 bian'shuo'shu'ci
貌合形离 mao'he'xing'li
囊萤照读 nang'ying'zhao'du
缩衣节口 suo'yi'jie'kou
劳精苦形 lao'jing'ku'xing
翻然改悔 fan'ran'gai'hui
交臂相失 jiao'bi'xiang'shi
安于故俗溺于旧闻 an'yu'gu'su'ni'yu'jiu'wen
说好嫌歹 shuo'hao'xian'dai
后恭前倨 hou'gong'qian'ju
阿时趋俗 a'shi'qu'su
军不厌诈 jun'bu'yan'zha
询谋佥同 xun'mou'qian'tong
短吃少穿 duan'chi'shao'chuan
海涯天角 hai'ya'tian'jiao
枝附叶从 zhi'fu'ye'cong
挹彼注此 yi'bi'zhu'ci
急兔反噬 ji'tu'fan'shi
手脚乾净 shou'jiao'gan'jing
疚心疾首 jiu'xin'ji'shou
轻动干戈 qing'dong'gan'ge
镂脂翦楮 lou'zhi'jian'chu
掠是搬非 e'shi'ban'fei
毁节求生 hui'jie'qiu'sheng
轻怜重惜 qing'lian'zhong'xi
火列星屯 huo'lie'xing'tun
现钟弗打 xian'zhong'fu'da
肥甘轻暖 fei'gan'qing'nuan
同敝相济 tong'bi'xiang'ji
绨袍之义 ti'pao'zhi'yi
指日成功 zhi'ri'cheng'gong
永世无穷 yong'shi'wu'qiong
此中多有 ci'zhong'duo'you
宿水餐风 su'shui'can'feng
燕驾越毂 yan'jia'yue'gu
溥天同庆 pu'tian'tong'qing
重金袭汤 zhong'jin'xi'tang
枕善而居 zhen'shan'er'ju
东奔西波 dong'ben'xi'bo
百年好事 bai'nian'hao'shi
惠心妍状 hui'xin'yan'zhuang
樵苏不爨 qiao'su'bu'cuan
局天蹐地 ju'tian'ji'di
砥行磨名 di'xing'mo'ming
鼎食鸣钟 ding'shi'ming'zhong
诘究本末 ji'jiu'ben'mo
濯污扬清 zhuo'wu'yang'qing
阿谀顺意 a'yu'shun'yi
蜂营蚁队 feng'ying'yi'dui
鬼设神使 gui'she'shen'shi
股肱腹心 gu'gong'fu'xin
逆阪走丸 ni'ban'zou'wan
赏信必罚 shang'xin'bi'fa
冰魂素魄 bing'hun'su'po
角巾东第 jiao'jin'dong'di
嫉贤傲士 ji'xian'ao'shi
回天运斗 hui'tian'yun'dou
运智铺谋 yun'zhi'pu'mou
舍安就危 she'an'jiu'wei
冰瓯雪椀 bing'ou'xue'wan
寂若死灰 ji'ruo'si'hui
攀龙附骥 pan'long'fu'ji
威重令行 wei'zhong'ling'xing
殊方绝域 shu'fang'jue'yu
霜行草宿 shuang''cao'su
并驱齐驾 bing'qu'qi'jia
罪不可逭 zui'bu'ke'huan
闻风远扬 wen'feng'yuan'yang
求贤下士 qiu'xian'xia'shi
铁板歌喉 tie'ban'ge'hou
马角乌头 ma'jiao'wu'tou
追风觅影 zhui'feng'mi'ying
相视而笑莫逆于心 xiang'shi'er'xiao'mo'ni'yu'xin
丰屋之过 feng'wu'zhi'guo
一面如旧 yi'mian'ru'jiu
死有余僇 si'you'yu'lu
杜门晦迹 du'men'hui'ji
毛举缕析 mao'ju'lv'xi
揖盗开门 yi'dao'kai'men
我武惟扬 wo'wu'wei'yang
香培玉琢 xiang'pei'yu'zuo
镂冰雕朽 lou'bing'diao'xiu
口辩户说 kou'bian'hu'shuo
令骥捕鼠 ling'ji'bu'shu
东床姣婿 dong'chuang''xu
询迁询谋 xun'qian'xun'mou
丰屋之祸 feng'wu'zhi'huo
遗名去利 yi'ming'qu'li
薰莸不同器 xun'you'bu'tong'qi
门不夜关 men'bu'ye'guan
挑毛剔刺 tiao'mao'ti'ci
东海捞针 dong'hai'lao'zhen
衅稔恶盈 xin'ren'e'ying
倔强倨傲 jue'qiang'ju'ao
播恶遗臭 bo'e'yi'chou
按迹循踪 an'ji'xun'zong
弓上弦刀出鞘 gong'shang'xian'dao'chu'qiao
利绾名牵 li'wan'ming'qian
雄鸡夜鸣 xiong'ji'ye'ming
虎生三子必有一彪 hu'sheng'san'zi'bi'you'yi'biao
朱弦三叹 zhu'xian'san'tan
裂石流云 lie'shi'liu'yun
三病四痛 san'bing'si'tong
亡不待夕 wang'bu'dai'xi
潜精积思 qian'jing'ji'si
仁言利博 ren'yan'li'bo
浮迹浪踪 fu'ji'lang'zong
痛诬丑诋 tong'wu'chou'di
销声匿影 xiao'sheng'ni'ying
嘉言善状 jia'yan'shan'zhuang
请先入瓮 qing'xian'ru'weng
曲尽其巧 qu'jin'qi'qiao
长计远虑 zhang'ji'yuan'lv
泛泛之人 fan'fan'zhi'ren
身在江湖心存魏阙 shen'zai'jiang'hu'xin'cun'wei'que
披襟解带 pi'jin'jie'dai
四海飘零 si'hai'piao'ling
求贤用士 qiu'xian'yong'shi
宗师案临 zong'shi'an'lin
凛不可犯 lin'bu'ke'fan
蜚英腾茂 fei'ying'teng'mao
耆儒硕老 qi'ru'shuo'lao
心不两用 xin'bu'liang'yong
谬妄无稽 miu'wang'wu'ji
蓬闾生辉 peng'lv'sheng'hui
珠联玉映 zhu'lian'yu'ying
出云入泥 chu'yun'ru'ni
苍髯如戟 cang'ran'ru'ji
鸣玉曳组 ming'yu'ye'zu
水底捞月 shui'di'lao'yue
流风遗俗 liu'feng'yi'su
评头论脚 ping'tou'lun'jiao
睹影知竿 du'ying'zhi'gan
抱鸡养竹 bao'ji'yang'zhu
销毁骨立 xiao'hui'gu'li
丝恩发怨 si'en'fa'yuan
不可摸捉 bu'ke'mo'zhuo
燕俦莺侣 yan'chou'ying'lv
饱谙世故 bao'an'shi'gu
西歪东倒 xi'wai'dong'dao
鸾孤凤寡 luan'gu'feng'gua
不问皂白 bu'wen'zao'bai
差堪自慰 cha'kan'zi'wei
寻瑕伺隙 xun'xia'ci'xi
谦受益满招损 qian'shou'yi'man'zhao'sun
望其肩项 wang'qi'jian'xiang
愁多夜长 chou'duo'ye'zhang
柳亸花娇 liu'duo'hua'jiao
去甚去泰 qu'shen'qu'tai
荡荡默默 dang'dang'mo'mo
熬姜呷醋 ao'jiang'ga'cu
顺风行船 shun'feng'xing'chuan
洗垢索瘢 xi'gou'suo'ban
雾暗云深 wu'an'yun'shen
鸡争鹅斗 ji'zheng'e'dou
磨踵灭顶 mo'zhong'mie'ding
雍容雅步 yong'rong'ya'bu
街谭巷议 jie'tan'xiang'yi
买牛息戈 mai'niu'xi'ge
轻薄无知 qing'bao'wu'zhi
坏人心术 huai'ren'xin'shu
风平波息 feng'ping'bo'xi
居常之安 ju'chang'zhi'an
时无再来 shi'wu'zai'lai
过耳秋风 guo'er'qiu'feng
正经八本 zheng'jing'ba'ben
揭债还债 jie'zhai'hai'zhai
寝关曝纩 qin'guan'pu'kuang
目不苟视 mu'bu'gou'shi
伯歌季舞 bo'ge'ji'wu
倦鸟知还 juan'niao'zhi'hai

移风崇教 yi'feng'chong'jiao
吹网欲满 chui'wang'yu'man
明法审令 ming'fa'shen'ling
体规画圆 ti'gui'hua'yuan
恩有重报 en'you'zhong'bao
斜行横阵 xie'xing'heng'zhen
冰散瓦解 bing'san'wa'jie
龙腾虎踞 long'teng'hu'ju
一齐众楚 yi'qi'zhong'chu
承讹袭舛 cheng'e'xi'chuan
辞简理博 ci'jian'li'bo
气冠三军 qi'guan'san'jun
熔今铸古 rong'jin'zhu'gu
混造黑白 hun'zao'hei'bai
高标卓识 gao'biao'zhuo'shi
天宝当年 tian'bao'dang'nian
十世单传 shi'shi'dan'chuan
汗流洽衣 han'liu'qia'yi
日中必移 ri'zhong'bi'yi
龟冷支床 gui'leng'zhi'chuang
乱坠天花 luan'zhui'tian'hua
诗肠鼓吹 shi'chang'gu'chui

盐梅相成 yan'mei'xiang'cheng
言归和好 yan'gui'he'hao

染丝之叹 ran'si'zhi'tan

刿心刳腹 gui'xin'ku'fu

日短夜修 ri'duan'ye'xiu
皎如日星 jiao'ru'ri'xing
平澹无奇 ping'dan'wu'qi
沂水弦歌 yi'shui'xian'ge

闺英闱秀 gui'ying'wei'xiu
词无枝叶 ci'wu'zhi'ye
引类呼朋 yin'lei'hu'peng
涸鲋得水 he'fu'de'shui

贤才君子 xian'cai'jun'zi
半途之废 ban'tu'zhi'fei
法无二门 fa'wu'er'men
黄汤淡水 huang'tang'dan'shui

感篆五中 gan'zhuan'wu'zhong
威望素着 wei'wang'su'zhe
逞工炫巧 cheng'gong'xuan'qiao
不幸之幸 bu'xing'zhi'xing
麇至沓来 jun'zhi'da'lai
矢如雨集 shi'ru'yu'ji
降心顺俗 jiang'xin'shun'su

案兵束甲 an'bing'shu'jia
大呼小喝 da'hu'xiao'he

枝分叶散 zhi'fen'ye'san
气度雄远 qi'du'xiong'yuan

美言不文 mei'yan'bu'wen

假物为用 jia'wu'wei'yong

车攻马同 che'gong'ma'tong

潜神嘿规 qian'shen'hei'gui
如嚼鸡肋 ru'jue'ji'le
至诚无昧 zhi'cheng'wu'mei
拱揖指麾 gong'yi'zhi'hui

攘袂引领 rang'mei'yin'ling
调词架讼 diao'ci'jia'song

彼倡此和 bi'chang'ci'he
有福同享有祸同当 you'fu'tong'xiang'you'huo'tong'dang
连类比事 lian'lei'bi'shi
餐腥啄腐 can'xing'zhuo'fu
螳臂当辙 tang'bi'dang'zhe

敛容息气 lian'rong'xi'qi
关东出相关西出将 guan'dong'chu'xiang'guan'xi'chu'jiang
青霄直上 qing'xiao'zhi'shang
古是今非 gu'shi'jin'fei
饮水啜菽 yin'shui'chuai'shu
谊切苔岑 yi'qie'tai'cen

了然可见 le'ran'ke'jian
消声匿影 xiao'sheng'ni'ying

干名犯义 gan'ming'fan'yi
偃革倒戈 yan'ge'dao'ge
老着面皮 lao'zhe'mian'pi
七了八当 qi'le'ba'dang

金城石室 jin'cheng'shi'shi

无名之璞 wu'ming'zhi'pu
探汤蹈火 tan'tang'dao'huo
称德度功 cheng'de'du'gong
琴瑟和同 qin'se'he'tong

探观止矣 tan'guan'zhi'yi
调良稳泛 diao'liang'wen'fan
采薪之患 cai'xin'zhi'huan
一乾二净 yi'gan'er'jing
阿世盗名 a'shi'dao'ming
急竹繁丝 ji'zhu'fan'si
权变锋出 quan'bian'feng'chu
安于覆盂 an'yu'fu'yu
出世超凡 chu'shi'chao'fan
抛鸾拆凤 pao'luan'chai'feng
藏奸卖俏 cang'jian'mai'qiao
色飞眉舞 se'fei'mei'wu
迎新弃旧 ying'xin'qi'jiu

背前面后 bei'qian'mian'hou
名成身退 ming'cheng'shen'tui
纤介之失 xian'jie'zhi'shi
分损谤议 fen'sun'bang'yi
浮词曲说 fu'ci'qu'shuo
沉厚寡言 chen'hou'gua'yan
口黄未退 kou'huang'wei'tui
连枝共冢 lian'zhi'gong'zhong
刮地以去 gua'di'yi'qu

打嘴现世 da'zui'xian'shi
谄上抑下 chan'shang'yi'xia
旷心怡神 kuang'xin'yi'shen
心膂爪牙 xin'lv'zhao'ya
神流气鬯 shen'liu'qi'chang
北辰星拱 bei'chen'xing'gong
目瞪神呆 mu'deng'shen'dai
砥兵砺伍 di'bing'li'wu
草茅危言 cao'mao'wei'yan
九折成医 jiu'zhe'cheng'yi
老鹤乘轩 lao'he'cheng'xuan
开诚布信 kai'cheng'bu'xin
冰销叶散 bing'xiao'ye'san
桂子兰孙 gui'zi'lan'sun
种麦得麦 zhong'mai'de'mai
头眩目昏 tou'xuan'mu'hun
片语只辞 pian'yu'zhi'ci
强宾不压主 qiang'bin'bu'ya'zhu
计无所施 ji'wu'suo'shi
繁言蔓词 fan'yan'man'ci
潜德秘行 qian'de'mi'xing
蜂拥蚁屯 feng'yong'yi'tun
风风韵韵 feng'feng'yun'yun
密针细缕 mi'zhen'xi'lv
以升量石 yi'sheng'liang'shi
蹈人旧辙 dao'ren'jiu'zhe
色艺两绝 se'yi'liang'jue
滔滔汩汩 tao'tao'gu'gu
虎视鹰扬 hu'shi'ying'yang
人中骐骥 ren'zhong'qi'ji
枕戈汗马 zhen'ge'han'ma
褒贤遏恶 bao'xian'e'e
熬清守淡 ao'qing'shou'dan
雕楹碧槛 diao'ying'bi'kan
疾恶若雠 ji'e'ruo'chou
染化而迁 ran'hua'er'qian
煦煦孑孑 xu'xu'jie'jie
朝里无人莫做官 chao'li'wu'ren'mo'zuo'guan
带着铃铛去做贼 dai'zhe'ling'dang'qu'zuo'zei
佛头加秽 fu'tou'jia'hui
赏劳罚罪 shang'lao'fa'zui
补牢顾犬 bu'lao'gu'quan
尺枉寻直 chi'wang'xun'zhi
钱过北斗 qian'guo'bei'dou
竭泽焚薮 jie'ze'fen'sou
收成弃败 shou'cheng'qi'bai
单特孑立 dan'te'jie'li
浃髓沦肤 jia'sui'lun'fu
死灰复燎 si'hui'fu'liao
碌碌无奇 lu'lu'wu'qi
高不辏低不就 gao'bu'cou'di'bu'jiu
祝咽祝哽 zhu'yan'zhu'geng
铤鹿走险 ding'lu'zou'xian
雕花刻叶 diao'hua'ke'ye
当家立纪 dang'jia'li'ji
右手画圆左手画方 you'shou'hua'yuan'zuo'shou'hua'fang
何思何虑 he'si'he'lv
驽箭离弦 nu'jian'li'xian
金科玉条 jin'ke'yu'tiao
习故安常 xi'gu'an'chang
分贫振穷 fen'pin'zhen'qiong
米盐博辩 mi'yan'bo'bian
推宗明本 tui'zong'ming'ben
垂没之命 chui'mei'zhi'ming
高下任心 gao'xia'ren'xin
义不辞难 yi'bu'ci'nan
计穷力屈 ji'qiong'li'qu
瞪眼咋舌 deng'yan'za'she
顶门壮户 ding'men'zhuanghu'hu
理亏词遁 li'kui'ci'dun
同源异派 tong'yuan'yi'pai
东风人面 dong'feng'ren'mian
熊罴百万 xiong'pi'bai'wan
即事穷理 ji'shi'qiong'li
楞头磕脑 leng'tou'ke'nao
历精为治 li'jing'wei'zhi
成规陋习 cheng'gui'lou'xi
续凫断鹤 xu'fu'duan'he
甘言美语 gan'yan'mei'yu
才兼万人 cai'jian'wan'ren
反经合道 fan'jing'he'dao
浪迹浮踪 lang'ji'fu'zong

狗吠非主 gou'fei'fei'zhu

热心苦口 re'xin'ku'kou
燕翼贻谋 yan'yi'yi'mou
悯时病俗 min'shi'bing'su
万赖无声 wan'lai'wu'sheng

别创一格 bie'chuang''ge
骈首就死 pian'shou'jiu'si

深文大义 shen'wen'da'yi

日来月往 ri'lai'yue'wang

大缪不然 da'miao'bu'ran
肆奸植党 si'jian'zhi'dang

出奇取胜 chu'qi'qu'sheng
金革之难 jin'ge'zhi'nan
骇人闻见 hai'ren'wen'jian
条解支劈 tiao'jie'zhi'pi

诚心敬意 cheng'xin'jing'yi
扶老将幼 fu'lao'jiang'you
空费词说 kong'fei'ci'shuo
君子一言快马一鞭 jun'zi'yi'yan'kuai'ma'yi'bian
负心违愿 fu'xin'wei'yuan
皦短心长 jiao'duan'xin'zhang
握纲提领 wo'gang'ti'ling
鄙俚浅陋 bi'li'qian'lou
车过腹痛 che'guo'fu'tong
画荻丸熊 hua'di'wan'xiong
烘堂大笑 hong'tang'da'xiao
狡焉思启 jiao'yan'si'qi
辞不达义 ci'bu'da'yi
拘俗守常 ju'su'shou'chang
衣单食薄 yi'dan'shi'bao
无故呻吟 wu'gu'shen'yin
乐嗟苦咄 le'jie'ku'duo
威刑肃物 wei'xing'su'wu
年壮气锐 nian'zhuangqi'qi'rui
百务具举 bai'wu'ju'ju
断梗浮萍 duan'geng'fu'ping
官样文书 guan'yang'wen'shu
金人之缄 jin'ren'zhi'jian
不避斧钺 bu'bi'fu'yue
鹿裘不完 lu'qiu'bu'wan
灰身粉骨 hui'shen'fen'gu
梗泛萍漂 geng'fan'ping'piao
光彩射目 guang'cai'she'mu
三沐三薰 san'mu'san'xun
先难后获 xian'nan'hou'huo
不舞之鹤 bu'wu'zhi'he

椎天抢地 chui'tian'qiang'di
颠头簸脑 dian'tou'bo'nao
誉不绝口 yu'bu'jue'kou
粗有眉目 cu'you'mei'mu
丹黄甲乙 dan'huang'jia'yi

聪明出众 cong'ming'chu'zhong

聚米为谷 ju'mi'wei'gu

浪蝶游蜂 lang'die'you'feng
怒臂当车 nu'bi'dang'che

劈空扳害 pi'kong'ban'hai

流言混话 liu'yan'hun'hua
背公向私 bei'gong'xiang'si
有加无已 you'jia'wu'yi

鲁阳挥日 lu'yang'hui'ri

上方不足下比有余 shang'fang'bu'zu'xia'bi'you'yu
通幽动微 tong'you'dong'wei
逍遥物外 xiao'yao'wu'wai

通文调武 tong'wen'diao'wu
挈瓶之智 qie'ping'zhi'zhi
鹤长凫短 he'zhang'fu'duan
回肠寸断 hui'chang'cun'duan
十二万分 shi'er'wan'fen
锻炼周纳 duan'lian'zhou'na
走伏无地 zou'fu'wu'di
镞砺括羽 zu'li'kuo'yu
负德背义 fu'de'bei'yi
岐出岐入 qi'chu'qi'ru
贩交买名 fan'jiao'mai'ming
谩上不谩下 man'shang'bu'man'xia
黄钟长弃 huang'zhong'zhang'qi
三日仆射 san'ri'pu'she
飞觥献斝 fei'gong'xian'jia
以莛撞钟 yi'ting'zhuangzhong'zhong
敛声屏息 lian'sheng'ping'xi
有心有意 you'xin'you'yi
绸缪帷幄 chou'miao'wei'wo
回天挽日 hui'tian'wan'ri
剥极必复 bo'ji'bi'fu
仍陋袭简 reng'lou'xi'jian
山川震眩 shan'chuan'zhen'xuan
去而之他 qu'er'zhi'ta
化枭为鸠 hua'xiao'wei'jiu
塞井焚舍 sai'jing'fen'she
土偶蒙金 tu'ou'meng'jin
方正不苟 fang'zheng'bu'gou
苗而不穗 miao'er'bu'sui
情投意洽 qing'tou'yi'qia
有翅难展 you'chi'nan'zhan
有初鲜终 you'chu'xian'zhong
指天射鱼 zhi'tian'she'yu
寸兵尺铁 cun'bing'chi'tie
兵多将勇 bing'duo'jiang'yong
虎头鼠尾 hu'tou'shu'wei
食宿相兼 shi'su'xiang'jian
如开茅塞 ru'kai'mao'sai
贯鱼之次 guan'yu'zhi'ci
攫金不见人 jue'jin'bu'jian'ren
异口同韵 yi'kou'tong'yun
击壤鼓腹 ji'rang'gu'fu
气喘汗流 qi'chuan'han'liu
三复白圭 san'fu'bai'gui
无远不届 wu'yuan'bu'jie
鞭麟笞凤 bian'lin'chi'feng
席门蓬巷 xi'men'peng'xiang
返躬内省 fan'gong'nei'sheng
连篇累帧 lian'pian'lei'zheng
处之怡然 chu'zhi'yi'ran
礼为情貌 li'wei'qing'mao
力士捉蝇 li'shi'zhuo'ying
鬼子敢尔 gui'zi'gan'er
日中必昃 ri'zhong'bi'ze
一门同气 yi'men'tong'qi
隔皮断货 ge'pi'duan'huo
年丰时稔 nian'feng'shi'ren
仁义君子 ren'yi'jun'zi
霞友云朋 xia'you'yun'peng
揉眵抹泪 rou'chi'mo'lei
买王得羊 mai'wang'de'yang
三日绕梁 san'ri'rao'liang
胡肥钟瘦 hu'fei'zhong'shou
计合谋从 ji'he'mou'cong
弄法舞文 nong'fa'wu'wen
晋用楚材 jin'yong'chu'cai
删华就素 shan'hua'jiu'su
差三错四 cha'san'cuo'si
幺弦孤韵 yao'xian'gu'yun
矫国更俗 jiao'guo'geng'su
破柱求奸 po'zhu'qiu'jian
褚小杯大 chu'xiao'bei'da
杏雨梨云 xing'yu'li'yun
柳泣花啼 liu'qi'hua'ti
偏怀浅戆 pian'huai'qian'gang
履足差肩 lv'zu'cha'jian
苦口逆耳 ku'kou'ni'er
进俯退俯 jin'fu'tui'fu
析肝吐胆 xi'gan'tu'dan
破家竭产 po'jia'jie'chan
人言藉藉 ren'yan'ji'ji
取名致官 qu'ming'zhi'guan
飞书走檄 fei'shu'zou'xi
反正还淳 fan'zheng'hai'chun
党邪陷正 dang'xie'xian'zheng
药店飞龙 yao'dian'fei'long
容膝之安一肉之味 rong'xi'zhi'an'yi'rou'zhi'wei
安于盘石 an'yu'pan'shi
徊肠伤气 huai'chang'shang'qi
操刀割锦 cao'dao'ge'jin
包元履德 bao'yuan'lv'de
融释贯通 rong'shi'guan'tong
左右逢原 zuo'you'feng'yuan
极重难返 ji'zhong'nan'fan
幕燕釜鱼 mu'yan'fu'yu
残编坠简 can'bian'zhui'jian
牧猪奴戏 mu'zhu'nu'xi
丰度翩翩 feng'du'pian'pian
文房四物 wen'fang'si'wu
清灰冷火 qing'hui'leng'huo
至当不易 zhi'dang'bu'yi
明明赫赫 ming'ming'he'he
析骨而炊 xi'gu'er'chui
貂不足狗尾续 diao'bu'zu'gou'wei'xu
凡胎浊体 fan'tai'zhuo'ti
百舌之声 bai'she'zhi'sheng
量如江海 liang'ru'jiang'hai
木本之谊 mu'ben'zhi'yi
绝类离伦 jue'lei'li'lun
瓮尽杯干 weng'jin'bei'gan
功薄蝉翼 gong'bao'chan'yi
遵而不失 zun'er'bu'shi
桂玉之地 gui'yu'zhi'di
一心同功 yi'xin'tong'gong
日短心长 ri'duan'xin'zhang
鬼出神入 gui'chu'shen'ru
辞巧理拙 ci'qiao'li'zhuo
根柢未深 gen'di'wei'shen
调风弄月 diao'feng'nong'yue
各骋所长 ge'cheng'suo'zhang
亡羊得牛 wang'yang'de'niu
悬驼就石 xuan'tuo'jiu'shi
撒水拿鱼 sa'shui'na'yu
麦丘之祝 mai'qiu'zhi'zhu
高明远见 gao'ming'yuan'jian
杜门塞窦 du'men'sai'dou
骐骥过隙 qi'ji'guo'xi
打狗看主 da'gou'kan'zhu
吃著不尽 chi'zhe'bu'jin
俯首戢耳 fu'shou'ji'er
百口难分 bai'kou'nan'fen
时清海宴 shi'qing'hai'yan
蝇头蜗角 ying'tou'wo'jiao
足踏实地 zu'ta'shi'di
东风吹马耳 dong'feng'chui'ma'er
不成三瓦 bu'cheng'san'wa
鹦鹉学语 ying'wu'xue'yu
善文能武 shan'wen'neng'wu
大璞不完 da'pu'bu'wan
颜丹鬓绿 yan'dan'bin'lv
计日而俟 ji'ri'er'qi
成何体面 cheng'he'ti'mian
干君何事 gan'jun'he'shi
瘅恶彰善 dan'e'zhang'shan
令出惟行 ling'chu'wei'xing
流血成渠 liu'xue'cheng'qu
心手相忘 xin'shou'xiang'wang
虎口残生 hu'kou'can'sheng
螫手解腕 shi'shou'jie'wan
龙战鱼骇 long'zhan'yu'hai
神怿气愉 shen'yi'qi'yu
杨生黄雀 yang'sheng'huang'que
鹊巢鸠据 que'chao'jiu'ju
其验如响 qi'yan'ru'xiang
石枯松老 shi'ku'song'lao
东西南朔 dong'xi'nan'shuo
直捷了当 zhi'jie'le'dang
挂席为门 gua'xi'wei'men
以人择官 yi'ren'ze'guan
风马云车 feng'ma'yun'che
无情少面 wu'qing'shao'mian
抹角转弯 mo'jiao'zhuan'wan
薄批细抹 bao'pi'xi'mo
黄花女儿 huang'hua'nv'r
三窝两块 san'wo'liang'kuai
横抢硬夺 heng'qiang'ying'duo
不怕官只怕管 bu'pa'guan'zhi'pa'guan
冁然一笑 chan'ran'yi'xiao
操翰成章 cao'han'cheng'zhang
苦语软言 ku'yu'ruan'yan
顾景兴怀 gu'jing'xing'huai
百舍重茧 bai'she'zhong'jian
东瞻西望 dong'zhan'xi'wang
急时抱佛脚 ji'shi'bao'fu'jiao
矩周规值 ju'zhou'gui'zhi
尨眉皓发 mang'mei'hao'fa
连枝比翼 lian'zhi'bi'yi
掩耳偷铃 yan'er'tou'ling
来因去果 lai'yin'qu'guo
冥漠之乡 ming'mo'zhi'xiang
见兔放鹰 jian'tu'fang'ying
讳败推过 hui'bai'tui'guo
安适如常 an'shi'ru'chang
离山调虎 li'shan'diao'hu
谇帚德锄 sui'zhou'de'chu
脩辞立诚 xiu'ci'li'cheng
染丝之变 ran'si'zhi'bian
马咽车阗 ma'yan'che'tian
足茧手胝 zu'jian'shou'zhi
养威蓄锐 yang'wei'xu'rui
赫赫巍巍 he'he'wei'wei
忍耻含垢 ren'chi'han'gou
花遮柳掩 hua'zhe'liu'yan
不经一事不长一智 bu'jing'yi'shi'bu'zhang'yi'zhi
跷足而待 qiao'zu'er'dai
说风说水 shuo'feng'shuo'shui
同舟敌国 tong'zhou'di'guo
井渫莫食 jing'xie'mo'shi
遗簪坠珥 yi'zan'zhui'er
凤鸣鹤唳 feng'ming'he'li
支策据梧 zhi'ce'ju'wu
逾墙钻穴 yu'qiang'zuan'xue
狗续金貂 gou'xu'jin'diao
萱花椿树 xuan'hua'chun'shu
稠迭连绵 chou'die'lian'mian
雕虫末技 diao'chong'mo'ji
死告活央 si'gao'huo'yang
地老天昏 di'lao'tian'hun
潜德隐行 qian'de'yin'xing
有志无时 you'zhi'wu'shi
枝附叶着 zhi'fu'ye'zhe
尸禄害政 shi'lu'hai'zheng
暴不肖人 bao'bu'xiao'ren
亚肩迭背 ya'jian'die'bei
临难不屈 lin'nan'bu'qu
枉直随形 wang'zhi'sui'xing
你夺我争 ni'duo'wo'zheng
笑面夜叉 xiao'mian'ye'cha
贯甲提兵 guan'jia'ti'bing
绝世无伦 jue'shi'wu'lun
车填马隘 che'tian'ma'ai
风言俏语 feng'yan'qiao'yu
弄鬼妆幺 nong'gui'zhuangyao'yao
菲食卑宫 fei'shi'bei'gong
目牛游刃 mu'niu'you'ren
高不凑低不就 gao'bu'cou'di'bu'jiu
悲喜交至 bei'xi'jiao'zhi
强自取折 qiang'zi'qu'zhe
捧檄色喜 peng'xi'se'xi
草草不恭 cao'cao'bu'gong
构怨伤化 gou'yuan'shang'hua
捉衿肘见 zhuo'jin'zhou'jian
鞋弓袜浅 xie'gong'wa'qian
哑子寻梦 ya'zi'xun'meng
蠡酌管窥 li'zhuo'guan'kui
富室大家 fu'shi'da'jia
急敛暴征 ji'lian'bao'zheng
触斗蛮争 chu'dou'man'zheng
意气自得 yi'qi'zi'de
头破血淋 tou'po'xue'lin
逢新感旧 feng'xin'gan'jiu
烈火辨玉 lie'huo'bian'yu
发誓赌咒 fa'shi'du'zhou
尻轮神马 kao'lun'shen'ma
以一奉百 yi'yi'feng'bai
得隽之句 de'juan'zhi'ju
青蝇点玉 qing'ying'dian'yu
珊瑚在网 shan'hu'zai'wang
积本求原 ji'ben'qiu'yuan
浩气英风 hao'qi'ying'feng
内清外浊 nei'qing'wai'zhuo
尺二秀才 chi'er'xiu'cai
劳而不怨 lao'er'bu'yuan
根盘蒂结 gen'pan'di'jie
同文共规 tong'wen'gong'gui
扑地掀天 pu'di'xian'tian
长戟高门 zhang'ji'gao'men
智小言大 zhi'xiao'yan'da
人生朝露 ren'sheng'chao'lu

千了百了 qian'le'bai'le

歃血而盟 sha'xue'er'meng
唾地成文 tuo'di'cheng'wen
一目之士 yi'mu'zhi'shi

撑眉努眼 cheng'mei'nu'yan
学优则仕 xue'you'ze'shi

和合双全 he'he'shuang'

没衷一是 mei'zhong'yi'shi

利析秋毫 li'xi'qiu'hao
文无加点 wen'wu'jia'dian
较短量长 jiao'duan'liang'zhang
舞文饰智 wu'wen'shi'zhi

一班半点 yi'ban'ban'dian
怕风怯雨 pa'feng'qie'yu

冠屦倒施 guan'ju'dao'shi
买犊卖刀 mai'du'mai'dao
凭几之诏 ping'ji'zhi'zhao
万民涂炭 wan'min'tu'tan

匕鬯无惊 bi'chang'wu'jing
骄佚奢淫 jiao'yi'she'yin
刚愎自任 gang'bi'zi'ren
十米九糠 shi'mi'jiu'kang
弃之如敝屐 qi'zhi'ru'bi'ji
头出头没 tou'chu'tou'mei
道路指目 dao'lu'zhi'mu

翠纶桂饵 cui'lun'gui'er

寸阴尺璧 cun'yin'chi'bi

名贸实易 ming'mao'shi'yi

首足异处 shou'zu'yi'chu
朱槃玉敦 zhu'pan'yu'dui
名公钜人 ming'gong'ju'ren
背暗投明 bei'an'tou'ming
各竭所长 ge'jie'suo'zhang
遗臭万世 yi'chou'wan'shi
呼应不灵 hu'ying'bu'ling
班衣戏彩 ban'yi'xi'cai
宵旰图治 xiao'gan'tu'zhi
捶骨沥髓 chui'gu'li'sui
荡然肆志 dang'ran'si'zhi
上无片瓦下无卓锥 shang'wu'pian'wa'xia'wu'zhuo'zhui
舍身图报 she'shen'tu'bao
冤各有头债各有主 yuan'ge'you'tou'zhai'ge'you'zhu

好善嫉恶 hao'shan'ji'e
临危自计 lin'wei'zi'ji

你敬我爱 ni'jing'wo'ai
负才任气 fu'cai'ren'qi

改是成非 gai'shi'cheng'fei
抚绥万方 fu'sui'wan'fang
奴颜婢色 nu'yan'bi'se
食不遑味 shi'bu'huang'wei

悄悄冥冥 qiao'qiao'ming'ming

金锣腾空 jin'luo'teng'kong

比物此志 bi'wu'ci'zhi
称斤掂两 cheng'jin'dian'liang
彬彬文质 bin'bin'wen'zhi
差若天渊 cha'ruo'tian'yuan
一廉如水 yi'lian'ru'shui
连城之价 lian'cheng'zhi'jia
贯穿驰骋 guan'chuan'chi'cheng
出语成章 chu'yu'cheng'zhang
析辨诡词 xi'bian'gui'ci
研机综微 yan'ji'zong'wei
九故十亲 jiu'gu'shi'qin
撼树蚍蜉 han'shu'pi'fu
锦花绣草 jin'hua'xiu'cao
援古刺今 yuan'gu'ci'jin
拙口钝辞 zhuo'kou'dun'ci
程门度雪 cheng'men'du'xue
虮虱相吊 ji'shi'xiang'diao
岳峙渊渟 yue'shi'yuan'ting
傀儡登场 gui'lei'deng'chang
即小见大 ji'xiao'jian'da
鼎食鸣锺 ding'shi'ming'zhong
城门鱼殃 cheng'men'yu'yang
以锥刺地 yi'zhui'ci'di
丰肌秀骨 feng'ji'xiu'gu
日薄桑榆 ri'bao'sang'yu
怊怊惕惕 chao'chao'ti'ti
冷锅里爆豆 leng'guo'li'bao'dou
好谋少决 hao'mou'shao'jue
察己知人 cha'ji'zhi'ren
磨盾之暇 mo'dun'zhi'xia
乐乐不殆 le'le'bu'dai
舞弊营私 wu'bi'ying'si
巢林一枝 chao'lin'yi'zhi
剥床及肤 bo'chuang''fu
黄冠草履 huang'guan'cao'lv
遁迹桑门 dun'ji'sang'men
出山泉水 chu'shan'quan'shui
从流忘反 cong'liu'wang'fan
杀人如蒿 sha'ren'ru'hao
周贫济老 zhou'pin'ji'lao
鹭朋鸥侣 lu'peng'ou'lv
通时达务 tong'shi'da'wu
道尽涂殚 dao'jin'tu'dan
群空冀北 qun'kong'ji'bei
连畴接陇 lian'chou'jie'long
挨家按户 ai'jia'an'hu
愤不顾身 fen'bu'gu'shen
碧鬟红袖 bi'huan'hong'xiu
觳觫伏罪 hu'su'fu'zui
强食自爱 qiang'shi'zi'ai
人烦马殆 ren'fan'ma'dai
事急无君子 shi'ji'wu'jun'zi
无胫而至 wu'jing'er'zhi
兴致淋漓 xing'zhi'lin'li
光阴如电 guang'yin'ru'dian
击电奔星 ji'dian'ben'xing
餐松啖柏 can'song'dan'bai
认鸡作凤 ren'ji'zuo'feng
露红烟紫 lu'hong'yan'zi
区宇一清 qu'yu'yi'qing
面似靴皮 mian'shi'xue'pi
含垢藏瑕 han'gou'cang'xia
兼人之材 jian'ren'zhi'cai
青口白舌 qing'kou'bai'she
拭目而观 shi'mu'er'guan
枕戈击楫 zhen'ge'ji'ji
分守要津 fen'shou'yao'jin
神采英拔 shen'cai'ying'ba
萤灯雪屋 ying'deng'xue'wu
为裘为箕 wei'qiu'wei'ji
打富救贫 da'fu'jiu'pin
铁板铜弦 tie'ban'tong'xian
郤诜高第 xi'shen'gao'di
渊亭山立 yuan'ting'shan'li
罗掘一空 luo'jue'yi'kong
乞宠求荣 qi'chong'qiu'rong
运策决机 yun'ce'jue'ji
出奇不穷 chu'qi'bu'qiong
安危相易祸福相生 an'wei'xiang'yi'huo'fu'xiang'sheng
百足之虫至断不蹶 bai'zu'zhi'chong'zhi'duan'bu'jue
御沟红叶 yu'gou'hong'ye
柴立不阿 chai'li'bu'a
齿牙为祸 chi'ya'wei'huo
归正守丘 gui'zheng'shou'qiu

补敝起废 bu'bi'qi'fei

继继绳绳 ji'ji'sheng'sheng
嘿然不语 hei'ran'bu'yu
忧心如薰 you'xin'ru'xun
利深祸速 li'shen'huo'su
求马于唐市 qiu'ma'yu'tang'shi
凤凰在笯 feng'huang'zai'nu
贸首之仇 mao'shou'zhi'chou
山长水阔 shan'zhang'shui'kuo
眉黛青颦 mei'dai'qing'pin
啮檗吞针 nie'bo'tun'zhen
抱朴寡欲 bao'pu'gua'yu
啸吒风云 xiao'zha'feng'yun
拨万论千 bo'wan'lun'qian
言行抱一 yan'xing'bao'yi
故旧不弃 gu'jiu'bu'qi
投畀有北 tou'bi'you'bei
阳煦山立 yang'xu'shan'li
发蒙启蔽 fa'meng'qi'bi

求民病利 qiu'min'bing'li

黑风孽海 hei'feng'nie'hai
磨形炼性 mo'xing'lian'xing

鱼龙曼羡 yu'long'man'xian

水来伸手饭来张口 shui'lai'shen'shou'fan'lai'zhang'kou
及宾有鱼 ji'bin'you'yu
旷若发蒙 kuang'ruo'fa'meng
龙胡之痛 long'hu'zhi'tong
无万大千 wu'wan'da'qian
研精苦思 yan'jing'ku'si
长傲饰非 zhang'ao'shi'fei
金淘沙拣 jin'tao'sha'jian

流风余俗 liu'feng'yu'su

甘处下流 gan'chu'xia'liu
明验大效 ming'yan'da'xiao
一差两讹 yi'cha'liang'e

夏鼎商彝 xia'ding'shang'yi
云愁海思 yun'chou'hai'si
祁奚举午 qi'xi'ju'wu
泣血稽颡 qi'xue'ji'sang
势钧力敌 shi'jun'li'di
流离颠疐 liu'li'dian'zhi
撞头磕脑 zhuang''ke'nao
向平之原 xiang'ping'zhi'yuan
卖犊买刀 mai'du'mai'dao
虚己以听 xu'ji'yi'ting
人伦并处 ren'lun'bing'chu
闭合思过 bi'he'si'guo
安老怀少 an'lao'huai'shao
里丑捧心 li'chou'peng'xin
黄绵袄子 huang'mian'ao'zi
狂朋怪友 kuang'peng'guai'you
北鄙之声 bei'bi'zhi'sheng
偎慵堕懒 wei'yong'duo'lan
明镜不疲 ming'jing'bu'pi
抡眉竖目 lun'mei'shu'mu
三尺童蒙 san'chi'tong'meng
礼士亲贤 li'shi'qin'xian
借篷使风 jie'peng'shi'feng
当场献丑 dang'chang'xian'chou
下乔入幽 xia'qiao'ru'you
物极必返 wu'ji'bi'fan
遭倾遇祸 zao'qing'yu'huo
一夔一契 yi'kui'yi'qi
酒病花愁 jiu'bing'hua'chou
豺狼塞路 chai'lang'sai'lu
玉佩琼琚 yu'pei'qiong'ju
鹅王择乳 e'wang'ze'ru
倚姣作媚 yi'jiao'zuo'mei
油浇火燎 you'jiao'huo'liao
少头缺尾 shao'tou'que'wei
昏垫之厄 hun'dian'zhi'e
调风变俗 diao'feng'bian'su
蒹葭倚玉树 jian'jia'yi'yu'shu
舍策追羊 she'ce'zhui'yang
杜隙防微 du'xi'fang'wei
洁身自守 jie'shen'zi'shou
十口相传 shi'kou'xiang'chuan
才识不逮 cai'shi'bu'dai
分房减口 fen'fang'jian'kou
遥遥华胄 yao'yao'hua'zhou
粉墙朱户 fen'qiang'zhu'hu
謇謇谔谔 jian'jian'e'e
物不平则鸣 wu'bu'ping'ze'ming
鬼工雷斧 gui'gong'lei'fu
鱼大水小 yu'da'shui'xiao
焚芝锄蕙 fen'zhi'chu'hui
腰金拖紫 yao'jin'tuo'zi
二意三心 er'yi'san'xin
敲冰玉屑 qiao'bing'yu'xie
山林之士 shan'lin'zhi'shi
马入华山 ma'ru'hua'shan
骈首就戮 pian'shou'jiu'lu
人急偎亲 ren'ji'wei'qin
争名竞利 zheng'ming'jing'li
苗而不实 miao'er'bu'shi
漫地漫天 man'di'man'tian
吟笺赋笔 yin'jian'fu'bi
简约详核 jian'yue'xiang'he
察三访四 cha'san'fang'si
财多命殆 cai'duo'ming'dai
枝附影从 zhi'fu'ying'cong
盲瞽之言 mang'gu'zhi'yan
残槃冷炙 can'pan'leng'zhi
拱手垂裳 gong'shou'chui'shang
赏罚黜陟 shang'fa'chu'zhi
滑稽之雄 hua'ji'zhi'xiong
察今知古 cha'jin'zhi'gu
艳美绝俗 yan'mei'jue'su
家喻户习 jia'yu'hu'xi
披霜冒露 pi'shuang''lu
金翅擘海 jin'chi'bai'hai
头上末下 tou'shang'mo'xia
举例发凡 ju'li'fa'fan
瓶罄罍耻 ping'qing'lei'chi
捕影系风 bu'ying'xi'feng
电卷风驰 dian'juan'feng'chi
飞鹰奔犬 fei'ying'ben'quan
如足如手 ru'zu'ru'shou
野人献日 ye'ren'xian'ri
取快一时 qu'kuai'yi'shi
角巾东路 jiao'jin'dong'lu
冰销雾散 bing'xiao'wu'san
end
